title: Arrow Fest
description:
It is time to control your arrows, pick the best gates, and destroy everyone on your way! Collect lots of coins and upgrade your arrows and income!

Try to reach a maximum number of arrows to kill all the enemies and giants!

Become the master of arrow control!

=== HOW TO PLAY ===

‚óâ Simple and intuitive game with easy-to-remember controls

‚óâ Just swipe to control your arrows

‚óâ Pass through the best gates to increase your arrows

‚óâ Destroy your enemies and giants to earn lots of coins

=== GAME FEATURES ===

‚óâ FREE and EASY to play!

‚óâ Lots of UNIQUE LEVELS to play!

‚óâ Lots of ENEMIES and GIANTS to destroy!

‚óâ Lots of GATES to decide!

‚óâ Lots of COINS to collect and upgrade your arrows and income!

developerAddress: Esentepe Mahallesi, Talatpa≈üa Caddesi, No: 5-6 ≈ûi≈üli, ƒ∞stanbul  34394
recentChanges: First Release
comments: It's fun at the beginning but you start to loose interest the more you play it. Levels are repetitive and it's not exciting at all. There are other issues such as ads. We already know about the ads so there is no point explaining. Once you reach the final multiplier you get money super quickly and you buy a bunch of arrows and it's kinda impossible to loose. I had to make my own little challenge to reach 420 for arrows and 699 (haha funny numbers) for the other one (I forgot the name).

3 stars because i respect the time developers put into this game. But, this game really is aimless, dull, and very ad heavy. Collecting arrows to earn coins that can only be spent on more arrows and coin reward boosters, then bombard players with ads: not my cup of tea. The concept has the potential to be great with mini side games, challenges, a cool store, and maybe even some sort of storyline. Good luck.

Way too easy, even ignoring ads, it's garbage. I decided to continue to play after the level 10 completion (literally the game stops getting harder after level 10) so I found a glitch, if you use an auto clicker while upgrading, you can still upgrade during and after a level, and if you get through the level by luck, you don't pay for the upgrades anymore, so I got to level 150k and 225k on the 2 upgrades, and get 1b per level, and every 2 levels, I encounter an overflow, and go back to 0 coins.

This game has alot of ads and it has a strait point to it. They have levels that you can unlock a new arrow, when you get to a certain level you can get new arrows,, but it never works. The upgraded cap at 12500,(it doesn't increase) and now when I play it takes me 30 minutes to get rid of all my money (I make 50 mil per run which is stupid). I beat the game in less than one game and it never changed. I just thought it was funny how the developers of this game just didn't care that it was good.

Absolutely unplayable without adblock. Ignoring the ads however, the game itself is still awful. Its dull, repetitive, and lacking any actual entertainment. Leveling up is mindless, you eventually get to a point, even before level 50, where coins are meaningless, as you have so many. You can't even tap and hold to upgrade, you need to tap over and over. Additional skins can only be "bought" through ads, further invalidating coins. This is by far one of the worst games I have ever played.

title: Castle Raid!
description: Cut the grass to control your army and battle the enemies to take their castle!
descriptionHTML: Cut the grass to control your army and battle the enemies to take their castle!
summary: Clash And Conquest!
recentChanges:
Compete with other players and reach the top of the leaderboard.
Added more levels and squashed a few bugs
comments: Like all games from voodoo, it could be a lot of fun if you didn't have to navigate twice as much time watching ads as playing the game. Can't trust to remove ads because you pay the money and they don't remove ads. Very unfortunate that you guys can't do better. I get that you have to do ads, but it's ridiculous how many you have and how long they are.

Piece of advice. Turn off data for this app in settings and you'll be spared ads every 10seconds. Don't worry about the scoreboard too, this game is by voodoo kings of peeing in players mouths with fake multiplayer, so it obviously still works without data. Other than that the game is a satisfying little time killer. There are maybe only 20 level designs that are shuffled and progression stops after a while but its still fun enough to return to

Not a bad game, and actually is the game shown in the ads. Problem is that most of the ads generated out of the game appear to have no exits and require killing the app altogether (then re-playing the previous level) and hoping that the next ad will actually let you out. Since this renders the game unplayable, I'm uninstalling and rating 2 stars (sadly these days having the game match the ad is worth a bonus star in a review).

Absolutely horrible experience. The game itself is actually really fun but the amount of ads is stupid not only can you not skip any of them so they take 30 seconds at the least. They happen every time you finish a level or when you use a powerup during a level. In the forth level the game tells you to use one. Which causes an add 30 seconds later your guys defeat the frozen enemies and win. Which takes about 5 seconds only to get another 30 second add. Dont bother installing. Waste of time.

If you're gunna have fake 5 star reviews, at least make them believable. "Great game. No ads" What, you got absolutely no ads? You can clearly tell the real reviews from the fake ones. All the people that left a genuine review mention the ads one way or another but to say there's none at all is ludicrous.

title: Fidget Toys Trading: Pop It Games & Fidget Trade
description:
Join Fidget Toys Trading 3D ‚Äî the most popular relaxing game filled with lots of fidget trading and trendy fidget toys.

Tired of boring antistress games with no gameplay but still want to relax? Look no further because Fidget Toys Trading 3D is a perfect anxiety relief game just for you!

Trade with opponents, unlock luxurious items, expand your collection of fidget toys, and discover the magic of this amazing fidget game.

Throw your toys onto a table and see what your opponent has to offer. Is the deal worth it? Accept the fidget trade to seal the deal or demand more items‚Äîit‚Äôs up to you! 

Read your opponent‚Äôs psychology to avoid getting scammed and become the greatest fidget toys salesman in the world.

Choose the best strategy and obtain the most precious fidget toys for your collection. Trade your toys for cool-looking colorful pop-its, simple dimples, squishies, slimes, fidget spinners, and many more. You know you want them all!

Learn to make a profit off of your fidget trades and master the art of trading. Challenge your skills in one of the best fidget games.

Why Fidget Toys Trading 3D is the best fidget trading game:

Simple mechanics. There are only three options: accept, reject, demand more. Obtain new colorful fidgets in one click. Fidget trading has never been easier.

Educational and fun gameplay. Count and multiply your profit and become the richest fidget owner.

Exciting toys. Play with hundreds of addictive fidgets. Simple dimple, bubble pop-it, fidget spinner, slime, squishy‚Äîyou name it, we have it. 

Relaxing fidget game. Play around with the most soothing antistress toys and forget about your problems!

You will never get tired of this fidget trading fun. Don‚Äôt miss out on the magic of the most exciting yet relaxing games of all time. Out of all anxiety relief games, Fidget Toys Trading 3D is the best antistress game that you will definitely love!

Our update is finally here! In this version, we‚Äôve added:

comments: I love this game! A few things I wish tho is being able to design our own characters and maybe learn to scam and travel the world and start collecting or sumthing? I upgraded my house the first day I got the game and now I don't have anything much to do, the trading is fun but gets boring a bit too. Maybe add new features? üòÖüëçüíï

This game is so fun! I love how its only trading without 10,000 minigames inbetween. This is the game I have been looking for. Although, when you try the popits it gets annoying having to pop every.single.one with a finger, can you do so that when you spide your finger across, they all pop? :) But this game is fun, I recommend.

This game is amazing!!!! I recommend downloading it soon as you see this review and no people didn't pay me to say this like on all the others it's relaxing but the only part I don't really like is the playing with the fidgets part unless it's with a dimple but I don't usually use that I trade and the person your trading likes the first three fidgets in the controll's section and they will overpay (just a small hint...) But I rate this a solid!! Good work!! ;')

I really loved this game. It's fun and you can scan people, like in real fidget trading, but once you get to the part where you've already upgraded everything, and bought everything, it gets boring. That's why I gave it a 3 star review.

I really do like this app, its my fav game so far, but I would like it if you make it so that you can swipe your finger to pop the pop-it pops, add some more fidgets. I have founs a bug, whenever they say to add, I add, and then it automatically makes the bot accept. Pldase fix the bug. Thankyou so much. (Also if you offer the cat burger and nothing else, they always add the same thing, fix that please.)

title: Mech Arena: Robot Showdown
description:
üõ°Ô∏è Mech Arena: Robot Showdown is a FREE competitive multiplayer robot game with deep gameplay, intense team battles, and lush 3D graphics.

With levels designed for tight, fast PvP gameplay, battles take about five minutes. During a battle, you‚Äôll spend every moment with guns blazing. Real-time 5 vs 5 big bad robot combat never looked this good!

Choose from dozens of weapons and war robots with special abilities for endless battle combinations, then customize them for each new war. Meet friends and form teams to dictate the tides of war in exciting Control Point Capture matches or brutal Team Deathmatch battles.

Like taking the high ground? Back up your team with a sniper mech. Want to get up close and personal? Pick a Mech armed with autocannons, respawn, and jump back in the action. With instant live matchmaking, you go from pocket to live battle in this robot game in less than 30 seconds!

Fight your friends, crush global Tournaments, customize everything, and carve out your legend as the baddest pilot in Mech Arena: Robot Showdown. Be a smart shooter... the world is watching!

‚ãáEXCITING ROBOT GAME FEATURES‚ãá

REAL-TIME 5v5 PvP BATTLES

Test your skill against real players from around the world in live mech wars. Team up with your friends and conquer the rankings together as your robots battle for glory!

COMPETITIVE GAMEPLAY

With rankings and achievements, there are tons of ways to win prizes for your war bots. When you‚Äôre ready, join Tournaments to prove your worth in all-out PvP mech wars. Rise up the divisions, pick up gear, and strike fear.

POINT AND SHOOT SIMPLICITY

Intuitive controls make it easy to get the hang of your war robots even in your first PvP battle. Want to play it your way? Customize controls so your war bots fit your needs. Then, go out there and dominate the mech wars!

ENDLESS CHOICES

Are you a scout? Sniper? Shooter that just runs in, guns blazing? In this robot game,  there‚Äôs always a mech loadout that‚Äôs perfect for you. Apply unique skins or add paint jobs to make your war robots stand out.

FUN TEAM-BASED BATTLES

Get your friends together, plan your team strategies, design compatible war bots, and fight in mech wars side-by-side. Bring in allies from Facebook or find new ones on the battlefield. Mech Arena: Robot Showdown is like a LAN party in your pocket!

UNIQUE GAME MAPS

Fight up close in the Mech Arena. Run PvP missions at the Mesa Verde facility, or watch robots battle among the stars at Elon Station Gray. Shoot down enemy war bots under the neon lights of the Forbidden City, or fight through frosty Patterson Station. In this robot game, the world and beyond is your arena.

TONS OF WEAPONS

Attack from cover with long-range artillery, shoot around corners with smart missiles, freeze war bots with stasis guns, or rely on good old kinetic and energy weapons. Your robots battle with them all. They‚Äôre all upgradeable, so go nuts.

SPECIAL MECH ABILITIES

Blind your opponents with targeting jammers. Shoot your war robots forward at ramming speed. Deploy energy shields, jump jets, mines, and more. Every map is different - find the right mix for your style of battle.

NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM

Mech Arena: Robot Showdown is a shooter designed to work on most 4G/LTE networks. So, you can fight mech wars and watch your robots battle wherever you can get away with it.

NOTE:

‚Ä¢ Items can be purchased in Mech Arena: Robot Showdown. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type.
‚Ä¢ Mech Arena is available in English, French, German, Italian, Chinese (Simplified), Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Brazilian), Russian, Spanish and Turkish.

Mech Arena: Robot Showdown Support: arena.support@plarium.com
Mech Arena: Robot Showdown Community: https://plarium.com/forum/en/mech-arena/
Privacy Policy: https://plarium.com/en/legal/privacy-and-cookie-policy/
Privacy Request: https://plarium-dsr.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new 
Terms of Use: https://plarium.com/en/legal/terms-of-use/

recentChanges:
What's new in this version:

- Performance optimization
- Gameplay stability improvements
- Smoother game experience
comments: I love the game, it's fun, action packed, but I feel it needs the following: 1) the game needs some adjustments to make the game play fair. In a match an opponent was eliminating me in 3 sec with a lazer weapon. 2) could you make hiting certain areas on a robot deal more damage, for example, hitting the drivers cabin and back armor of the robot will deal more damage than aiming for the front armor. This will add more strategy. Other than that, it's a great game and I highly recommend it!

Game is good overall. Just encountering problems on two fronts; Firstly, the teammates that we are assigned automatically are mostly not exactly at our level or the level of our opponents and it is very problematic for us. Secondly, I know you guys have to earn money somehow. But it shouldnt be as hard to earn credits as it is. It is ver very very hard to get even a decent amount of credits no matter how much I play. So please please please atleast fix this problem if not both. Thanks a lot!

THIS GAME IS SO AWESOME!!!!! I now have the panther and it is one tough nugget! I absolutely love everything about this game. My strategy is to first use the Paragon at a battle and when I die, I spawn with the Panther and I always win with that strategy. Congratulations to the developer. I'm already becoming a pro at this game! Again congrats for the development of this amazing game. The graphics and game play is so smooth. Along with the awesome mechanics of this game.I love it!. Cool BTW

Hands down one of the best, if not, the best mecha game out there for mobile. Great control, amazing graphic, and surprisingly smooth performance even on a potato device. Just few suggestions to make this game even better: 1. Please increase the credit reward after each match, so we can progress much better. 2. Please add full-controller support. With this kind of graphic, it's a shame to not being able to play with controller. Please consider my suggestion, because I really love this game.

I like the game and all. The Mechs are cool. You can upgrade right away. I mean I started playing today and I have 2 Mechs and 5 or so guns. But you can't join battles in play. And message friends. You gotta wait till division 9. And sometime the game glitches.Well at least for me. I waited 10 minutes and it said it couldn't find any players. But other then that the game is cool. I have said everything needed.

title: My Talking Angela 2
description:
From Outfit7, the creators of popular virtual pet games such as My Talking Tom 2 and My Talking Tom Friends, comes the sequel to My Talking Angela!

My Talking Angela 2 takes Angela‚Äôs game to the next level! Find re-vamped singing and dancing experiences, endless makeover possibilities, and exciting places to explore. Angela‚Äôs waiting for the fun to start now in her brand new pad.

ANGELA‚ÄôS BACK! üíÉ üéâ üò∫
Angela‚Äôs got a whole new game, but she still loves to sing, dance, and have fun! She‚Äôs got a new home in the city and cannot wait for her friends to come to visit. She‚Äôs got a kitchen full of snacks, a console full of games, and a closet full of clothes and makeup where you can style fashionable looks and have fun with hairstyles.

ANGELA‚ÄôS IN THE CITY ‚òÄÔ∏è üè¨ üç∞
Angela‚Äôs in the city and there are so many things for you to do. Practice your moves or just dance to let loose at the Dance Studio. Your best friend still has a sweet tooth, so check out the Sweet Shop for candy and cake! You can even try cake baking there and learn to make your own cake or dessert. You choose where you want to go.

ANGELA‚ÄôS GOT GAMES üéÆ üéæ üïπÔ∏è
Angela loves to challenge herself with special games! Find crazy puzzles and wacky bugs in the brand new mini-games in the house. Try Donut Spin - a sticky cake game with puzzles and pets! There will be more pet games and quirky cat games where you can develop your skills, reflexes, and problem-solving abilities as you go.

ANGELA‚ÄôS GOT STYLE üëó üíá üõçÔ∏è
For fashion lovers: Angela‚Äôs got a glam room dedicated purely to style! Find an amazing wardrobe full of outfits and accessories, and a huge makeover station where you can invent makeup games, and a mini hair salon where you can try new hair cuts. Help Angela get her hair done and express herself with fashion and makeup.

ANGELA NEEDS TRUE FRIENDS üôå üíñ üëØ
Angela needs to kick back and relax sometimes after all this fun! Keep an eye on when she‚Äôs hungry or in need of a cat nap or a bubble bath. Take plane trips to find new items to bring home, and, most importantly, take good care of your friend!

If you‚Äôre a fan of fashion games, cake games, and makeover games and want to have even more fun with Talking Angela, this is the perfect virtual pet game for you! Those who enjoy baking and decorating cakes, experimenting with outfits, hair and makeup in fashion and makeover games will love this game, too. Download My Talking Angela 2 for free!

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising;
- Links that direct customers to Outfit7‚Äôs websites and other apps;
- Personalization of content to encourage users to play the app again;
- YouTube integration to allow users to watch videos of Outfit7's animated characters;
- The option to make in-app purchases;
- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player‚Äôs progress; and
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money.

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
EEA privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/eea/
US privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/
Rest of the world privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/
Customer support: support@outfit7.com

comments: I love the idea and the upgrades. But I have to agree with one of the reviews. Diamonds are not an easy currency to obtain. Usually in these types games along with the past Talking Angela game. Diamonds were more of a luxury currency for more expensive items that you might want to save up for. However in Talking Angela 2 alot of the upgrades and items cost diamonds to purchase. Makes the game more of a let down rather than something fun. Due to that I've had to stay with the limited free items.

This game is amazing! I love the graphics and the new things that you can do with Angela. However the fact that you need 20 diamonds just to get one thing to change you furniture is a bit of a scam. Diamonds don't come THAT easily and I believe they should be for coins. Another thing is there are not many games to choose from and in my opinion they are fairly boring and don't give much coins, also you can only rent some things. Otherwise this game is great and I would have given it five stars.

Honestly, I think this is a nice app! I am rating it 5 stars even though there is something that bothers me and I think it bothers a lot of people aswell. The ads are a bit too much, and sometimes they are always the same thing. It would be nice if there weren't that many ads, but sofar this game is great.

This game is amazing!!!!!Talking Angela 2 has all you can ever dream of like brushing, bathing, teeth care, sleep, eat and even dressing and makeup that you don't have to pay for, all free. Although, you can do anything on this app, it keeps coming up with adds. Please fix. So I am giving this app 5 stars because now this problem is fixed.üòäüòÄ

Oooooh! I love this game so much! :) and especially the outfits and hairs! Theres alot of hairs and outfuts that are really cute and pretty! Theres also free stuff! :D I really like this one better than the original one because it was a little to hard for me to Unlock new stuff at the original "My talking angela" :) anyways. I really recommend you to install this game! Try it out its really cool! And you can also travel :) to unlock hairs,outfits,ect. :) soo yuh thats all!üî™

title: Pull the Pin
description:
In this game full of satisfying graphics and innovative levels, you can challenge yourself, your brain, and your friends! It‚Äôs you against physics and the tricky levels ‚Äî WHO WILL WIN?

All balls have to go into the pipe ‚Ä¶ can you remove the pins in the right order and make it happen?

It should be simple: gravity pulls the balls down towards the pipe. But then pins are in the way! Can you help out and flip away the pins and get the balls to where they are supposed to be?

But wait: there is another level of trickery! Sometimes some of the balls are colorless: before they go into the pipe, they need to touch a color ball, so the color spreads to them as well. So simple yet so tricky!
descriptionHTML:
In this game full of satisfying graphics and innovative levels, you can challenge yourself, your brain, and your friends! It‚Äôs you against physics and the tricky levels ‚Äî WHO WILL WIN?

All balls have to go into the pipe ‚Ä¶ can you remove the pins in the right order and make it happen?

It should be simple: gravity pulls the balls down towards the pipe. But then pins are in the way! Can you help out and flip away the pins and get the balls to where they are supposed to be?

But wait: there is another level of trickery! Sometimes some of the balls are colorless: before they go into the pipe, they need to touch a color ball, so the color spreads to them as well. So simple yet so tricky!
summary: A relaxing game that will challenge your brain
recentChanges: Bug fixes + performance improvements. Thank you for playing!
comments: Scam! Don't spend money on this! I tried to pay for no ads, and am now stuck in a loop saying I already own this item (no ads) when I try to complete the purchase, and another pop-up that keeps telling me my purchase could not be completed because of my internet connection. This game is a scam. Don't spend your money! Scam!

Playing the Award Badge extended game is very challenging. The City Scape is nice, but I'd like to leave buildings/highrises or low as I chose and not have to continue with them again and again. I'd like to move on to landscape more and over the bay/river. I also would like it if on the Award Badge challenges I could still move the other(s) balls to see the possible escape pull route. When one or two balls are lost and I still have 1 left, I want to move it through also. Do you get what mean?

This game is far worse than most with ads. From the get- go you watch an ad for nearly every level you play. Why can't developers figure out that people aren't going to play for any length of time before they delete the game because of sheer frustration? Took me 3 days...I'm DONE!
It's all ads with this game. Quite frustrating. Liked it but uninstalled it within 15 minutes. For every step there's an ad.

Love the game but way way too many ads for me and on top of those ads there's the ad's on the game screen too (which I can't stand).. bad enough for me to uninstall the game. but change all the ad stuff to at least three boards until you get a ad and I will be back and be your biggest fan! üòí

title: My Friend Pedro
description:
They kidnapped his wife and kids and left him for dead. But it's going to take more than that to split this banana's family. Help your friend Pedro serve some ice cold revenge, with a sprinkle of bullets on top!

My Friend Pedro is back in a brand new mobile adventure of blood, bullets and bananas! Flip and fire your way through 37 action packed levels on foot, on a motorcycle and even on a skateboard. Plan your high caliber choreography for the best scores and, if your skin is tough enough, test your skills in Blood Rush mode.

This banana is Ripe for Revenge. Are you?
descriptionHTML:

This banana is Ripe for Revenge. Are you?
summary: My Friend Pedro is back in a brand new adventure of blood, bullets and bananas!
developerAddress:
GHI Media LLC dba Devolver Digital
3267 Bee Caves Rd. Suite 107 Box 63
Austin, TX 78746
recentChanges: Thanks for your valuable feedback! This update is ad supported and allows players to play the whole game for free and restart from checkpoints. Premium Unlock is still available for an ad free experience and additional Blood Rush game mode. Have fun and please leave us a review!
comments: It's a really fun game. The controls are good, the combat flow is on fleek, and the story is pretty good! My only problem is how fast the game is. I mean sure, it's a phone game, phone games are meant to be simplistic games you play on your toilet, but even Angry Birds (which is a pretty simple game) is longer than this! I beat this in 2 days! And if I want more game, I gotta pay for it! Besides how short it is, this game is fun as hell. Five stars, 100% pog.

This game is just like my old days at Y8. It feels like I'm on a speedrun while playing this game coz I finished it under 30 minutes with 3 stars in each level, I'll keep on supporting this game. This is easy on regular mode however I don't want to spend any money purchasing the premium, so please add harder levels on the next update. Every game deserves a 5 star rating and a positive review so the developers can push forward and make the game better than it was before. Good job Developers.

The only thing that went up is the graphics quality in which I still dont like the style. You cannot walk, or slow the perception of time when you want to like in the original game. I downloaded this game for a remake of a game I used to play all the time and got something completely different. Really the change in mechanics and controls was the biggest part for me. Either add a few more buttons or call it something else. Overall it's not terrible but I'm not a fan

Great game and I totally appreciate the whole mobile re-design from the original, however, I really didn't like the control scheme... the "drag and release" input method simply kills the whole rythme of the game, i don't understand why the game doesn't have a simple virtual joystick on the left to control direction, and an A/B buttons on the right to Jump/Slide, and the shooting can remain the same (tap anywhere in the screen to shoot toward that direction). This was the only reason stopping me from buying the premium cause the current control really made the game very uncomfortable to play, i hope you consider this, cheers!

To say I'm a fan of this would be an understatement, this game is sooo good on phones. It's such a fun game, it translates to mobile very well. Not only that, but the fact that this is a brand new experience instead of just a port really livens the experience. This is a must-get if you're a fan of the 2019 My Friend Pedro and/or it's flash game origins.

title: Count Masters: Crowd Clash & Stickman Running Game
description:
Choose the best gate, pass through it, and bring stickman warriors together to clash with the opposing crowd. Become the crowd master and lead your people through the crowded city till the end of this epic race. Crash obstacles and beat everyone on your way, collect coins and upgrade your levels. Defeat the King-stickman in the final battle and take the castle!

Looking for some fun and thrill? Then this 3d running game is just for you.

Count Masters is one of the most exciting clash games of all times! You start the battle alone but trust us: there are no chances for you to feel lonely.

This city takeover game features fascinating graphics and simple mechanics. You have a chance to get absorbed in the bright world of Count Masters full of gang fights and stickman battles. Get ready to spend hours playing one of the most thrilling running games. We promise: you won‚Äôt get bored! 
 
FEATURES:
Dynamic race. You are not a simple runner but the boss of a whole crowd of stickmen. Gather your gang and lead them to the main clash of their life!
 
Educational running game. Count, increase and multiply the runners in your team. Choose the right gate and win the most furious stickman fights.
 
Fun race 3d gameplay. Simple, realistic, and competitive. Crush them all and become a master of the coin rush!
 
Multiple levels with increasing difficulty. You‚Äôll face a lot of challenges, but don‚Äôt worry: you have your stickman crowd to clash with the bitterest enemies.
 
Perfect obstacle course game for the whole family!  Count Masters is a fun game for everyone and a cool time-killer for everyone. Download it now and escape from your daily worries for hours!

Enjoy this running game for free while we‚Äôll be keeping a keen eye on your feedback to make it the best fun race ever. So we can‚Äôt wait for your review to hear what you think!

recentChanges:
Hi there!
Our update is finally here! In this version, we‚Äôve added:
- General game improvements;
- Game balance update;
- Minor bug fixes for better user experience.
comments: You know when you are spending more time, MUCH MORE TIME, watching ads than playing the game, it's pretty bad. Each round lasts at best 15 seconds, each add (some skiable, but have to hit ff or the x multiple times) last for up to 30 or more seconds, all you have a recipe for an app to watch ads rather than play a game. Horrible model that seems to be a trend. I miss the good old days of just playing a have without being force fed ads constantly. Developers need to get a life.

The game has potential and it's entertaining but the game is so bugged that it keeps me from even wanting to play. First off the performance is complete garbage. I can't complete a single level with a lot of guys at the end because the fps drops so much that it doesn't even register my movement and before I know it half my group of blue dudes fell off a ledge. Game is also repetitive and they're overkill on ads. Can't even unlock skins without watching ads which is bs. Don't waste the storage.

I like this game. Sure, it's fun, entertaining and yeah. But today I was playing and I opened a chest to try and get the best prize. Instead I got +25 üíé, so I clicked on another chest to watch an ad for it. After the ad, things glitched out and It gave me a blank black screen and I couldn't play it again...Maybe I'd rate it 5 stars if it didn't glitch like this.

Totally pointless. You beat very easy levels. Win gems to build on an island. Building is complete very quickly. You're then winning gems, very easily for no reason at all. And that's before I start on the ads which are longer than game play. Woeful app.

Great idea and if it wasn't for that I got repetitive black screens already after track 5 or so, then I would give it 4 stars. Fix the bugs. The ridiculous building of an island on the side and recruiting an army, doesn't make any sense. For us who enjoys fast thinking games, the math part is enough. Uninstalled.

title: Roblox
description:
* LIMITED TIME PROMO (July 23 - August 18): Get ready for a sand-tastic summer with the Hey Summer Shades, Summer Wizard Hat, and Beach Bucket Backpack accessories from the Avatar Shop! *

Roblox is the ultimate virtual universe that lets you create, share experiences with friends, and be anything you can imagine. Join millions of people and discover an infinite variety of immersive experiences created by a global community!

Already have an account? Log in with your existing Roblox account and explore the infinite metaverse of Roblox.

MILLIONS OF EXPERIENCES

In the mood for an epic adventure? Want to compete against rivals worldwide? Or do you just want to hang out and chat with your friends online? A growing library of experiences created by the community means there‚Äôs always something new and exciting for you every day.

EXPLORE TOGETHER ANYTIME, ANYWHERE

Take the fun on the go. Roblox features full cross-platform support, meaning you can join your friends and millions of other people on their computers, mobile devices, Xbox One, or VR headsets.

BE ANYTHING YOU CAN IMAGINE

Be creative and show off your unique style! Customize your avatar with tons of hats, shirts, faces, gear, and more. With an ever-expanding catalog of items, there‚Äôs no limit to the looks you can create.

CHAT WITH FRIENDS

Hang out with friends around the world using chat features, private messages, and groups!

comments: The game is alright but theres an issue. My network has been working fine recently but weirdly whenever i try to go on it wont let me on. I'm talking like, doesn't even let me log on stuff. It just pops up with my network being bad and its the same with my chromebook. The real issue is that i have robux on that account and i really desperately want to get back on to roblox so i will be able to use it. I've tried about everything! Please someone tell me whats going on! I'm really worried!

Very good it's amazing. I recommend to play. Awesome. Not all games need robux. So we can play and we get free dress and accessories every week or month. Also we can never get bored. Cause it has so many games. I'm giving 4 stars because it is not allowing me to enter roblox and I hate it when it happens üò§ üò° but still if I give feedback it allows me. Also it takes a lot of time to download.

It was EPIC!!! I love it. Sometimes it glitched and says same account launched from a different account when I try to rejoin the game if I disconnected. It would be better if they added some new free items for people who don't have robux though. I don't like how the censor words that aren't even offensive to people eg. Secret.

The app is great to be honest,I have been playing for a year or two now and it got me hooked.The in-game currency is robux which'll need to be paid by real money but it's no problem for me since I'm capable of buying my own but the damn glitches and lags on the game made me hesitate to give this a five star,the screen sometimes stay on first pov and I know it's not because of my device 'cause it's new and high quality,the disconnecting of internet is also a problem,I have pretty good internet :(

To be honest, this game is great and I love it. But it definetly needs refunding and returning items back from ur recently purchased avatar items with robux. So people will or can be able to return something they have bought with robux, but end up not liking it instead of deleting the item permanently, they should be able to return it and get back their robux.

title: Heroes Inc!
description:
Craft the greatest Heroes in history and save the world! Create new super powers and build your alliance of heroes to face the attacking army of evil robots. The battles will be epic, the enemies are endless, and your heroes are greatest in the world!
 
An army of alien robots has attacked earth, the people need your help! The invaders are numerous, they demolish buildings with their mighty fighting mechs and wield an vast arsenal of laser weapons. Unleashed on the world, humanity stands no chance against this evil‚Ä¶ can you save them from this doom?

Build your laboratory, experiment and create new powers! unlock advanced technology and develop new abilities to use in the war against evil. There are hundreds of powers to discover, will you collect them all?

Even the most powerful super hero can be overwhelmed, out maneuvered, and defeated‚Ä¶ You must train your heroes, teach them to use their new powers! Unlock their unique skills and watch them decimate their foes!
 
Game Features
Craft super heroes - there are hundreds to discover!
Fight as your new heroes - unleash their powers upon the battlefield.
The enemy comes in many different forms - can you defeat their army?
Destroy the enemies leadership - Duke it out in epic Boss fights!
Collect new elements to unlock new super powers.
Build the best hero lab in the world - forge the greatest alliance of heroes ever seen!

Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

From the Studio that brought you Mr. Bullet, Happy Glass, Ink Inc and Love Balls!

Follow us to get news and updates on our other Award Winning titles;
https://lionstudios.cc/
Facebook.com/LionStudios.cc
Instagram.com/LionStudioscc
Twitter.com/LionStudiosCC
Youtube.com/c/LionStudiosCC

recentChanges: - Bug Fixes and Improvements.
comments: This. game. is. AMAZING. Sure, it does have lots of ads but it keeps me busy 24/7. I found this game when I got an ad while I was playing Design Home. This is my favorite game on my phone and I love it so much. For people who are looking for a new game to keep you busy, I recommend Heroes Inc.

As is typical with these thrown together ad pushers, there's a clever idea here with minimal effort. If you could actually combine every element into a new hero or if the gameplay itself was any good this game could be super fun. Also, the fact that there are ads at the beginning, middle, and end of the really short level is just insulting.

It seems like it could have been a fun concept, but it's impossible to tell, thanks to the ridiculous number of ads. Six unskippable ads in stage 3 alone, the combined lengths of which lasted 4 times longer than the stage itself. I understand needing compensation, but perhaps try a little less aggression with it next time, because I'm spending more time out of the game than in it, and according to the other reviews, it's the only reason everyone deletes the app.

Amazing game. Easy controls. I like how vague the heros are. You're able to use your imagination from all the stuff you've played and watched and It can easily be them. Add heroes from my heroe academia like deku or all might. That'd be awesome. There's a bug were the Atlantis base, you can't buy it. Fix this pleaseeee. Keep up the great work!

The idea is good, and I do think the concept idea is good. However, after completing the third level, where you run through the city with one of your two previously created hero's, you are supposed to go into your collection and I guess upgrade a hero. But you can't. You only have one "upgrade card" for each of your two hero's and, it doesn't really show you what to do on this page. There's an add directly after the third level, and it just crashes the game. Fixing these will improve the game...

title: Evony: The King's Return
description:
"Build your cities. Train your troops. Expand your empire. Be the King of 7 kingdoms! 
 All in Evony: The king's Return, the hot real-time strategy MMO of 2021! 
  
 THE EXCEPTIONALLY RICH AND AMAZING SET OF FEATURES: 
 ‚óÜ Choose from 7 civilizations to customize your game‚Äôs architectural style: American, Chinese, European, Russian, Korean, Arabia and Japanese! 
  
 ‚óÜ YOU ARE THE DIPLOMAT! Join a strong Alliance where you can make friends, communicate in real-time via voice and text with auto-translations so you can improve strategies and win epic battles. 
  
 ‚óÜ YOU ARE THE WARLORD! With over four types of troops to select and train from ground-pounding infantry to massive siege engines; fight against your enemies and see the battles happen all around you in real-time on the stunningly animated World Map. 
  
 ‚óÜ YOU ARE THE GOVERNOR! Administrate your cities in your Empire and use your leadership skills in managing resources and research improvements to gain strategic advantages. 
  
 ‚óÜ YOU ARE THE MONARCH! Recruit famous Generals of history to help with battles and city development. Abraham Lincoln, George Washington, King Arthur, Charles the Great, Julius Caesar, Genghis Khan, Oda Nobunaga, Yi Sun-sin,  and more await you to explore. See them battle across the world of Evony in real-time, capture enemy generals and use them against their own leaders! 
  
 Facebook fan page: 
 https://www.facebook.com/Evony.The.Kings.Return/ 
  
 NOTICE: Evony: The King‚Äôs Return is a completely free-to-play game, however there are some game items that can also be purchased for real money. If you don‚Äôt want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings. Also under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Evony: The King‚Äôs Return. 
  
 Do you want to be the king of 7 kingdoms? 
 Join now with your friends in the highly addictive RTS/SLG game NOW!"

recentChanges: - Bug fixes and improvements
comments: It's a good solid game and even though there are a few bugs here and there, some lag issues and a whole bunch of human behaviour & rules outside your control, it remains a great, almost endless, game of its type. The only concern with endless upgrade is the exponential grind, ever increasing debt and constant marketing barrages for the coin in your pocket. Months later, still enjoying the game without spending a fortune.

I did have this as 5 star because the game is brilliant, well thought out but the game developers don't do anything about the massive amount of alt accounts. I know of one player that has 5 alts and another that shares the account. They are in a position of power due to this and bully the rest of the server. I want to continue playing as I have got to keep 33 and pay to play but can't compete with the many alt accounts. The developers need to block these blatant rule breakers.

Very addictive. Lots of ppl to befriend, build and grow in the game with.... I would like to see and improvement on the translation tool.... It's a really bad awful, and hard to understand. It doesn't translate adequately. And most of the translation are totally wrong.... I would like to see the availability for creating chat rooms that are more private then the world chat, like whispering but with the availability to add multiplayers a chatrooms regardless of alliances but still privately..

racism, harassment, and death threats, oh boy. Sure this game starts out with some nifty puzzles, but soon you'll find that the game is really about building your own little kingdom and to fight other keeps. Fun, sure. But this game costs real cashola (thousands) to become competitive and for that amount of cash you might think it will come with great customer service. Ha Ha Nope. You will send in service tickets and requests not only about the many many many new and varied glitches and outages the game contains (prepare to see that red flashy wifi symbol in your dreams) but there is no policing on the "world chat" Players can write paragraphs of racist, sexist and all around terrible text. This is the first game I've played where the creators don't give a flying flip about any of this. ALL THEY CARE ABOUT IS ANYTHING THAT TAKES AWAY THEIR MONEY such as people buying resources off other players instead of from them. Anyhow, If you report players for racism, death threats, etc. and send numerous screen shots and proof, that player may... eventually... be banned for 24 hours from posting. What happens after 24 hours? they are back to doing the same old thing. Developers and customer service don't care. at all. And there is no escaping these same people day in and day out. Your keep lives on a specific "server" and there you stay. After a few days you can't move without starting over completely. So if this kind of torture is your thing, then hey have at it. They've developed a game that plays on your desire to complete tasks, and there are plenty of them. Enough to get you good and addicted. The other thing you need to know, is that you need to keep playing forever or you'll lose everything you've built. You can purchase 7 days of protection but its incredibly expensive, and that's the longest you can get. There is no taking a break and coming back. Once you start you have to keep going... forever. Welcome to hell, folks.

Total bait and switch. Takes way too long to upgrade your keep, only to get a handful of puzzles at a time. The whole element of building a kingdom and fighting others is tired and clunky, and the other players are rude and play dirty. Moreover, the ads for the game lead the viewer to believe the game is more about puzzle solving. Give us that game without all of the other nonsense.

title: Race Master 3D - Car Racing
description:
üèéÔ∏è  Race Master 3D ‚Äì Fast, furious and super-fun racing  

Keep your finger to the floor and be ready for absolutely anything in this ridiculously entertaining mobile racing game where you really never know what‚Äôs around the next corner. Fine tune your ride, keep your foot on the gas, dodge the endlessly varied obstacles, and try to keep out the way of your equally manic rivals in super-fast, super-exciting, psychedelic races that always offer something new and unexpected. Feel the need for speed? 

You‚Äôll get speed, drama, awesome cars and a whole lot more in this addictive casual driving game that‚Äôs as intuitive as it is outrageous.

üèÅ TO GET YOUR PULSE RACING‚Ä¶ üèÅ 

ü•á Hard to keep track: 33 unique levels with a huge range of different surfaces and obstacles to race over and around at breakneck speed. Plus 8 different bosses in specially tricked out cars ready to make your ride even more hair-raising.

ü•áRacing all over the world: 7 different locations with different track characteristics and richly detailed backdrops, decorated with ramps and tunnels with 14 different neon illumination designs, ensuring there‚Äôs always something to look at out the window.

ü•áWhat‚Äôs in your garage? 7 classic sports cars to collect and customize as you race through the levels in the game. Place high in every race to earn more cash, tune your car‚Äôs engine for ultimate speed, acceleration and handling, add exciting accessories and choose between 15 different paint jobs to really pimp your ride.

ü•á Hear me roar: who needs music when you have the roar of high-performance engines, the screech of tires and the crunch of colliding metal? Enjoy the rich sound world of Race Master 3D alongside simple but striking graphics and spectacular crash effects that‚Äôll shake your bones every time you come spinning off the track or grind to a thudding halt.

üî• THE ULTIMATE POCKET RACER‚Ä¶ üî•

Looking for a racing game that‚Äôs easy to play, provides a real driving challenge, and offers excitement and endless variation, cools cars and dangerous rivals, all in fast and furious races that can be run in a matter of minutes? 

Keep Race Master 3D in your pocket and you‚Äôll have instant access to awesome driving thrills anytime, any place and anywhere, trying again and again to reach the podium despite a series of increasingly surreal and testing obstacles that come rushing at you down the track in a crazy, colorful whirl.
Download now to find out if you can be the master of the track in the wackiest, wildest, winningest mobile racing game available.

title: Captain TNT
description:
Put the bombs to blast the buildings using detonator. Amount of bombs is limited. Try to do your best to destruct and demolish a target!

Simple controls:
- Slide to move the camera
- Tap to throw the bomb
- Activate detonator
- Look at a building transforms into the ruins

You are like an owner of a demolition company. Build your office, apply various orders, open new countries and continents. Become a master of demolition! Blast and explode everything you can! Detonator will help you to make a controlled demolition.

Captain TNT is the exciting free game! Feel free to tell your friends about it!

Features:
- A lot of building to blow up
- Incredible destruction physics
- Realistic explosions and debris details
- Control the explosion by detonator

recentChanges: Game improvements and bug fixes.
comments: If it wasn't for the MASSIVE amount of ads in this game it would be somewhat enjoyable. Half way thru a stage you are hit with an ad and when you get done with a stage ANOTHER ad. Like most of the other games these days the developers care nothing about the amount of game play you get. Rather the ONLY thing they are interested in is money. My advise is disconnect from the internet when playing this game and start blowing stuff up.

The game is fun but it is a little buggy. The daily reward doesn't work, every time you watch an ad to get the extra keys or reward you'll get stuck on the ad and you don't get rewarded and have to close the app and do it all over again, you don't get a lot of levels cuz once you finish the first stage or at least the first map of South America it doesn't let you go anywhere else. The game has great potential also you don't get enough time to use all the weapons you want to use or pick them.

One of the worst games I've ever played. You just can't play this game cos it won't let you. I was interrupted 6 times during one round of playing by ads. It drives you insane trying to play and it stops you right in the middle of the game. I wouldn't recommend this game to anyone. Also, the physics is just not there.

This game has alot of potential but once you make it to the first bonus round the game freezes as soon as you get 50.4% of the round finished. This happens everytime it has even froze my phone to the point of having to remove my battery to restart my phone. I hope they fix this issue because it is a decent game. Alot of the adds tend to freeze the game as well.

I really enjoy this game. Yes there were too many ads. However there is a cheap in app purchase to remove ads. If i enjoy the game then I dont mind paying to support the developers. To everyone else deal with the ads or pay a little, quit being so cheap it takes the developer time and energy to make a fun game. I only rated 4 stars because the other levels wont unlock. I am assuming they will be updates in the future. I cant wait for the other levels. Keep up the good work.

title: PAW Patrol Rescue World
description:
Explore Adventure Bay like never before in PAW Patrol‚Ñ¢ Rescue World!  
SAFE & EASY fun game play for kids from their favorite show! Whenever there‚Äôs trouble, just yelp for help! 

Fun games designed for boys & girls in Pre school & Kindergarten! No job is too big, no pup is too small!

PLAY WITH YOUR FAVORITE PUPS ‚Äì The Pups are ready to go! Ride around Adventure Bay with Chase, Skye and Marshall (More pups added soon!). Each pup has a special skill and vehicle for all your rescue needs. 

EXPLORE & PLAY ‚Äì There's a ton of things to see and do all throughout Adventure Bay! You're free to explore. The more you play the game, the more things you'll unlock in each area!

HERO MISSIONS ‚Äì PAW Patrol‚Ñ¢ to the lookout! Choose the Pup that is best for your mission and help save the day. 

RESCUE ‚Äì Help the people of Adventure Bay and win fun rewards for your Pups.

PUP TREATS ‚Äì Each mission you complete will earn a reward! Find hidden treats around town!

SAFE & KID FRIENDLY  - Kids games designed for pre school, kindergarten, elementary school boys & girls. Educational, engaging and fun games for kids to explore from their favorite TV, YouTube Kids & Netflix show! Easy game play to learn, for young children and toddlers aged 3-6. title: Run Rich 3D
description:
Get to the end of the track and try to collect as many money bills as possible along the way!

The more money you collect, the better your outfit will look. On the other hand, if you collect too many bottles, trash cans or bills, you will get poorer and risk losing everything!

Simple and intuitive game with easy to remember controls.
descriptionHTML:
Get to the end of the track and try to collect as many money bills as possible along the way!

The more money you collect, the better your outfit will look. On the other hand, if you collect too many bottles, trash cans or bills, you will get poorer and risk losing everything!

Simple and intuitive game with easy to remember controls.

title: Among Us
description:
Play online or over local WiFi with 4-15 players as you attempt to prep your spaceship for departure, but beware as one will be an impostor bent on killing everyone!

Crewmates can win by completing all tasks or discovering and voting the impostor off the ship. 

The Impostor can use sabotage to cause chaos, making for easier kills and better alibis.
descriptionHTML:
Play online or over local WiFi with 4-15 players as you attempt to prep your spaceship for departure, but beware as one will be an impostor bent on killing everyone!

Crewmates can win by completing all tasks or discovering and voting the impostor off the ship.

The Impostor can use sabotage to cause chaos, making for easier kills and better alibis.
summary: Join your crewmates in a multiplayer game of teamwork and betrayal!
recentChanges:
Additions:
- Added vent cleaning task
- Chinese (Traditional and Simplified) and Irish localization added

Bug Fixes:
- Getting stuck in place after a meeting is fixed
- Scaling on "SHH" screen fixed
- Geoff eyepatch is now (sadly) back to being a mask
- Clouds in the Airship no longer move in the wrong direction
- Upload Data phone colors fixed
- All major buttons are now localized
- Other minor visual and localization bug fixes
comments: I am very upset. I haven't played among us since march 2021, this was a very fun game until the chat got ruined, once I saw that update I stopped playing. I just came back to the game hoping that the chat was fixed and it's back to normal. But it wasn't. among us takes up quite a large amount of MBs on my phone, I just uninstalled among us. So until this gets fixed, among us will stay uninstalled for me. If you are reading this review, I HIGHLY recommend NOT installing Among Us.

This game is fun. For the most part anyways. There are problems. Like for example. How sometimes it is impossible to win a imposter game beacuse of the number of tasks. Or people that are afk making it so you cannot leave the voting screen. That one is very bad. Needs to be fixed. But with a little luck and a pray to the amoungs gods. You could be having fun for hours playing with a group of people. Also just to say this game should not be played by young childeren. I will leave it at that

Great game. I love to pretend to be part of the crew while I sabotage the mission in an attempt to destroy the ship. I wring my hands at the chance to kill an innocent crew member as they try to correct my subversion. The fact that I seamlessly blend in with everyone else only adds to the confusion as I shape-shift from crew member to imposter. So far I've only been kicked out of 109 games.

yes, sometimes games can seem the same all the time, but it's such a fun game. I hope innersloth will hear me & many others because i want the friends system so bad, and also the history of the games if you did not manage to add someone during the match, I met some cool people but I will never have fun with them again and it breaks my heart (but sometimes I still find their room by accident) I really want a response from the developers if they are going to add something like this.

I loved the original Among Us. It was a great game that I would've reccomended, but because people abused the free chat and customizable name, an update came that ruined the game and wasn't responded too very well. The chat was replaced with certain phrases that makes actually explaining something impossible. You permission from a parent to access the old free chat, and to verify you're a parent you have to pay money. They could have just used the same system Roblox does but they didn't.

comments: It was a good idea but... When you try to hit a note on a song it doesnt work and i usaly have to play multiple adds to play were i died from. This game is fun but there is also a glitch that makes it play a tune over and over again when you're playing a song and when you close the app. I recomend to play somthing else instead.

This game is very fun. I have been playing it for years. And i like the fact that even thought there are ads, if you dont watch a video to continue, etc. Its just an ad and no video. Way better that ad videos. So you can easily x out without waiting for the ad to end since its just a picture ad. Great game. I would recommend it. Play it now if you're not sure its good or not. Its very fun besides the ads. Play it now!!!

This game literally sucks!!!First when I downloaded it, was fine but then, in the middle of my game it would glitch and my tiles would be at the bottom and I will loose. I would NOT recommend you this game. This needs to be repaired. And it has so many ads,like evertime you loose, the ad will pop out. Please fix this problem and I will change my ratings.

At first this app was very enjoyable untill it started getting glitchy and lagging when I'm playing. Too many ads as well. I have checked and it's not my internet. It's annoying because right when it starts getting good it glitches which affects my score rank and when I want to see an ad it says,"There are No ads Available" Don't recommend :(

Wayyy too many ads. Used to be a fun game, or at least it's predecessor was. This seems to be nothing more than a page for ads to be forced down your throat. The music isn't gotten by leveling up like it was at one time, instead it's ads. It's not even to the rhythm of the music anymore half the time, especially not to the piano part in the songs. Absolutely revolting.

This game is really fun and I never want to stop playing it !!!! Little too much ad's but I'm just waiting for more fun levels to play.

comments: It was very easy to win jackpots even if I didn't have the $cash to buy coin packages. Very smooth and I didn't notice any bugs. I was a bit disappointed that I couldn't win a $100 gift card, etc. I spent a fair amount of time playing this game hoping that I could win something tangible. It probably would be fun for people who don't expect or wat to win #100 gift cards. Overall, the game was interesting and action-packed if you kept betting higher amounts. Very cute game! Lorraine Andriuk üåà

Follow up post- After having to continue to go out of site and re-enter after ads popped up 6/7 times, I decided to just play high as I could to get rid of the coins and uninstall the game. I do not mind the ads, as most sites send you back to your game, but this site keep you hostage on the ad page as if to make you download it. It is a terrible glitch because all the games are great, the ads making you exit out is really terrible.

I gave this app a 2 star because the game itself is awesome, however the ads are annoying. You can be in the middle of a game and an ad pops up. There shouldn't be so many ads. It really ruins the fun of the game. The graphics and payouts are great. DO SOMETHING ABOUT THE ADS! I'm going to delete this game. It's a shame because it's fun. It would be more enjoyable without so many ads.

Its a great game, i dont like the ads, gets on my nerves, change them, good job guys, i like the back round colors and the way this game is put togather, i think your players might enjoy this app, so if you change a few things to make it more enjoyable for players you guys might get 8 or 9 stars for this app

I understand that there will be ads, and I would have given a higher star but the ads have really become a problem. Everytime I am in a bonus round an ad pops up and I can't get back to the game and I have to close it entirely and reopen everything. This happens contantly. I am getting really tired of having to close the casino and reopen it because of the ads. Maybe you can fix your games so we can get back from the ad without closing the game completely. I may uninstall because of this.

comments: ***Update: Yay! I can get into the game now, thanks! I paid to remove ads but they're still there üò¢. Please update with a fix for ads so I can enjoy the game in a laid back, ad free environment. Thanks!!!!*** Character creation works and then when I hit the "Go Live" button it goes to a blank white screen with a banner ad at the bottom and stays there. The game won't load. I'll leave it installed for a bit and hope an update comes out quickly to fix the problem. Thanks! üôè

I installed the game after seeing the ad which made me think this game would be fantastic. Boy, was I disappointed. First off, NONE OF THE STUFF FROM THE ADS ACTUALLY HAPPENS. And second, after I reached level five, clicking the play button didn't work. So I tried uninstalling and reinstalling the game, twice. Just a blank grey screen both times. Never thought a game that looked so cool could be such a piece of garbage. Major let-down, and wouldn't function properly. Doesn't even deserve a star.

It's a really fun game and I enjoy playing it, but one thing: this game is not E for everyone. On no chance will it ever be E for everyone. There are a lot of ads too and the levels start repeating which Is annoying. But otherwise I like the game. Also one last thing: the levels repeat and that's really annoying I recommend making more levels.

I'm only giving the game 3 stars for one reason, I downloaded this app and when I restarted it, it wouldn't let me play, I pressed the button to play, a bunch of times but it still dosen't let me play sadly, the ads don't bother me alot, but the fact that it dosen't let me play after RESTARTING the app is honestly just disappointing.

The game is fun but after a couple of levels they repeat the levels it's stops being fun after that. There is one level that the girl takes off her shirt but you can't see her .... Don't think kids should play this. I would love to see more of this game in the future and hope that u can give this 5 stars. ALSO can we STOP with the ads slow it down please

comments: This would be a five star rating if I could actually close out of the freaking ads to play the game. An exit never pops up, it only brings me to the store, and I have to close out the game and reload it if I want to keep playing. I'm one more ad away from deleting the stupid thing.

Trying to say a lot of things about this game that it won't let you get past level 14 or 15 cuz by the time you're about to win it comes with a commercial so what's the sense of happiness game if you cannot play it and it won't let you add friends or invite friends so what is the sense of this game is stupid whoever made the game want me to go back and fix a whole bunch of things

I enjoy this game, the concept and the graphics. However, when you get to a certain point you have to spend money to advance. Watching a 30 second ad only gets you 2 gems. You need 100 gems to buy boosters. Be more considerate of our time, especially when some levels are impossible without boosters. I have spent some money but the higher the level the more money it seems like I need to spend. Also, in some levels the items are too small/light colored and hard to see when playing on a phone.

I was pretty addicted to this game for several weeks, and am at level 300. I didn't give it one star because it is an engaging game, and the worlds are pretty fun and well developed. But in the higher levels, you earn less coins per level, making it really difficult to "purchase" upgrades for the kitchen, which makes it almost impossible to get through some of the levels without using a booster, or using diamonds to get increased time or more customers. This isn't fun anymore, I'm uninstalling

Very fun, addictive game until about level 25 or 30, when the ads begin in earnest; the levels are relatively short, and there is now an ad after every single level that lasts as long as the level itself. There are also sometimes long ads after simply collecting a reward, an act which takes mere seconds. Very annoying and honestly not worth continuing unless you're very patient and have a lot of time on your hands.

title: Space Force - Lightsaber Game

Build amazing realistic lightsabers and destroy and beat everything you see in the new Space Force game! This action game is made specifically for fans of the stellar universe.

Do you like spaceships, stars, and action adventures?

Make your own lightsaber and use all your force! Try different types of metals! 
Try on different colors for your sword, where you can choose between the dark side and the light side!

Stunning 3D graphics and visual effects bring your creations to life as you slash and strike down everything you see! 

It takes great skill and a oneness with the Force to wield a lightsaber properly.

+ Choose your own saber blade colors

recentChanges: Gameplay improvements, bug fixes and performance improvements. If you experience any issues email us at feedback@majorfrank.com
comments: Great game, but if I could suggest a few things. One is that you let players put pieces in any order (e.g. hilt above guard). Second, the build menu from which you drag your pieces is a bit cluttered once you unlock all the pieces. Third, the dark crystal doesn't look at all like it does on screen. Last but not least, more pieces for building. But, like I said at the start, I think this is a great game, and I am sure these things are only because it is in early access

So many ads! It's a fun game and I enjoy building and playing but every time you do anything you get another video ad. Die, get an ad. Open a gift, get an ad. Finish a level, get an ad, even if you don't opt to watch the video for extra credits. I'm watching ads more than I play. Which is pretty sad, because the game is actually fun. If I could pay for an ad-free experience, I would. Especially since I sometimes accidentally tap on the ad instead of X and tabbing back crashes the game.

This game is pretty fun. It has decent graphics and is pretty addictive to play. My only issue is that when you beat the game, it just makes you repeat the final level over and over and over. I feel like having the ability to go back to old levels would be better than repeating the same level several times. Other than that, I say it's a pretty good game.

Pretty good. It never gets boring as there's new levels with different designs and new creatures. Could you add a "market" where you can make sabers and sell them. (Like the occasional quest which you can decline) I'm sure many people would like it and you can use it to make money. It would also be cool if you add more parts. Then you could sell parts and buy new parts for new sabers. It would be epic.

Could use better part organization. When you own everything, it's all in one huge pile, so it would be nice to have every kind of piece separated into different trays. One for endcaps in one, grips in another, etc. It's impossible to find what you're looking for otherwise. Also, put ads on the end of levels, not in the middle of creating a saber/blaster.

title: Ball Run 2048
description:
This is the best 2048 ball game you will ever play! 
This action-packed puzzle game is so fun. At the same time, you can relax and feel comfortable while playing this.  You will be taken to a highrise above water. 
Your ball will always be rolling, so please tap and swipe to control it and lead to goal. 
 
Don't forget! You can merge the ball with another one that has the same number and color. 
Naturally, you cannot jump. If you want to pass a rail, it's essential that your ball is bigger than the rail.  This is not a race, but an epic, fun and exciting runner type simulator to make you feel like you are on a roof top without rails.  You do not have to stay on a rail‚Äîyou choose your own way! 

It depends on your action whether you can be big by merging. 
Go ahead! You can be 2048!

Finally, we encourage you, and will be happy if you listen and enjoy our sound effects through your headsets or earphones.  You'd be able to listen to several sound effects, they are all comfortable sounds.

Features:
  Intuitive controls 
  Colorful 3D graphics 
  Brainly addictive mechanics 
  Merging sensations‚Äîmerge the ball with the same numbers 
  Vibrates during action (depending on the device and/or settings) 
  Multiple beautiful sound effects 
  Epic ball running sensation 
  Highrise above water fun 

Kids, moms, dads, men and women of all ages, please enjoy this entertainment! 
Let's get to reach a 2048 ball!

This action-packed puzzle game is so fun. At the same time, you can relax and feel comfortable while playing this. You will be taken to a highrise above water.
Your ball will always be rolling, so please tap and swipe to control it and lead to goal.

Don't forget! You can merge the ball with another one that has the same number and color.
Naturally, you cannot jump. If you want to pass a rail, it's essential that your ball is bigger than the rail. This is not a race, but an epic, fun and exciting runner type simulator to make you feel like you are on a roof top without rails. You do not have to stay on a rail‚Äîyou choose your own way!

It depends on your action whether you can be big by merging.
Go ahead! You can be 2048!

Finally, we encourage you, and will be happy if you listen and enjoy our sound effects through your headsets or earphones. You'd be able to listen to several sound effects, they are all comfortable sounds.

Features:
Intuitive controls
Colorful 3D graphics
Brainly addictive mechanics
Merging sensations‚Äîmerge the ball with the same numbers
Vibrates during action (depending on the device and/or settings)
Multiple beautiful sound effects
Epic ball running sensation
Highrise above water fun

Kids, moms, dads, men and women of all ages, please enjoy this entertainment!
Let's get to reach a 2048 ball!
summary: Get Ball!!
recentChanges: fix bugs.
comments: Download if you want to watch advertisements with a short break for what you could call a minigame (if you squint really hard) in between. Or if you have literally nothing better to do.

I love the game but 4 problems: 1. It's a low effort game but still really fun! 2. There is no level select, you just go on to the next level. 3. You can't pay to remove ads but at least there aren't too many annoying ads. 4. Some of the levels just started seeming to repeat (Starting at Level 31, I'm currently on 32). Other than that it's good and I still recommend buying it if you want!

This game is fun and satisfying, but after a few levels it gets kind of boring. If you don't want TOO much ads, just turn on mobile data or airplane mode, it will work. This game also has to much ads which makes it boring after a few levels. Each level is different, but the same balls. After all it's very good!! Have a good day/ night. Hope this review helped. :)

You will spend more time looking at ads than you will in the game. There's no menu and no way to retry levels at all, it's just a relentless push towards completing the level as fast as possible to get you back to the ads. It doesn't seem like theres any meaning behind the scoring either as I never had a bad score send me to redo a level. There's an ad after every single level and they're all about 15-20 seconds

They made a major mistake with this game. You cannot play without internet, even though the game is completely appropriate, fun, and challenging (I enjoyed it for what it is) I cannot let my kids enjoy it because the ads are sooo inappropriate. How does it go from help these people undress ads to free Jesus coloring pages ad. Also if I am somewhere without internet, can't play it at all... unfortunate. Actual game flows smoothly, I like that you can slow down or speed up your ball.

comments: Game is great! I've played ss for more than 3 years now on my phone. I'm getting an update to an iphone 12 so I'm going to miss playing on the phone I'm using which Is the iphone 8. The same ly problem I have with the game is that is pretty easy to beat, such as you earn coins and you can buy all the characters you want. Yet the new updateakes it even easier to "finish", the game when you earn the coin things you can exchange them for it's such as key, coins exc . But overall I recommend playing

Very fun game it's hard to get on the leaderboard like to get to diamond and it swipes me off the game every time I try to swap left or right but it's a good game the reason it's four stars and not five because there's like a lot of ads when you turn your internet on and it's a little bit annoying so please don't make it a lot of ads and I feel like it would be a lot more views in five stars so please fix that have a good day bye.

This game is great. I usually get bored with games after a short time but I've been playing this one for over a year. The first time I played it since I was eight, was after a hurricane in my area. It helped me get my mind off of all of the destruction and I personally enjoy collecting the characters. I've seen some reviews say that the characters do the same thing and there's nothing really unique about them except their look. I agree it would be nice if they had advantages, overall great game!

Fun, great way to pass the time but freezes a lot lately and you lose the coins you got. Been a few times now where I was on my way to high score for the week and didn't get it because of game freezing when trying to watch videos. Please fix Happened again today. So Frustrating putting in all that time for it to freeze on a video. And all support does is send you the same generic support response. How about you just fix the problem. Been playing for years and am close to deleting this game

I had rate the subway surfers many times never rate less 5 stars. This is my first favorite game. In the event that end today I had Player Akira and the board Sakura. When I got akira. But my problem is only that when the event is going to end please make the event and the time is end,please post the event without waiting a minute. Thank you!

title: Hair Challenge
description:
Are you ready for a massive Hair Challenge?
This is an adventure in which you have a super long majestic hair! This popular hair runner game is perfect for you!
 
Do you hate getting a bad hair cut? So do we! Especially in this super fun Hair Challenge game!
Pick up weaves of any hair colors as you walk the runway. Watch out for the scissors, blades, and all other sharp obstacles to keep your gorgeous hair from getting cut!
 
Did you not like your hair color? Or need a makeover? No problem, because this is a hair salon runway. Put your high heels on, pick yourself up a colorful hair dye, and start running on the roof!
 
Oops! Did your hair get cut? No worries, hair salon at the shop awaits for you! Go visit the hair shop to choose any of the fabulous characters, hair dyes, and hair accessories to unlock and start your cool walking game.
 
Forget about all the other top free games and popular games! This is the best hair runner game, challenging but super fun! So come join the community and play Hair Challenge now!

comments: I've been playing this game with a few minutes, and all I can remember from it are ads. There are too many ads, and they barely feature the point of the game; fidget trading. The mini-games can be fun, but the point of the app is fidget trading and they barely feature that. There are too many ads, if there's a reward they'll request to watch a ad, which is fine since it's your choice. But even if I press "No thank you." It still forces me to watch a ad! Overall, this game could've done better.

An okay game. But the thing is, another review said this but it heats up your phone and takes A LOT of battery. There's also an ad after basiclly everything, and more mini games than actual trading. You also have to watch an ad to have a second chance on trading if you decline or get declined, if you don't you get another random minigame. So I think if they were to update the game to have some minigames, but not more than actual trading, and have less ads.
