title: Toca Life World: Build stories & create your world
description:
Create stories and build your own world with Toca Life World. You‚Äôll get all the fun of your other favorite Toca Life apps such as City, Vacation, Office, Hospital, and more, all together in one place. 

INTRODUCING TOCA LIFE WORLD
Want to give grandma a wild hairstyle? Bring a sloth to the Skate Park? Or just hang out with friends? If you thought it was fun to dive into a Toca Life app and do whatever you want then you were right. This is your own world where you build characters and create stories your way. Make storylines and discover that anything is possible today. 

You can even go further and create stories with your favorite characters in any location you want. Want to take a pet to School? Go for it. Take the doctor to the Salon and dye her hair green? Rock on. In Toca Life World you‚Äôre the boss. Build characters, create stories, and play the way you want.

MAKE STORYLINES, BUILD CHARACTERS & CREATE YOUR OWN WORLD - WHY YOU‚ÄôLL LOVE TO PLAY TOCA LIFE WORLD

FIRST 8 LOCATIONS & 39 CHARACTERS INCLUDED
You can visit Bop City, a vibrant city area with 8 different locations for you to discover, like the hairdresser, the shopping mall and food court, or even an apartment. It‚Äôs a great start when you want to build your own world!

KEEP THE TOCA LIFE APPS YOU ALREADY HAVE
Do you already play other apps within the Toca Life series? City? Vacation? Office? Great! When you download Toca Life World, we‚Äôll help you bring all of that stuff into the mega-app. Then you can start mixing and matching locations and characters to create heaps of new storylines. 

BUY NEW LOCATIONS AND CHARACTERS
If you want to discover more locations, that‚Äôs cool. Toca Life World has a shop where more than 50 locations, 300 characters, and 125 pets are available for purchase. With different prices from small to big, you can decide to add a little or a lot. We‚Äôll always be updating with more locations, characters and crazy things to do.

GIFTS EVERY WEEK
Guess what? You don‚Äôt need to make purchases in the shop to get new items to add to your world. Check back every week and discover exclusive surprise gifts!

Discover exciting storylines, build characters, and don‚Äôt miss out on a moment of fun - download Toca Life World today! 

About Us:

At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids‚Äô imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 200 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: https://tocaboca.com/privacy

title: Woodoku
description:
Woodoku: wood block puzzle games meet a sudoku grid. It‚Äôs a calm but challenging puzzle that you‚Äôll be addicted to in no time!

Place blocks in the 9x9 board and fill rows, columns or squares to clear them from the game. Play for as long as you can without running out of space to beat your high score!

How to Play:

‚ñ° Drag shapes onto the board to place them in the grid.
‚ñ° Fill a row, column, or square to clear blocks from the board.
‚ñ° Clear multiple rows, regions, or squares to earn Combo points!
‚ñ° Clear blocks on every turn to earn Streak points!
‚ñ° Earn as many points as you can to beat your high score!
‚ñ° Have yourself a woody good time!

It‚Äôs a quiet, zen game that‚Äôs easy to learn, but challenging to master! Take your time and take it easy.

Featuring:

‚ñ° Beautiful graphics and satisfying sound effects
‚ñ° A tactile game experience with realistic wood tile design
‚ñ° Relaxing gameplay with no pressure or time limit
‚ñ° A light, small game that won‚Äôt take space on your device
‚ñ° Playable offline so you can enjoy this classic anywhere

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements.
comments: This is probably the fastest I've ever uninstalled a game I enjoy. ADS, ADS, ADS, ADS, AND MORE ADS!!! If they came around once every few rounds that would be one thing, but to have an ad after every single round win or lose is just annoying. Great concept ruined by intrusive ads.

ADS ADS ADS Fun game if i didn't get pulled out of the app after damn near every level. Whether you win or lose you have to watch ads And said ads don't close when you click on the "x" but rather just download whatever garbage they've thrown at you. Why am I punished for winning?
Game is fun at first, but after reaching a certain level, it gives you pieces that make it impossible to win. It feels hella rigged. The ads just add to the frustration.

Frustratingly bad. There is absolutely no control as to how far you can get in this game. As the screen starts to fill it will issue parts that are totally unusable, you can't rotate or perhaps go back a few moves to get out of a pickle. Then you need to go through tediously long adverts. It's a shame really as its a good game! Not at all relaxing though.

Has potential if they get less greedy. Like a lot of other people say, it seems like the further you go, the more you get pieces that you can't use, and there's an ad on top of the screen alongside having one in between every single level or every single new game. If those things were reduced, this would be a lot of fun but it does ruin the experience

title: Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ World of Mayhem - Action RPG
description:
Join Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Marvin the Martian and all the classic toons to build the greatest ‚ÄúToon Team‚Äù in Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ World of Mayhem! Collect cartoon characters like Tweety Bird, Taz, Road Runner and more to wage wacky battles in a vibrant Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ World.

Collect your favorite characters and discover their unique and hilarious fighting abilities. Characters from Road Runner and Wile E. Coyote to Sylvester and Tweety to Porky Pig each have unique abilities and hilarious attacks. Collect all the classic Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ cartoon characters in this epic action RPG.

Build teams with your favorites toons and take down your enemies with iconic pranks and gags! Use classic cartoon rivalries and get bonuses when you defeat an iconic foe, like Sylvester vs. Tweety or Road Runner vs. Wile E Coyote.

Battle with turn based strategy and cartoon combat! Characters unleash slapstick attacks on their enemies, so you can drop an ACME safe on Daffy‚Äôs head or defeat Elmer Fudd with a giant Anvil!

PvP matches let you steal crates to get rewards and power-ups!

Start world building and create your own Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ World with your favorite cartoon characters and landmarks. Collect locations from your favorite Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ moments to shape your personal Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ world, then carry out missions from the cartoons to power up your characters.

Collect and battle cartoon characters to become the maestro of mayhem! Download Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ World of Mayhem today!

WORLD OF MAYHEM FEATURES

Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ ARPG
- Collect Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ characters like:
- Bugs Bunny, Elmer Fudd, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Yosemite Sam, Marvin the Martian, And more!
- Recreate famous feuds like Wile E Coyote vs Roadrunner and Sylvester vs Tweety!

Action RPG
- Collect and level up your favorite cartoon characters
- Use cartoon gags as special attacks
- Fight in turn based strategy combat 
- Send your cartoon companions on missions to gather resources

Strategy Game
- Use your team builder skills to create the best and favorite team of toons
- Master team lineups based on character synergy
- Strategically select cartoon characters with advantages against your opponent

World Building
- Unlock iconic landscapes and collect classic buildings from famous cartoon locations
- Create a Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ world for your characters
- Earn resources by assigning your toons to complete tasks

Multiplayer Games
- Battle Online
- Fight in PvP ‚Äì test your team of toons in player vs player RPG matches!
- PvP matches let you steal crates filled with power-ups from your opponents or defend your own

Collect your favorite characters and discover their unique and hilarious fighting abilities. Characters from Road Runner and Wile E. Coyote to Sylvester and Tweety to Porky Pig each have unique abilities and hilarious attacks. Collect all the classic Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ cartoon characters in this epic action RPG.

Build teams with your favorites toons and take down your enemies with iconic pranks and gags! Use classic cartoon rivalries and get bonuses when you defeat an iconic foe, like Sylvester vs. Tweety or Road Runner vs. Wile E Coyote.

Battle with turn based strategy and cartoon combat! Characters unleash slapstick attacks on their enemies, so you can drop an ACME safe on Daffy‚Äôs head or defeat Elmer Fudd with a giant Anvil!

PvP matches let you steal crates to get rewards and power-ups!

Start world building and create your own Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ World with your favorite cartoon characters and landmarks. Collect locations from your favorite Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ moments to shape your personal Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ world, then carry out missions from the cartoons to power up your characters.

Collect and battle cartoon characters to become the maestro of mayhem! Download Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ World of Mayhem today!

WORLD OF MAYHEM FEATURES

Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ ARPG
- Collect Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ characters like:
- Bugs Bunny, Elmer Fudd, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Yosemite Sam, Marvin the Martian, And more!
- Recreate famous feuds like Wile E Coyote vs Roadrunner and Sylvester vs Tweety!

Action RPG
- Collect and level up your favorite cartoon characters
- Use cartoon gags as special attacks
- Fight in turn based strategy combat
- Send your cartoon companions on missions to gather resources

Strategy Game
- Use your team builder skills to create the best and favorite team of toons
- Master team lineups based on character synergy
- Strategically select cartoon characters with advantages against your opponent

World Building
- Unlock iconic landscapes and collect classic buildings from famous cartoon locations
- Create a Looney Tunes‚Ñ¢ world for your characters
- Earn resources by assigning your toons to complete tasks

Multiplayer Games
- Battle Online
- Fight in PvP ‚Äì test your team of toons in player vs player RPG matches!
- PvP matches let you steal crates filled with power-ups from your opponents or defend your own

Privacy Policy: https://scopely.com/privacy/

Additional Information, Rights, and Choices Available to California Players: https://scopely.com/privacy/#additionalinfo-california.
summary: Battle Your Favorite Cartoon Characters! Collect & Fight Bugs Bunny & Friends.

comments: It's got great graphics and character choices, easily can play without spending. Unfortunately, I have no access to the events as they start. Occasionally I'll get access before it just disappears again. Not very fun to play if you can't even take Part in the events or event quests. Please fix this IMMEDIATELY

The game was fun for a while but now they continually create new toons who are impossible to advance very far. If you don't pay a lot of money the new toons are often useless and so is the event. More of these toons are "exclusive" and can't be improved for a long time. The things you can do eventually become boring, repetitive, and useless. Can't play well for very long without money.

I have been playing almost to max level 69. But while I was almost getting there I got some bug thing that happened I tried to get it away, though it was a fun game... I was also quite glitchy sometimes! I got alot of got good stuff surprised to see the scams waiting for them to come help me settle this game set to make it all back (Still a fun game)

Been playing for a while and really enjoyed the game and all the different things you can do. However... game froze so I shut it down and restarted it only to find that my game had completely started again!!! No idea how to get my game back! Very disappointed and now telling friends we need to find a new game to play!

Ive been playig this game for a long time and now the game acts up by freezing and not playing half the time i have an android and this game has bugs and needs work done asap. Not happy at all with this game acting the way it does. Until he bugs are fixed i will not rate this game no higher then what i put.

title: Ninja Hands
description: Use your ninja's powers to save the girls and beat the bad guys!

recentChanges: New levels and powers are available!
comments: Ads, ads, and more ads. Spent more time being forced to watch ads than actually playing the game. Even Dger tapping the X to close the ad there is still another several seconds of ads you have to watch. At one point I had to hit the X 3 times to get out of the ads.

It's a great and fun game but it's always showing ads even after the tutorial and we can't even play offline mode which is really bad. And we didn't get anything for watching ads. Creater only get money but it's wasting our time!!!!

Fun with a clever and unique concept. You can play offline or you can watch an ad when you want a special power which is a fair trade in my opinion. You do kill your opponent and they fall to pieces, so I don't recommend for kids under ten. The art is cute but could use some refining and the levels do get repetitive and playing for a while gets boring. However, it's amusing enough to play casually for a bit each day as a time killer. The powers from the hand gestures are unexpected and cool.

I just started the game and played a few lvls. And I would say that if I was able to give stars for how much this pissed me off then it would have been 5 starts just because I could not give more. The game itself if awesome, i liked it alot but how much ads it is shoving down your throat for you to buy ad free is insane. The thing that pissed me off beyond words is that this offline game can't be played without Internet. To make such a good game and put it so down the gutter is stupid.

I had played many games but this game has soo many ads that u thought that it would be if you click start button then one ad starts and when the game ends or u pause then resume the game then again one ad and when u go to shop and then click back to menu then again one ad i played this game 2 hours and I show about 45 ads I think and that's too much

title: Magnum Quest
description:
An Imaginative IDLE RPG. Become a wise and powerful master, an amazing Hands-free adventure for you. Easy to play, Fun to win! 
Start a great adventure in this visually-stunning 3D RPG strategy game and have fun with players from all around the world.

Game Features

[Outstanding 3D Graphics] 
Exquisite 3D scenes, detailed character models and cool special effect skills. Get frozen in the BOSSES storm, touch the flames of the dungeon dragons and experience an immersive visual feast.

[Summon Legendary Heroes]
Collect legendary heroes from six factions: Fortress,Forest, Wild, Shadow, Divine and Abyss. Master factional attributes and counter strategies, build the strongest 5-player team to dominate Armuda continent! 

[Form Strategic Skills]
Shield, taunt, leech, freeze, repel, stun...Each hero possesses unique skills. Strategies and skills will let you win unexpected victories, apply wisdom and you will never be bored of this game.

[Explore Imaginative Worlds]
Armuda continent is a world full of imaginations, lead your heroes to fight in fantasy forests and endless deserts, explore mysterious ruins and frozen snowfields.

[Unlock Diverse Stages]
Adventurous storyline, Hero trials, Dungeon conquest, Roguelike-battle, Raid enemies, Arenas, Guild bosses and Rich gameplay. All waiting for you to unlock and experience!

#Follow us on Facebook to get the latest news and community activities
https://www.facebook.com/MagnumQuest

comments: Every other game where you just watch the battles I give 1 star. So for this to get 3 stars shows just how good the graphics, UI and overall presentation is. So that said, I've never been more mad at a game. This game looks so good and is smooth to operate yet you do nothing really. You spend your time leveling up heroes just to then watch them fight. I play games to actually play them. If I wanted to watch I'd put on Netflix. Please please make there more to do in battles. It's worth it!

Crispy graphics. I love the D&D tabletop setup of the game. I just enjoy the background view in this game. As far as gameplay, it's your standard heroes captcha games. Gather Heroes, level them up, gear them up and take on adventures, hunts, raids, arena and guilds. No bugs or any issues encountered yet. Pros to the Devs!

Absolutely loving this game. The combat system is similar to Summoners War: Lost Centuria, without the cheap counter attacks. There's plenty of heroes to collect, and a ton of team combinations. I've only been playing for about 8 hours, so I'm not too far into the game, but I can say for certain this game will stay on my phone.

Really enjoying this one!! Its kinda the same theme as "AFK-Arenas" but better grafix and character designs! There's a mass amount of goodies,/,rewards that are given everyday and always something to do to earn towards character development!! Thanks guys!! I'll be sticking around this one for awhile!!

It's a really good clone of the other games of the same genre. Graphics are good, gameplay is smooth, and the interface is awesome with the table-top DnD theme. You can F2P and they'll say that, but to really enjoy the game you'll need to pay, and it snowballs quick. So play with caution and be aware of the pay model and you'll have a good time.

comments: I'm updating,went back to the game to see how it was after the ad was gone and it tells me I'm now on level 2,I haven't played yet... click on level 2 and another ad, still no gameplay. All this is a lure to get u to watch endless ads? Haven't even played it for the first time and it's already loaded 2 adds before allowing game play I'm not even gonna play it. Why hit me with adds the second I open the app? Redicoulous.
Game is totally pointless, no puzzle to solve, no opponent to defeat, nothing but getting people up the stairs. Also 3 or 4 ads for each level. Uninstalling.

I, just like everyone else play these games because when I see the ads I'm like that game cannot be that hard and the person playing it must be a complete idiot. So I play it prove myself right and also get bombarded with ads. üòë So overall the whole experience is dumb as hell
Why to many ads for any game to have. Cut it back to a ad every 5 levels not 5 ads every level. That is one reason why people hate these types of games.
I understand you want to make money, but multiple ads for a single level? I spend more time watching the ads then I do playing the game. 5 levels in and I'm uninstalling.

title: 8 Ball Pool
description:
Play with friends! Play with Legends. Play the hit Miniclip 8 Ball Pool game on your mobile and become the best player!

COMPETE 1-ON-1 OR IN 8 PLAYER TOURNAMENTS

Refine your skills in the practice arena, take on the world in 1-vs-1 matches, or enter tournaments to win trophies and exclusive cues! 

PLAY FOR POOL COINS AND EXCLUSIVE ITEMS

Customise your cue and table! In every competitive 1-vs-1 match you play, there‚Äôll be Pool Coins at stake ‚Äì win the match and the Coins are yours. You can use these to enter higher ranked matches with bigger stakes, or to buy new items in the Pool Shop.

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS

Playing with friends is easy: sign in with your Miniclip or Facebook account and you‚Äôll be able to challenge your friends straight from the game. Challenge friends anytime, anywhere and show off your skills.

LEVEL UP

8 Ball Pool‚Äôs level system means you‚Äôre always facing a challenge. Play matches to increase your ranking and get access to more exclusive match locations, where you play against only the best Pool players.


*This game requires internet connection.

Play on the Web at miniclip.com/pool

comments: This game isnt terrible however it is not as good as it seems. It is mostly about luck, the physics are terrible, you can hit the most unrealistic ludicrous shots and it is very much pay to win. Although you can legitimately progress it is hard, annoying and not worth it, especially when you could spend 20 quid and be somewhere which could take you weeks to months. I feel like if the game physics were much more like real pool and everyone used the same cue then it would be enjoyable

Was one of my most favourite game but now the most terrible as it makes me lose my money instead of earning them just because of a glitch. On many occasions the opponent surprisingly gets a chance to hit the ball even after his/her time is lapsed which is unfair according to the rules of the game. I expect you to be quick and fix the glitch.

Great game, high value games should have dual confirmation on selection. I am also experiencing a problem to get rewards, I have to keep on logging in and out to watch a video to get each reward. You may say at miniclip 8 ball pool that you do not interfere with games played but I can assure you that majority of your players know that you mislead your supporters that are trying to use your services. Why is it everytime I get a social media message connection to 8 ball cancels.

All over game is very good. But there are two things that I didn't like, 1) there should be 'no guideline' tournament too. So that it will become bit hard and many times without even getting a chance, my opponent won many finals. So if there will be no guideline, then the game will become bit harder and both the opponents get enough chances to win the game. 2) other thing is you must give option to change the name in game. I am not able to change my name right now. So please make It possible.

I have uninstalled and reinstalled this game several times and played with guest login everytime and found a common pattern.... initially you will start getting points coins and every rewards and then gradually you will start observing that you are getting some impossible positions constantly and start loosing. Which in turn sometimes makes you desperate and provokes you to spend money. The trick is when you feel this, uninstall and reinstall, you will start winning again.My opinion :).

comments: This game is literally the worst when you first start playing the game when your finish playing the game an ad pops up and its 30 seconds long!?!?! What king of game is this im also not finish when you lose 1 round you have to watch an ad agian pls no more ads

While you're in the middle of a race, ads pop up. Really? That's not okay. It's one thing to do it in between races, but to interrupt gameplay? It's not like the gameplay is all that riveting to even make you want to finish the race in the first place. A lot of audacity from this developer, thinking that their game is so entertaining that people will put up with interrupting ads in the middle of boring, repetitive gaming.

1. The effects in this game are horrible 2. This shouldn't be a game 3. So just put it like this: My mind when I saw this app: this hurts... Me when I played it: wow--...now that's a lot of damage--... Moral of the story: this is like body shaming honestly it hurts
Unique game idea, but far too many looong ads!! Game over so quickly, then more ads! Needs more food variety. Sorry, uninstalled due to amount of advertising!!

THIS GAME IS THE WORST!!! Sure it was fun playing but it just got annoying. Once i get to the yellow mark, i get an ad. Like what?! Then i tried to look at the skins but it just took me to a blue screen with the avatar, and nothing was showing. Same thing with the foods, a blue screen with nothing. I hate the ads, i hate the bugs, everything about this game is horrible that it can go in a fire. Sure, you need money and stuff, but dont make your game so cheap and bad that you dont even care.

comments: One star for lack of the ability to interact with any buttons, got excited but turns out the ads lied too. This model of mouse is like a cartoon but the ad made it look hyper-realistic and like it ran smoothly, when really this game is trash and don't get your hopes up for this terrible cash grabber train wreck.

Runs at ~20 fps or lower, if you don't click on an optional add - you'll get one a few seconds later! (Completely free) The art style is reminiscent of those trash games where you gather more copies of yourself and fight a big number at the end of each lvl... Utter shite.
Everything is good just that on occasion the audio from the game will continue to play when out side the app. Not sure if that is a bug though
Forced ads every 60 seconds and 30 seconds in it has 7 different places on screen asking you to watch an ad or go to the shop.
Unplayable. You would have more fun looking the ads up and watching them on your own time than this thing forcing them on you every 4 seconds.

title: Contra Returns
description:
Remember the secret code: Up, Up, Down, Down, Left, Right, Left, Right, B, A to get extra lives? After a 30-year hiatus, the Contra you know and love is back! Developed by famous Japanese game company KONAMI and world-leading game developer TIMI, Contra Returns aims to bring the classic Contra experience to mobile platforms. 
In Contra Returns, players can enjoy the classic side-scrolling gameplay, two-person teams, alien bosses, and signature settings and soundtrack from the original series! All with updated HD resolution, 3D character models, and vivid acoustic and visual effects to deliver a sensory experience like no other! Get your fighting spirit all fired up with innovative content: real-time PvP battles, unique heroes, companions, and team mode! Legendary heroes Bill and Lance are making a comeback, so let's kick some alien butt and save the world!

„ÄêSpecial Features„Äë 

Reignite the Battlefield:  Fight like a warrior in this worthy sequel to the classic Contra series made in collaboration with Konami.

Conquer the Battlefield with Friends:  Team up online, test your teamwork skills, and take on the Contra world together.

Go Head-to-Head in Real-Time Combat:  With fair competition and 3-second matching, enjoy exciting multiplayer battles online.

Tons of Gameplay:  Experience all-new gameplay in the Team, Challenge, Story, and PvP modes.

Weapons Galore:  Mix and match your arsenal and pair up different heroes to unlock new skills!

Official website: https://www.contrareturnsm.com/
FacebookÔºöhttps://www.facebook.com/ContraReturnsOfficial/
DiscordÔºöhttps://discord.com/invite/TAx8kuXTxE

comments: I see my review was removed. The game is SUPER pay to win! Skill is not required and the whole game is a numbers game. Even if you had the skill and patience, a timer will make sure you fail. It's clear the devs wish to hide this as well with the removal of my review. The delay with the servers is awful, along with hit detection. You'll either get hit by something that didn't touch you, or you'll be hit by something that did touch you in .5-1.5+ seconds later. PvP is also massively unbalanced.

Great game and an awesome pass time. Leveling up is a breeze and upgrading weapons is simple and fair. PVP didn't take long to be taken over by hackers and whales, while some modes like one life mode is just broken. In One Life mode, you have to figure out how to get manual aim to work, otherwise the entire mode is riddled with poorly placed enemies that will hit you no matter what you do, because either their hit boxes are too large for their design, or because they appear out of nowhere.

Game is fun BUT the Story Mode progression is so heavily reliant on level requirements it ruins the desire to play after level 40. Basically it's a pay wall and if you want to play more you better cough up real life money. No, I won't, and when a game restricts things this ridiculously it's not worth investing in because it's just a matter of time before you have to pay and pay.

Terrible. Yes the controls are almost good enough, the graphics are pretty nice. BUT I WANT TO PLAY CONTRA. INSTEAD...I have to spend 30 minutes raiding previous levels so I can advance and PLAY another level, else I should pay for extra lvl'ing so my character is leveled enough TO PLAY THE NEXT LEVEL?!?! What?! So I blow through stages 1-3 never even get touched, but im 3 levels away from being allowed to play the next level? It's dumb. I want to play contra. This isn't contra.

This could have been good. There is controller support, I guess? But it stopped working after the tutorial level. I also can't support games with gacha mechanics. This doesn't feel like Contra. It feels like a poorly made mobile game with a license from Konami. The load times are also pretty atrocious. I was hoping for better, especially after Konami released Castlevania Symphony of the Night on Android. That game is great and exactly what I want more of, even if it's more expensive.

title: FNF Music Battle: Original Mod
description:
Music Battle is a rhythm matching music game to test your musical knowledge and reflexes where you need to feel the beat of the music. 

The FMF game has several characters: Boyfriend, Girlfriend, Daddy Dearest, Mommy Nearest, Monster, and Spirit. Besides, we have some guest characters like Skid and Pump, Pico, Tankman, and Whitty. Those all mods shall be your opponents or arriving to save Boyfriend and Girlfriend that appear through all the songs in full week (week 7 included) in Friday Night funny game.

As a music arrow game as well as a music battle game, to win all the battles of music in Friday night pumpkin, you should press at the Arrow in time with the beat and the music so that you can achieve a higher score than your opponents.

title: Love Fantasy: Perfect Match & Rescue
description:
Romance? Puzzles? Fantasy? THAT'S RIGHT! Love Journeys: Match & Rescue brings you all three and so much more. 
In Love Journeys: Match & Rescue, help your characters in need of desperate head-to-toe makeovers find their true love! Experience the dramatic twists and turns of betrayal & infidelity, revenge and forgiveness. Play and solve challenging match-3 puzzles to begin your characters' romantic journey in finding their "one true love".

MAKEOVER your characters with stylish clothes, beautiful makeup, trendy accessories and more!
DRAMA is everywhere. Dating stories that'll keep you on your toes, you drama queen!

BLAST through levels with exciting power-ups!

summary: Dating match 3 puzzle game
recentChanges:
In this new version, Jane will wear the dresses you choose for her, to hang out, to join events, and to date with Alex.
You will be able to see Jane fully recovered from the previous breakup, but at this time, the ex-boyfriend come back to her and ask for another chance.
What will Jane do, let's install and have a check!
comments: Enough with the bejeweled games. It gets old. Dressing her up gets way too monotonous and time consuming after a couple times. Why should we have to watch ads to use power ups we already earned? And why bother giving options if there's only one choice or the games going to do what it wants anyway? Even if you deny Alex you still have to date him? Give us other options. Not to mention the objectification of women. We have to dress to impress and gain the approval of a man? Seriously? No thanks.

The game itself is ok but theres way to many ads and notifications, the notifications are so clingy as well I played the game then about 3 hours later I got a notification that said "I miss u" that's ok when the last time you played like 2 days ago but 3 hours is way too clingy also theres too many adverts, I felt like I was watching more adverts than playing the game, yes there is an ad free option but I refuse to use my money on a game This is my opinion on the game and you might love it

It's bad, but not really really bad. I have to work so hard and watch so many ads just to get a short clip of what happens ! It is very annoying. Also, please lower the price of the things. Why should I pay for the things she wants ? Please give us more ability to do things. Also, please make the clips more longer and make us have more options.

As long as I am dressing glamorous or business or dates between men and women I will play it for hours a day. I have played one day for 7 hours. I would like a skip button that cost maby 500 jewels for ones I don't want to do. This just covers everyone's personal choice. Or a opt out for people who only want romantic dates with same sex or opposite sex partners would be more inclusive, and maybe pick a relateble race, I am sure black and brown people would rather dress their own skin color I do

Going to uninstall the game! It's crazy that people have to wait to update the game for so long but when they're finally able to so they're able to play again they're only able to play one "New Story" before it says that they have to wait again. You guy's really need to get it together and have the game able to be played and not where people have to wait to update for every "New Story".

title: Garbage Truck 3D!!!
description:
It's time to become the best garbage collector in the world with this garbage truck simulator! Drive your very own garbage truck to collect trash, improve your vehicle with lots useful upgrades and earn as much money as you can.

Upgrade your truck with vacuums, new claws and even train helpful birds to collect trash for you! As you progress unlock new neighborhoods and collect even more garbage! Hours of fun and plenty to unlock including special bonus levels to earn tonnes of cash and improve your truck even further!

summary: It's Pure Trash!
recentChanges:
It's Garbage Day!

Get behind the wheel and turn that trash into cash!
comments: Fun game if you don't mind trash.... controls are very touchy. When I went through the tutorial and was throwing the trash cans across the street I didn't know I was doing it all wrong! Task is to empty the trash and set the can back down. Unlike the cans you'll have to release any free items once above the truck. Enjoy

I love this game! The controls aren't hard to use and the difficulty is perfect. One thing though. I closed the app after getting lots of progress, but when I opened it again all of my progress was lost. If this gets fixed I'll definitely rate this game a five star. Overall, pretty good app!

I made it decently far into the game and had to stop playing for a few hours. I logged back on a few hours layer and all my progress was gone. I really wanted to give this game 5 stars but I just can't if it is going to delete my progress everytime I leave the game. Edit: I was just about to give you five stars but, what happens? All of my progress was gone. 2 entire days worth. Please fix this! I love this game but it's just unplayable.

The game is honestly very fun and doesn't need wifi so you can play anywhere! But one problem.. I was on the 5x Truck $10,000 and I closed the app and when I joined back it restarted EVERYTHING days of work and I lost it all can you fix and give my truck back please? Once this is fixed, My rating will be 5 stars. Thanks for reading!

Amazing game. I would greatly recommend. But I almost all upgrades and game was lagging so I closed it and it reopened it and deleted all my progress without a way to get my progress back. Please fix this and I will edit my review and make it a 5 star. Thanks in return!!!!!

title: 1945 Air Force: Airplane games
description:
Take control of a warplane and jump on the battlefield of 1945 Air Force - Airplane Shooting Games in this thrilling combat flight action game.

In each of the 1945 Air Force campaigns, you will assume a squadron leader of an elite airforce unit, engage in a team and solo action warfare.

You will fight on the most famous historical airplanes, from classic fighters to light and heavy bombers like Grumman F6F Hellcat, Lockheed P-38 Lightning, Su-5, P-51, P-36 Hawk, Schwalbe ''Swallow", Mitsubishi A6M Zero, B-17 Flying Fortress... to modern generation military aircraft.

The enemy is coming. War thunder is roaring! Let's spread your steel wings, go on a mission by yourself and rule the sky now!

FEATURE
- Over 30 legendary WWII battle zones.
- More than 350 Challenging campaigns.
- Over 30 historical planes from the USA, Great Britain, USSR, Germany, and Japan Air Forces... with various customization, upgrade, merge to create your own super planes.
- Shooting challenging arcade game free with many Additional modes from Bombarding, Bosses, Protect, Stealth to Assault. 
-  Daily rewards: Play every day to earn free prizes and get daily tasks and tons of free stuff! Complete daily tasks and upgrade your gear!
- Crisp graphics, amazing lighting, and special effects.
- Division (Clan): easily team up with like-minded Division Agents to take down tougher enemies.
- PVP - online shooting games, co-op with friends, gather your squadron team, mark your name on the global leader board.
- Offline and Online games mode.
- Simulator games - Many historical planes you can try.

The game is specially optimized to work on both strong and weaker devices!

Don‚Äôt let the enemy conquer your world.
Pick your airplanes up, shoot for freedom, and ready to attack right now! 
Good luck, Hero!

VISIT US
Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1945AirForce
Join Group to get our support quickly: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1945AirForce
Subscribe on YouTube: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVPSFoh0Ako97lspOYJSxIQ

comments: This used be a game of fun. Now it more of a stress reliever. The game developers have reduce the strength of the players ability to get to the other levels. And have made it more difficult to gain rewards to advance, unless you spend money to improve your craft. And with the purchases of the player, they have reduced the ability of the craft's new abilities. And the new updates restrict further. I'm almost at my tolerance of this game.

40th level is not possible to pass without using gems. If you don't have gem means you have to pay for it. Game is looting you. You will definitely disappointed in 40th level because how mach you try you will not pass it without gem. I like to tell the developer learn from subway surfer, temple run and candy crush they giving amazing features with no money. They are not beggers like you. That's why they got so many downloads. It's a casual game not challenging like pubg you have to give features

Beware! The developer of this game has no intention of ever fixing the numerous bugs and glitches that have plagued this game for over a year. Every update adds additional p2w features, and invariably another bug that renders a previously-functional feature inoperative. This game used to be great; I used to give it 5-stars, but has been a mess for about a year now. I'm done with it.

This is a fun game to play that takes a bit of effort to upgrade the aircrafts without paying money. Do all your quests on lower settings to get as many gems as possible and farm some good equipment (there's items that give +15%gold and +5% more event item) graphics could be better but it's fun game. I see a lot of people say you can't play the game without paying they are just too lazy or impatient. In about a year I got three tier 2 planes and ones fully maxed. There's no need to spend money.

Was once a great game until it became more about how much $$ they can get and how little effort they have to put into support, refunding double charges, player complaints. They are content with the glitches with the game as long as they can add more useless features no one actually cares about. Even when u have a legit complaint they tell u try harder or get some skill. Been double charged on my debit card and they refuse to refund the $$ to my account. I wouldnt recommend to anyone.

Tiles Hop: EDM Rush is from Amanotes, the number one music game publisher in the world, with over one billion downloads. Music lovers can interact with thousands of songs through our different apps. comments: The game is trying to trick you to think that it might be mentally challenging to improve your problem solving skills. However, the puzzles are extremely simple that a toddler could solve them. Let alone, there is no music or background music making this experience more brain numbing. With the gameplay aside, the app is bombarded with ads. If god forbid you enjoy this game please turn on the airplane mode to avoid the ads.

I'm on level 52. There were a couple times I thought I was stuck, but I took a break and came back and was able to finish. I play with internet connection turned off, and I really do enjoy the game. I can tell from the 2 times I forgot to turn off wi-fi that I would have uninstalled this immediately if turning off internet didn't stop the ads.

It's a very fun game, but sometimes it doesn't save my progress and really has too many ads, *dies in wave of ads* so very many ads. I love the game overall, but I would recommend less ads. I've been restarting on level 27. I'm actually on level 30. I'd really love if you didn't have to purchase zero ads as well. Overall very fun and timekilling game.

I got to level 705, and loved relaxing with this game. I paid for this, but now I regret it with the sheer number of ads I have to play just to reveal the colors and then solve the puzzle. What's the point to these changes?!! I quit. I HATE THE CHANGES TO THIS GAME. Such a shame with the update. Hope they change it back someday. As it is now, I do not recommend playing this game even for free. Before, I would recommend paying for this game. Such a difference. 5 star game is now 1 star. üòî

Not a good game. Sounds are terrible, they didn't even bother adding musics, drains battery insanely even when it's charging, phone gets hot even if the game has not much of graphics, and there is hidden colors levels which after a point get too difficult to solve(that seems they make you to watch an ad to get an empty bottle). More importantly there's ads as annoying as ever. Though I liked the idea of the game, it's not as good.

title: My Talking Tom Friends
description:
From the creators of insanely popular virtual pet games My Talking Tom, My Talking Tom 2, My Talking Angela, My Talking Hank, and other worldwide successful titles, comes a revolution in virtual pet simulation!

‚òÖ PLAY IN A FULL HOUSE OF BEST FRIENDS üè°üê±üê∂üê∞
What‚Äôs better than having one best friend? Having six! Players can join Talking Tom, Angela, Hank, Ginger, Ben and Becca as they move in together in their new home for the first time, and get to know the pets that are adored around the world!

‚òÖ TAKE CARE OF THEM ü•∞üõÅüç∞
They need someone to feed them, bathe them, tend to their wishes and play fun games with their cool toys! Players can help Talking Tom and his friends advance in their skills, and when it‚Äôs time to sleep, they need to find a cozy spot to recharge for a whole new day of fun and games!

‚òÖ UNIQUE CHARACTERS üòªüòæüôÄüòπ

title: Candy Crush Saga
description:
Start playing Candy Crush Saga today ‚Äì a legendary puzzle game loved by millions of players around the world.

Switch and match Candies in this tasty puzzle adventure to progress to the next level for that sweet winning feeling! Solve puzzles with quick thinking and smart moves, and be rewarded with delicious rainbow-colored cascades and tasty candy combos!

Plan your moves by matching 3 or more candies in a row, using boosters wisely in order to overcome those extra sticky puzzles! Blast the chocolate and collect sweet candy across thousands of levels, guaranteed to have you craving more!

Candy Crush Saga features:

THE GAME THAT KEEPS YOU CRAVING MORE
Thousands of the best levels and puzzles in the Candy Kingdom and with more added every 2 weeks your sugar fix is never far away! 

MANY WAYS TO WIN REWARDS
Check back daily and spin the Daily Booster Wheel to receive free tasty rewards, and take part in time limited challenges to earn boosters to help you level up! 

VARIETY OF SUGAR-COATED CHALLENGES
Sweet ways to play: Game modes including Target Score, Clear the Jelly, Collect the Ingredients and Order Mode

Facebook @CandyCrushSaga
Twitter @CandyCrushSaga
Instagram @CandyCrushSaga
YouTube @CandyCrushOfficial

Take on this epic saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Easily sync the game between devices and access full game features when connected to the internet.

Candy Crush Saga is free to play but optional in-game items require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings. 

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Have fun playing Candy Crush Saga the sweetest match 3 puzzle game around! 
If you enjoy playing Candy Crush Saga, you may also enjoy its sister puzzle games; Candy Crush Soda Saga, Candy Crush Jelly Saga and Candy Crush Friends Saga

title: Ball Sort Puzzle - Color Sorting Game
description:
Ball Sort Puzzle is a fun and addictive puzzle game! Try to sort the colored balls in the tubes until all balls with the same color stay in the same tube. A challenging yet relaxing game to exercise your brain!

‚òÖ HOW TO PLAY:
‚Ä¢ Tap any tube to move the ball lie on top in the tube to another tube.
‚Ä¢ The rule is that you can only move a ball on top of another ball if both of them have the same color and the tube you want to move into has enough space.
‚Ä¢ Try not to get stuck - but don‚Äôt worry, you can always restart the level at any time.

‚òÖ FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ One finger control.
‚Ä¢ FREE & EASY TO PLAY.
‚Ä¢ NO penalty & time limit; you can enjoy Ball Sort Puzzle at your own pace!

‚òÖ NEED HELP? HAVE ANY QUESTIONS?
‚Ä¢ Support email: support@iecglobal.com.au

comments: This was my favorite phone game until they made all the balls invisible in the latest update. Now it's not a puzzle game anymore; now it's basically a maze game where you can only see one space ahead and have to watch an ad every time you want to backtrack. I'm gonna uninstall it now. I was on level 2225 too (which means I've watched over 2000 ads already). Such a shame that they changed it to something I hate so much that I decided never to play it again.

I want my money back!!! This WAS a brilliant brain teaser, for which I happily paid to be advert-free... Until some utter toss-pots have decided this would be so much better if replaced strategy with random moves by hiding the colour of most balls. Uninstalled after reaching level 980 as this is about as attractive as stale vomit now. I hope no one actually got paid for trashing this once brilliant game.

Previous review had been 5 stars. Thanks to a recent update that fundamentally changes the way the game is played, i discovered there is a plethora of games almost identical to this available on the play store. I may return if they ever decide to bring back the puzzle aspect of the game that they sacrificed in lieu of a pure chance game.

I really liked the game however ads were all very long and did not allow you to exit after 5 seconds. I really liked this game but now I get ads that simply will not close!,,, I can not continue playing. Very frustrating so good bye. Sorrydevelopers cannot do bettet

I really enjoy the game as a whole. I find it very nice to sort things and work out the puzzles. I enjoy it so much that I paid to have no ads very early on, yet I keep getting ads when I try to undo my moves. I let the ad run to see if the game thinks I wanted an additional tube, but I never get one. This is a huge inconvenience for me, and I'm not getting what I paid for. There's also the issue of the new levels where you can't see all the balls. I think it's bad that we can't turn it off.

title: Fidget Toys 3D - Fidget Cube, AntiStress & Calm
description:
We all fidget in our own ways. Some of us tap our feet or twitch our hands, but we all have that desire to move.

With some amazing creativity, hundreds of designers took it upon themselves to make their own fun toys. We find the cream of the crop, compiling more than 30 of the best fidget toys we could find.

A lot of fidget toys 3D will make you satisfy!

Some of our fidget toys:
- Pop it Fidget
- Fidget Bubble
- Fidget Cube
- Fidget spinner
- Fidget Dodecagon
- Bean Toy
- Slime
- Slice Sand
- Bubble Wrap
- Shredded Game
and More...

Let play & have fun!!!

- Add new games
- Add more squishy ball

comments: The game is incredible. But if all the fidgets were unlocked it could've been better, and for the sounds of the fidgets it was not bad but if they were more realistic I would've given it 5 stars. But I still think u should get this app if u dont have a fidget. I hope my review helps. Thanks for reading.

It's a good game. Nothing special. Alot of options, and while not all of them are fidget toys they're still entertaining. I recommends it, sure it has ads but they don't bother me atleast and there isn't alot of them. I'm sure some could calm down from anxiety or anything else using this game, i mean, everyone is different, but i just use it to pass the time.

I really like this app! Whenever I'm frustrated, Fidgety, or having anxiety I go on my phone to this app. It has alot of different fidgets, And it also has sound and is very satisfying. Although I can't feel it I still love the sound. There's a few negative things though. After almost every time you try to exit out of a fidget it gives you a ad that is at least 15 seconds long. It also is alittle slow when you try to exit out of the app for me. That is my opinion, and why j gave it a 3/5

Honestly, other than the UNHOLY amount of adds, this is a fun game. There are lots of options of fidgets, and its nice to be able to experience the fidgets without having to buy them. Which is nice, because I can't afford fidgets. So if you want to enjoy some fidgets, you should get this game. Just beware, there are TONS of adds

.LOVEE THISS APP. It is an amazing app and everything is free , I know ads are normal for free games but the amount of ads is unbelievable yet I still play it at 3 am but most of the time I need to turn off my internet or be on airplane mode that is more irritating cause you will not receive your messages BUT IT IS AMAZING!!

title: The Superhero League
description:
With great power comes great fun! Defeat deadly enemies with the powers of a super hero. Lift, burn, freeze opponents who try to get in your way. No one will stop you from obtaining justice. Your team of heroes are here to save the day.

Solve challenging puzzles with unique abilities. Each level is carefully designed to maximize your abilities. Uses powers of control, fire, wind, ice, speed and much more! You can become your favorite heroes. Enemies are bringing a gun to a super power fight! They don‚Äôt stand a chance! This is a new type of puzzle experience. The power is in your hands.


 Game Features:

1.        Destroy them all and save the world!
The Super league was formed to save the world. Use your skills, deadly accuracy and precision to keep the bad guys at bay! Whether it is a spy, agent, zombie, lumberjack, alien, or an evil mastermind they are all here to take over the world and only a SUPER can take them down and save the world.

2.        Unlock Epic Missions and new characters
So many enemies and levels for you to solve with your quick wit and big brain. Unlock new characters with new special abilities for a whole new take on new levels. How smart are you? Can you solve all the puzzles? 

3.        New Challenges Await
New levels, new characters, secret missions. There are so many things you can do with The Superhero League. All you need to do is be part of the team.

4.        Engaging Physics Puzzler
Only the smartest and quickest can solve all the puzzles! You will need more than just accuracy to make it through. Speed, timing, cleverness and patience are all things you will need to become the ultimate hero. Can you get three stars on every level?

5.        Hero vs Villain
Are you the best out there? Help the heroes to defeat the villains and save the world! New recruits will be available. It‚Äôs all for you to control.

6.        Wield awesome powers
Do you burn like a Phoenix. Can you manipulate time like the Void? Let it go by freezing enemies. This is the most unique puzzle experience you can play.



Are you ready to join The Superhero League? 
Aim, shoot, help the heroes to defeat the villains and save the world!


Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

From the Studio that brought you Mr. Bullet, Happy Glass, Ink Inc and Love Balls!

Follow us to get news and updates on our other Award Winning titles;
https://lionstudios.cc/
Facebook.com/LionStudios.cc
Instagram.com/LionStudioscc
Twitter.com/LionStudiosCC
Youtube.com/c/LionStudiosCC

comments: Great, ads are rarely, the super hero's are actually PRETTY cool. Not going to lie, my favorite is the guy with telekinesis. I've only failed once so far. Missions are not that rage inducing (for me). And I give it a 5 star. Because I have no complaints what so ever.

Everyone is complaining about ads, but I'm not getting ads at all, but what is annoying is that when i try to get an award or another chapter, it says no video available. What also sucks is that I can only get like 2 characters, which explains the ad problem. Other than that it really isn't a bad game. I would give it 4-5 stars if they fix this problem.

I really did like the game exept for a few things. 1: Cant use any other heroes because it doesnt give me an option too 2: And whenever I want to watch an add to unlock them it say there is no videos available . :3 Keep up the hard work (also if u could fix these issues that would be GREATLY apprieciated) P.S I dont like the ads but there is a reasonabke amount so if u see a review saying that "the adds are to much" or something like that think to yourself its a free game they get profitfromads

Fine game! Though the ads are bogus, I didn't ecoieve to see a very decent game! It's so nice, and gorgeous! I like the first abilities you get, controlling other things and people. It's amusing and actually wonderful for an ad! I hope this game gets circulated around the broad world named as a worthy-time-waster! To lessen these passages, I love this game and it should be famous. Thank you for developing this game!

I downloaded the game, and played through enough levels to decide it'd be worth paying the 2.99 to not have to deal with ads. A couple hours later, though, and it won't open AT ALL. I tried deleting it and redownloading it, and that worked for a bit, but now it's doing it again. Actual game plays more interesting than some other cheap puzzle games out there, but at least the other basic puzzle games FUNCTION.

title: Coin Master
description:
Join your Facebook friends and millions of players around the world in attacks, spins and raids to build your viking village to the top! 

Do you have what it takes to be the next Coin Master? Can you travel through time and magical lands to battle it out to be the best Pirate, Hippie, King, Warrior or VIKING of them of all!

Spin to earn your loot
Spin the wheel to fall on your fortune, be it attack time, loot, shields or raids. Win your loot by landing on coins or gold sacks so you can build strong villages through the game and move up in levels. Win shields to guard your village from other vikings trying to attack you. Become the Coin Master with the strongest village and the most loot!

Attack and Raid fellow vikings!
Earning coins through the slot machine isn't the only way to get loot, you can steal it too! Attack or raid friend and foe to save enough loot to build your village. No need to break the piggy bank! Fight back and come out victorious against your enemies. Boom! Take revenge on those who have attacked your village and take whats rightfully yours! Bring your Coin Dozer and get rich again! You never know what treasures you can find in someone else's village! 

Collect all the Cards!
It's not always about the loot, it's about the treasure too! Collect cards to complete sets and move on to the next village. With every village you conquer your wins will be greater

Play with friends!
Trade your cards with our online community to collect them all! Join our fast growing interactive Facebook community to meet new viking friends, earn big rewards, and trade treasures! 

‚òÖ Battle your way to be the next Coin Master with your friends by your side.
‚òÖ Join in millions of players worldwide!
‚òÖ Coin Master is free on all devices with in-app purchases.

Follow Coin Master on Facebook for exclusive offers and bonuses!

Facebook: www.facebook.com/coinmaster

Are you having problems? 
Please contact us in the game by clicking on the menu > Settings > Support or email us at support@coinmastergame.com

Enjoy a world of fun, thrills and huge rewards right at your fingertips. Be sure your game is up to date so you can truly experience all there is to offer.

comments: I've been playing for a couple of years and love it! I do get frustrated with all the "Buy this" "Buy that" "Invite friends" "Check gifts" pop-ups. Otherwise, it's an enjoyable way to pass time. Maybe a few less pop-ups when the spins run out would help. Also if we could win more coins with our spins it might not seem so hopeless to complete a village. Thanks for a fun game!

A good friend of mines recommended this app, don't get me wrong it's fun, it help kill time if you are waiting somewhere or if your on a break, with that being said, I would give this app 5 stars but, there are issues with the game loading, especially when you sign on and have to wait for the rewards to load or when you attack a village or steal coins, if it decides to load after that, it's a miracle, most of the time I have to restart the app, if this get fixed, 5 stars all day üëãüèº

The game is good and addictive. The parts of the game I don't like. If you trade cards for chests. You have to unclick the cards you want to keep then reclick the one's you want to trade. It would be better if the cards are left unclicked. Leave it up to the player to choose the cards instead of wasting our time also you do not get any advance notice of any gold card events. That's the only time you can trade gold cards. Gold cards that are in a gold card event shouldn't have a limit on them.

Love love this game. But lately it seems I can't get ahead for anything. I know that happens from time to time but this seems to pe a pattern for the last 4 months. The bonus spins always land on the lowest coins, when win anything if at all its the lowest it can possibly be. And the freebies I get in my email have also been usually just low coins or coins and 10 spins. I need spins so please check to see if there is a glitch somewhere. Thanks

I have been playing for just over a month. The game is fun when you have spins. I have very few friends who play. I think you need to have a way to get some more spins easier. Let's look at today because I got some decent spins from the bonus bar, in total I had about 6 billion coins. I bought cards trying to complete some sets. I DID NOT get one new card, and I need about 20 gold cards and 6 white cards to complete sets, to get the spins to make the game fun.

title: Garena Free Fire - 4nniversary
description:
Free Fire is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 49 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in the wild, or become invisible by proning under grass or rifts. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive and answer the call of duty.

[Survival shooter in its original form]
Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for legendary airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.

[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]
Fast and Lite gameplay - Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will you go beyond the call of duty and be the one under the shining lite?

[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]
Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Answer the call of duty and lead your friends to victory and be the last team standing at the apex.

[Clash Squad]
Fast paced 4v4 game mode is now open 24/7! Manage your economy, purchase weapons, and defeat the enemy squad!

[Realistic and smooth graphics]
Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile to help you immortalize your name among the legends. 

[Contact us]
Customer Service: https://ffsupport.garena.com/hc/en-us

It is very good game but It has a problem that when I open this game it say 'NETWORK CONNECTION ERROR' and when I am playing a match after few minutes it says 'connection error' and I released that other online games and app is working perfect on wifi. I have been playing free fire since last 3 year.Please solve this problem. And make sure that it will not come again.

comments: I would give this game a better rating because the game is really awesome and the effects are great. The only reason I gave it a 3 is because of ADS. When you switch from store/home to music list it plays an ad. When you want to continue after you missed one.....plays an ad. The ads are long too. Even if you pass and before it brings you back to the song list, guess what? It plays an ad. Too many ads and it took away from an awesome game.

This is a fun game, but there is a problem. The ads. Too many ads. Want to start the song where you failed? Watch an ad. Don't want to start where you failed? Watch an ad before starting back at the beginning. What would be a 4 star game is a 1 star game because of the constant ads. Some are several MINUTES long, and can't be skipped. I would consider paying to remove the ads if there were more good songs. My suggestion (even though it'll be ignored) is to dial down the ads, and add more songs.

I would give this a 4 stars, if not 3. I find it really fun when you change colors, the elegant songs, and the bass/beat of it. BUT the ads..I'm complaining about this because there are too much ads! Although, I can just put my wifi off, it's hard to cope with. And i find it a bit too easy but i guess i recommend. That's all, thanks.

5/5 great game. I do have some ideas though of what small changes that could leave a big but positive impact. So when you download the app and open it, there should be a (pop-up) that says select language and after that brings up one more (pop-up)that says preferred music and the pop-up shows selections of different genres and you can select them. And if you wanna explore new genres as a user, you can. These are just ideas but feel free to input them.

This is the best game ever it's super fun has good music and it sounds way better with headphones as suggested by the game and there are not much adds and no adds pop up while you are in a game and when you get adds in home screen there are only five seconds. If you want a new character in the game you get it will one short add . It's the best game I have ever played and I suggest it to all the people who love music.

title: Zen Match
description:
You have found your zen! 
.
Don‚Äôt we all need a quiet place to center and calm our minds during the day? 
Playing Zen Match, you can now carry yours around throughout the day. 
.

comments: Fun game. But I'm giving it 3 out of 5 stars because, 1) The ads: some you can't Exit out of and you don't get your coins. 2) To remove the Ads is $5.99 That's greedy. Just because its free to play doesn't mean you have the right to charge that much. I want to buy to remove ads but I'm not paying that much. 3) Your prices for coins etc Are too expensive. 4) FIX THESE THINGS AND YOU'LL HAVE MORE PPL PLAYING. NO NEED TO BE GREEDY.

So was enjoying the game. Its a nice easy, no pressure, after a hard work day. Then an ad pops up, that's ok the developers need to pay bills too...when the ads wants you to play.....which I don't want...watch is ok...not playing. And so I left Zen match and it won't let me LOAD their game anymore....hummm....guess I will choose another game then...

It's Mahjong with an extra step: room decorating. It's not a terrible game. It pretends to be ad free, but around puzzle 10, the ads start and don't stop; an ad after every level. Plus, the game is on a stupid heart system, so if you mess up more than five times, you have to wait half an hour. I understand that mobile game companies want to slow the players down so they don't fly through their game, but that's a lot of wait time, and really, the waiting ruins the experience for the player. 5/10

The game play in the beginning is not like the ad. For reference the ad has a giant board with only 3 spaces to place the pieces. Aside from that this game does not let you collect rewards unless you keep returning to the home menu, as someone who wants play the game seamlessly it is annoying. After 2 levels are completed and you haven't returned to the home menu, instead of allowing you to go to the next level you are forced to the home screen to collect your rewards. Please fix next update.

I love the game itself, but the ads are OVERKILL!! I understand the need for ads, but this is ridiculous. Before/after every level, before you can decorate a room, etc. It kills the Zen this game might create. Also, several of the ads freeze and I have to force-close the app, which is frustrating. I also don't appreciate the game forcing me to stop playing levels to go decorate the rooms, because it also forces yet another ad...

comments: If the game didn't constantly crash on me, I might rate it higher. I was trying to watch an add to get an extra life and it froze and crashed on me. Before this happened, I had 8,200 coins. When I got it opened back up, I only had 7,600. I lost 800 coins because of that crash, and that's not the only time it's happened.

So much fun! Learning lots of trivia. This game keeps you on your toes and brings back lots of good memories! I learn something new everyday! Graphics are great. Nice & colorful! Learning lots about music! Was afraid to pick categories I wasn't sure of, but it's been great learning new things! I love the new Characters that have been added! New ways to earn rewards are being added! I can do this all day. Something new added daily.

This game is fun. It starts out easy and gradually gets tougher. I like the way it gives you options for getting more stuff by watching videos or buying. If you don't like the ads then it's only 3 bucks. I like to challenge myself by not buying anything or watching extra videos for stuff. Not very many ads and I know I didn't buy my answers! I streaked to 79! Lots of fun!

Lots of questions on a wide range of subjects. A really good game to spend your time on. And even if you don't know all the Answers you are still learning. Wha snot to like. Still loving this game. It's my go to if I am bored. Still playing. Enjoying myself. Keeping my brain ticking over and learning while I am at it.Still playing Still enjoying and learning at the same time. üëç If you are feeling bored with nothing to do. Try this game as it's fun and it is good for you..Still loving this game.

I'm enjoying this game. Luckily many of the questions aren't ridiculously hard like some other trivia games I've played. What I've found though after playing this for a month, what it cost to play each question is many times more than you can earn. I keep losing more coins than I earn so I will have to get rid of this game very soon.

comments: Fun game for awhile, despite the number of ads but the main issue that bothers me is how few tracks there actually are. Courses are constantly repeated, so by the time you've gotten so far in, you're bored of the same tracks. As for the ads (which there are a ton of, most you can skip) but you have to watch an add to get things have already seemed to earn, so that's a major disappointment. Fun, but I feel done with it, because it's all the same courses again Amazing graphics, though.

I lilke this game but i stress anytime! In level 61 its hard + 5LIVES. I also upset sometimes for always die and even the easy levels i done is repeated and shuffled. And like the epic level! I also hate ads when i on wifi so i turn it off.. Thanks also for unlimited spin but if it points to (LEVEL), i play level 2 or 1,6,and easy levels, i hate it also.. title: Solar Smash
description:
Solar Smash is a planet destruction simulator, it allows the player to use a variety of different weapons to destroy the planet. These include nuclear missiles, lasers, and asteroids.

Warning
This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.

Space images credits:
NASA's Scientific Visualization Studio
NASA's Goddard Space Flight Center
Space Telescope Science Institute

comments: Overall, this game is a great distraction game. There are 2 modes, system smash and planet smash. Planet smash has a large variety of things to destroy planets with, and you can create your own planets. System smash only has a few weapons, and its like universe sandbox in a way. A few things I would like to see, are a bit more weapons in the system smash, and a bit more realistic things, like if you melt the polar ice caps the world will flood. Once that is done, this is a 5 star game

A fantastic and amazing game. Can't wait to see what other tools you guys come out with. Edit: One of the recent updates made the game not recognize my remove adverts purchase, and it doesn't allow me to make the purchase again. Hope this is fixed some point soon. Solar Smash is still great. Edit edit: Reinstalling seems to have helped. Nevermind.

This game is very good but every 3 times I reset the planet, an Ad comes up. Also, some ideas for the next update; More systems in system smash. Just the one is boring. Try adding more weapons to system smash as well. Maybe a system creator too, just like the one in planet smash. Could you name the weapons as well? Overall, I am rating this game a 4 star.

I love this game. But when i first got it, I paid for no ads. And for a while i had no ads. Now I am getting ads despite paying for no ads. For that reason I am only giving 2 stars. If this issue is fixed, i will give the last 3 stars. I dont like being scammed, even if i like the game.

It's good, but the 1 thing that really annoye me is I have tried getting the Cube World with the orange laser and the grid, but even though I make the best cube. I don't unlock it. So can you guys please fix it! I think other people around the world are suffering from it and are sad and mad. Its a really satisfying game it never gets you bored.

Download now one of the best simulation games of 2017!

Amazing buildings in 3D

title: My Talking Tom 2
description:
From the creators of My Talking Tom comes a new global hit game, My Talking Tom 2!
In this awesome free game, the famous pet cat Tom is going on an amazing life adventure! 

THE COOLEST CAT ON THE BLOCK: Talking Tom is funnier and more lively than ever before! He reacts to everything players do and there are new surprises every day!

EVERYDAY FUN: Players can feed Tom when he‚Äôs hungry, wash him when he‚Äôs dirty, put him to bed when he‚Äôs tired, and take him to the toilet when he‚Äôs‚Ä¶ really got to go! They can watch him grow into a big happy cat!

NEW MINI GAMES: There are brand new mini games to play, including puzzle games, action games, and Tom‚Äôs first-ever multiplayer mini game!

EXPLORING NEW WORLDS: Tom‚Äôs plane can be used to discover exciting new worlds. Players can go flying and bring back amazing treasures and use them to dress Tom up or decorate his house.

TOM‚ÄôS PETS: Yes, Tom has a pet too, and there are four more pets to discover! Each one has its own look and personality. Players can try feeding them to see what happens!

PLAY FOR FREE!

My Talking Tom 2 offers users exclusive monthly subscriptions, allowing access to exclusive additional gameplay features, as optional in-app purchases.

VIP Pack (VIP monthly subscription) - which offers daily packages (750 flight tokens, 2 soaps, 3 foods), an option to resume playing 4x per mini-game and unlimited energy for playing mini-games ‚Äì is priced at 9.99 per month, with the first-month payment discounted -50% ($4.99).

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at the confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews every month unless it is canceled any time before the end of the current subscription period. When you cancel your subscription, the cancellation will apply from the next subscription period onwards. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your Google Play Account settings after purchase. Please note that deleting the app does not result in cancellation of your subscription.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising;
- Links that direct customers to Outfit7‚Äôs websites and other apps;
- Personalization of content to encourage users to play the app again;
- YouTube integration to allow users to watch videos of Outfit7's animated characters;
- The option to make in-app purchases;
- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player‚Äôs progress;
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money.

Please note, we do not process all the data disclosed on the label for users under the age of digital consent. For more information, please check our Privacy Policy.

EEA privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/eea/
US privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/
Rest of the world privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/

descriptionHTML:
From the creators of My Talking Tom comes a new global hit game, My Talking Tom 2!
In this awesome free game, the famous pet cat Tom is going on an amazing life adventure!

THE COOLEST CAT ON THE BLOCK: Talking Tom is funnier and more lively than ever before! He reacts to everything players do and there are new surprises every day!

EVERYDAY FUN: Players can feed Tom when he‚Äôs hungry, wash him when he‚Äôs dirty, put him to bed when he‚Äôs tired, and take him to the toilet when he‚Äôs‚Ä¶ really got to go! They can watch him grow into a big happy cat!

NEW MINI GAMES: There are brand new mini games to play, including puzzle games, action games, and Tom‚Äôs first-ever multiplayer mini game!

EXPLORING NEW WORLDS: Tom‚Äôs plane can be used to discover exciting new worlds. Players can go flying and bring back amazing treasures and use them to dress Tom up or decorate his house.

TOM‚ÄôS PETS: Yes, Tom has a pet too, and there are four more pets to discover! Each one has its own look and personality. Players can try feeding them to see what happens!

PLAY FOR FREE!

My Talking Tom 2 offers users exclusive monthly subscriptions, allowing access to exclusive additional gameplay features, as optional in-app purchases.

VIP Pack (VIP monthly subscription) - which offers daily packages (750 flight tokens, 2 soaps, 3 foods), an option to resume playing 4x per mini-game and unlimited energy for playing mini-games ‚Äì is priced at 9.99 per month, with the first-month payment discounted -50% ($4.99).

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at the confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews every month unless it is canceled any time before the end of the current subscription period. When you cancel your subscription, the cancellation will apply from the next subscription period onwards. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your Google Play Account settings after purchase. Please note that deleting the app does not result in cancellation of your subscription.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising;
- Links that direct customers to Outfit7‚Äôs websites and other apps;
- Personalization of content to encourage users to play the app again;
- YouTube integration to allow users to watch videos of Outfit7's animated characters;
- The option to make in-app purchases;
- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player‚Äôs progress;
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money.

Please note, we do not process all the data disclosed on the label for users under the age of digital consent. For more information, please check our Privacy Policy.

US privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/
Rest of the world privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/
Customer support: support@outfit7.com
