comments: The game freezes in the middle of the game. I had to force my phone to power off. I couldn't get the game to close out. WEIRED. It will play an add for your hint, but freeze right before you get to g collect your hint. I think this is the same reason I deleted the game last time. On a positive note, it has great pics and some really nice colors.

I really do like this app. Unfortunately the ads are starting to get really intrusive. I don't so much mind having an advert before and after doing a picture (even though it sometimes does feel excessive). What I do mind, however, is having a banner advert that plays noise while doing the picture. It is UNBEARABLE. I used to listen to music while playing this app, and I just can't do that now with these adverts. It's really disappointing to have this happen to one of my favourite apps.

This app is great! I use it to fall asleep most nights. Good way to pass the time on trips, but make sure you have your phone plugged in bc this app absolutely tanks battery for some reason. There should be a way to save pictures that you want to color. A heart in the top right of the image that you can click and save to color later. Right now I've been clicking the pic and coloring a few places that way it will save to the In Progress tab and I can finish it later.

Addicted but frustrated! I love it, can't stop "painting" but some have some paint left over and I can't finish it! But the ones are done are beautiful. I'm totally hooked, spend hours while watching (listening!) to the tv or radio, nothing's getting done..... love it!üòÉ WHEN IT OPENS! see edit... EDIT so..... everything went pear-shaped and had to un/reinstall, have to pay to get rid of that annoying banner and now the thing won't launch! What is going on? Not happy üò†

The coloring is addictive! The pics are beautiful with a wide variety to choose from. The only thing I miss after the last update is the button that minimized the pic back to original size. Other than that, I love it? 8/3/2021: I still enjoy coloring in your app! You got the button that brought picture back to original size. My only complaint is the recent pictures you've added. Superheroes, mythical and less characters, new designs and I don't know but I would enjoy a different kind of picture

title: PUBG MOBILE 1.5: IGNITION
description:
The official PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS designed exclusively for mobile. Play free anywhere, anytime. PUBG MOBILE delivers the most intense free-to-play multiplayer action on mobile. Drop in, gear up, and compete. Survive epic 100-player classic battles, payload mode and fast-paced 4v4 team deathmatch and zombie modes. Survival is key and the last one standing wins. When duty calls, fire at will!

FREE ON MOBILE - Powered by the Unreal Engine 4. Play console quality gaming on the go. Delivers jaw-dropping HD graphics and 3D sound. Featuring customizable mobile controls, training modes, and voice chat. Experience the most smooth control and realistic ballistics, weapon behavior on mobile.

MASSIVE BATTLE MAPS - From Erangel to Miramar, Vikendi to Sanhok, compete on these enormous and detailed battlegrounds varying in size, terrain, day/night cycles and dynamic weather ‚Äì from urban city spaces to frozen tundra, to dense jungles, master each battleground's secrets to create your own strategic approach to win. 

DEPTH AND VARIETY ‚Äì From the 100-player classic mode, the exhilarating payload mode to the lightning-fast Arcade and 4v4 Team Deathmatch modes, as well as the intense Zombie modes. There is something for everyone! There is something for everyone. Play Solo, Duo, and in 4-player Squads. Fire your weapon to your heart's content! Be a lone wolf soldier or play with a Clan and answer the duty calls when help is needed! Offers FPS (First-Person Shooter) and TPS (Third-Person Shooter) play, lots of vehicles for all the different terrains in the game and an arsenal of realistic weapons. Find your perfect ride and pieces to cruise towards the final circle! 

ALWAYS GROWING - Daily events & challenges, and monthly updates delivering new gameplay features and modes that keep PUBG MOBILE always growing and expanding. Our powerful and serious anti-cheating mechanisms ensure a fair and balanced gaming environment where everyone plays by the rules.

* Requires a stable internet connection.
* PUBG MOBILE recommended system requirements: Android 5.1.1 or above and at least 2 GB memory. For other devices can try out PUBG MOBILE LITE

Follow us:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/PUBGMobile
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/PUBGMobile/

comments: I have to agree with a lot of other reviews. Would not pay a penny of real money to this game based on thecway you can play over and over and get beat every hand, higher straight, higher flush, higher two pairs. I was at a table where three players went all in and we all had a full house, but mine was the lower than the others. I love to play Texas holdem to pass time but do not see the point to just hit fold all the time. Very disappointed in this one! UNINSTALLED 4 EVER

Absolutely garbage! You only win when you absolutely need to. If you are about to lose a rank it let's you win. If you are doing good then you lose every hand. The only way to make money is by watching the adds. Also I should be able to play in any blind I want without being told I am to rich. A casino isn't gonna check your bank account before you can play a game. Ridiculous.

Sadly this game is full of cheating bots. Set to make sure you need to buy chips. It's definitely rigged to pay. And if you do pay.. you will win.. more than you probably should... kicking serious butt.. feeling like an expert player for a while.. then it wants another payday.. so not only did it switch from stacked in your favor.. to you can't win to save your life. I tested this several times with a few dollars here and there.. And with hundreds of hours. Definitely pay to win. 100%

Game was working yesterday. Today after app updated itself it won't load past initial startup screen. There's poker games that are just as good, if not better, then to waste time waiting for a fix that never should have happened in the first place. The initial add for this app insinuated it was a Strip Poker game. Sounds like false advertising to me. DELETING!!...

Fun game but definitely not fair for the free players. Way to many river catches. Seems cards favor the people who pay for the chips. Let's see how the cards will even get worse for me now... And only got worse after I put up review. They suck you in only to take all your chips you build up for free just to get you to pay money for more chips. Not going to give in.

title: Tangle Master 3D
description:
"Here's the best mind teasing game ever! 
Join 100M+ players mastering tangles and knots! It's a challenging yet super fun brain puzzle with easy to play controls. 

Just sort the ropes in the right order and untangle all on time! 
Remember you also have limited moves to complete the level so focus on its physics and try not get stuck! - well you may, but don't worry we have plenty of boosters to help you along the way :)
Do you like mind games and riddles? Here's the best 3D mind teasing game ever! Join 100M+ players mastering tangles and knots!

It's a challenging yet super fun brain puzzle with easy to play controls. Just sort the ropes in the right order and untangle ropes on time! Remember you also have limited moves to complete the level so focus on matching colors, sort ropes and untie the ropes.

Tangle Master 3D is like a color puzzle, you need to sort and match colors of ropes and pins. If you get stuck, we have plenty of boosters to help you along the way :) You can cut the rope, or explode the locks.

Two ropes is a piece of cake! Tease your brain, relax and enjoy the game :)
Three ropes makes you a game master, a 3D Tangle Master! No knots can hold you back!
Four ropes "quadruples" your fun! Wow you are a genius!

Are you ready for a master challenge? Come and enjoy this puzzle game! Hundreds of uniques levels, customized features and special weekend tournaments!

comments: Too many ads. Most require 5-15 seconds before you can get out (30 seconds if you want a bonus-these are fine since I know what I'm choosing) of them, then tap to leave the main ad to see the secondary ad for the same app, forced to wait 5 seconds before finally tapping the X to escape it. Some ads won't even give you the option to escape in trade for losing the bonus without closing this app. Not worth my time or energy. Got other interesting apps to play without this much annoyance. Delete.

This is awful! You can't do two taps on anything without an ad coming up. And it's those 30seconds ads that you can't close. I was expecting to spend 5 minutes with an easy, relaxing logic game. Instead, I got 4.5 minutes of ads for 30 seconds of game time. Stupid!

The concept of the game is kinda cool but the ads are just too much. In the first 7 games, I watched 8 ads. Then it seemed like it was going to chill a bit, but 2 levels later and it's again, one ad per level. Then they offer you extra coins by doing guess what?! Watching an ad. Now I get you want to get paid for your ingenuity and hard work. So hit us every 5 levels with an ad. Then MAYBE I'd want to watch another ad to get more coins. As it stands, I'm about to hit ‚ùå DELETE.

Was really enjoying this game but then after getting to the higher levels I realized it's just like the same 10 puzzles over n over. How boring is that? I don't want to keep playing now. Why can't they figure out more puzzles instead of being lazy n just repeating the same few over n over? Also after playing for a bit of time it gets buggy and then eventually will crash. The amount of ads is so ridiculous, but I know how to get around those without having to watch them thankfully.

Very neat game. The ads I understand and tolerate. The worst ads are the ones from googleads - they won't let you back to the game after hitting the X - it just keeps going back to the googleads page and back to the ad with the X, I've had to quit the game, clear the pages, then go back to home screen to restart. GRRRR! I don't mind the ads after each level, but I've come so close to passing a 20 second challenge when googleads bumps in at 5 seconds to go. Really? That sucks! Two stars.

comments: Becoming a VIP is Great, you receive Free Shipping! And Trust me, It's worth it. This game is just like the Claw games, we used to have when growing up but now, you get to sit down and enjoy playing it right from your home instead of at the stores. Already have claimed a few prizes and I'm currently waiting for 3 additional plushes that have been claimed today. Can't wait to get them and play some more!

Terrible Game. Forget ever playing this with your children it will leave them in tears. They have the claws loose most of the time and even if you have it in the claws firmly it will mysteriously loosen right before it drops. It used to be good but no more, waste of money. I'm looking for another one to play.

I am so fed up. Been trying to reach support via email for 12 hours without any response. I bought coins and was charged, but never given the coins. I can't play without coins. And I am not going to buy more until this is resolved. Multiple emails with all required information and documentation and I still can not get help after 12 hours. Not going to change prior review. Why would I want to promote or trust this app? It's one bad experience after another.

This game was fun at 1st enjoyed playing with my kids at my side. We have won a few prizes and are waiting for them wich we are excited about :) I just think some of the values of the coins are not consistent. Felt ripped off a few times. Wish we could win more 60$ in coins go fast when the only games you win are for beginners and cost 1,000¬© and at 4,000 for 20$ come one

So i love claw machines and this game has been so fun! Ive only managed to win 2 prizes so far but will continue to save up to win more. My only concerns are lack of response from their customer service email... Im still waiting for my prizes to be shipped to me, as well as that i had one of the machines mslfunction on me which has really annoyed me as its taken me days to save up coins for this toy! Ive been trying to win it for a while now. I am hoping Clawee will rectify this issue!

description:
Craft your dream home, everything is possible on this pro 3d version.
Explore this world and start living your dreams and imagination.
Each day is a new challenge.
Build a simple house or craft your dream castle, it's all in your hands.

Enjoy a beautiful 3D game graphics.
Simple and intuitive user interface.
Start your exploration today.
Fly or walk across the unlimited lands.
Your choice and the options are unlimited.

Game Features:

comments: The ads man, i understand the company makes money through ads, but this is ridiculous. I can't play the game for at least 5-3 seconds and then an ad comes on. I really love that this game is like minecraft and that you don't have to pay for it like the minecraft app (thank you for that) but for now, i will uninstall the game, because i cannot play a game that comes straight at me with ad EVERY 3-4 SECONDS. I see potential in this and i would definitely reccomend this to my friend.

I would definitely give this game a higher review but there is just one really bad thing about it. The ads. I understand that a company needs to make money off ads, and that's fine, but they are just so frequent, and once, I was swimming and a 10 second ad came in. By the time that the ad was over, I had drowned and I lost all of my progress. This is an awful feature so please change it. Other than that, it is a really fun and calming game. By far the best free minecraft I've ever played though.

It won't even let me play. I get into the game and only play for like 20 seconds, then it plays ads that send me AWAY from the game!! It seemed like a good game at first, a good Minecraft substitution, but the ads are just too much. Put them on the bottom of the screen or have a pop up as every so often, that would be fine, but it is literally stopping me from playing the game, so I'll never know if it was capable or not.

Okay, When I first downloaded this game I was not so sure about it. I thought it would be a cheap boring glitchy game. But, after playing it just once, I found its actually like minecraft. You are able to get skins, play in creative or survival, Play with friends, chat and have fun. It's really good and I'd reccomend to someone that cant download the real minecraft. 5 star rating definitely!!!!

This game is so much fun, I've been playing for 30 mins so far, and it is the best of the best. I thought it would be like a Walmart version of Mincraft but it's much more, the only problem is that you get ads about every 15 mins so that not that fun, but the game is so nice.

comments: The art is beautiful and satisfying to finish colouring, but the mechanic of colouring in itself is a bit wonky. Happy Color does it better. And I've noticed that when you're done with a picture and want to download it to your phone (I personally wanted to use the deer with the fruit and flower filled antlers as my lock screen), it cuts off part of the picture. I feel cheated out of the hard work I put into it when it refuses to let me see the whole picture and auto-crops. Kind of unfair.

I've been using this coloring app for almost 3 years now and I still love it, but my only issues I have now is I can't do pictures already started, off line and thats a big issue for me. Not everyone is able to have constant service or have wifi. I can do one but if I went back to do another one I have in progress, it won't let me. And my purchased pictures I feel like I should be able to do off line as well. But I still plan on using the app, just sucks I can't do anything offline anymore.

I really liked for the first hour then the ads started in full force. Suddenly theres an ad before and after every picture even if I go out of my way to avoid the must-watch-an-ad-to-unlock ones. Speaking of those more often not it acts like you never watched an ad and makes you watch another to unlock. I thought the music ones were cool until midway through plays an audio ad full blast without warning. Basically there are several ad free options out there. Its not unique enough to act this way.

Fantastic variety of beautiful pictures with more added daily. Helped with relaxation & eye/hand coordination. I always enjoyed losing myself for hours colouring but had to put it aside for other responsibilities. This app has been a great distraction while unable to get pencils & books out with young grandchild running around. I think it definitely got me through the pandemic & emotional turmoil of the past year. Thanks to all the talented artists & PBN; so glad I found you.

I love this game! It lets me choose different animal pics and other categories! I also saw some mandalas that are in my coloring books that are in this app too! I recommend it for people who want to color, but can't color in the tiny details on adult coloring books.

recentChanges:
- Ultra Unlock Part 1: Time will take place from July 23 at 10:00 a.m. to August 3 at 8:00 p.m. local time. During this event, Pok√©mon from various eras will be appearing more often.
- Address Book Import: Soon, you‚Äôll be able to add friends from your contact list.
- In-app support is now located at the top of the Settings menu.

comments: Every single element of the game can be sped up with money, and a large portion of the event-based content requires payment. This is normally not a big deal, but over time these events have given fewer and fewer benefits. PvP rewards were cut in half in a stealth update, Stardust has become almost unobtainable outside of events, and reducing the range of pokestops and gyms was just stupid. If there's something they can capitalize on, they will, to their entire playerbases' detriment.

I've been playing on and off since 2016 and the increased distance during covid brought me back to the game because it was so much more accessible. Now, with the distance radius decreased again (when the pandemic ISNT EVEN OVER) it makes it so much less accessible for most players and those with disabilities are now less likely to be able to play. Increase the radius and KEEP IT THERE, Niantic!!!

Latest update absolutely sucks! Loading time is easily 1-5 minutes to even see pokemon show up (even with wifi on). The change to the pokestop distance is ridiculous. I played for a little in 2016 and stopped when it got lame until 2020. When I picked it back up it was awesome! They really need to look at what they're doing to their players vs their own pockets. Guess I'll be deleting it again. It's no longer fun or worth the hassle.

The new update to distance is sad. I'm upset. The change to the distance you have to be to a gym or pokestop is upsetting. Now to reach anything you have to be on top of it to even use it. A lot of these stops are in churches, parks, areas that are closed at hours some of us get to play. Even the one by my home is now terrible. Please change it back. I have kiddos that already have trouble with neurotypical people, this is an outlet for them and its gone. Too many people to be at one stop.

Have played this game intermittently since it first came out. The game has come a long way in terms of improvement, but the latest updates have seriously reduced the quality of gameplay. Distances to swipe stops and gyms has been significantly reduced. This means I spend less time catching and walking, because there is only a short zone where I can actually swipe a stop. I'm not going to walk backwards or cross a busy road just to swipe out two pokeballs. Thanks but no, time to call it quits.

title: Egg, Inc.
description:
In the near future, the secrets of the universe will be unlocked in the chicken egg. You have decided to get in on the gold rush and sell as many eggs as you can. 

Hatch chickens, build hen houses, hire drivers, commission research, launch space expeditions(!) to build the most advanced egg farm in the world.

An incremental (clicker) game at its core, Egg, Inc. uses many elements from simulation games that give it a unique feel and play style. Instead of menus, you are presented with crisp and colorful 3D graphics and a delightful simulation of a swarm of chickens. In addition to choosing your investments wisely you must also balance your resources to ensure a smooth running and efficient egg farm.

There is something for everyone here:
Casual players love Egg Inc's laid back feel and beautiful appearance. Take your time to build a wonderful egg farm and explore all the content.

More experienced incremental (clicker) players will love the emergent gameplay and depth afforded by the different play styles needed throughout the game. To reach the ultimate goal of having a ginormous egg farm with an astronomical value, you will need to balance strategies throughout many prestiges to make best use of your time.

Features
- Simple, Casual gameplay with opportunities to challenge yourself
- Chicken swarm!
- Dozens of research items
- Hundreds of challenges
- Many different hen houses and shipping vehicles
- A "Nested" (pun intended) Prestige system has the game always feeling new
- Late game depth with cooperative play, deck building mechanics, and even space exploration!
- Wonderful 3d graphics with pixel perfect UI and shadows
- Google Play Games Achievements & Leaderboards!

comments: Very fun. Addictive. The main con of this game is it will eat your battery like a fat kid on cake. Other than that I am very satisfied with the game. I have also had an issue watching ads for free stuff. Perhaps because I always use a VPN, I'm not able to access that method of getting stuff, it would be great if I could watch videos even though they won't be personalized to me.

Played this game for YEARS without spending a dime. It was fun to a point. Eventually broke down and put the $10 down for the extras. That unlocked a new phase of playability. This combined with saving up my piggy bank to several million before breaking into it, and only spending golden eggs when the item is "on sale" has me playing for more years to come.

Good time waster. You're literally just creating chickens for eggs or upgrading your farm for more of same. But the music and graphics are nice for a time waster. Definitely need to make the buildings unclickable so they don't open menus when catching drones. Also please increase font size! Even for a phone app the descriptions are way too small. Make popups for everything if you have to!

One of the best idle games I've played. There's a good balance of idle and active play. You really don't need to spend money on this game to have fun but it does help speed your progress along. And the ad that brought me to this game actually showed the product. That's a hard thing ro come by these days. All in all, awesome.

Please make some kind of "no ads" pack. It's the only thing I am willing to buy. Attempting to tap drones and accidentally bringing up building menus is driving me insane. Make a toggle that turns off the newspapers. That being said, I literally can't believe how much I'm enjoying the game.

title: Merge Battle 3D
description:
Merge your troops to win battles!
Can you get to level 100?

Start small and grow stronger by merging your soldiers. Are you ready to win epic battles and become a champion? Challenge yourself to level up in this free to play game that is filled with action and adventure! You won't be able to stop once you start playing it.

Enjoy this brand new action game! Swipe, merge, tap and fight to win. It's your turn to merge and create the ultimate soldiers!

Tons of epic battles and fun levels are waiting for you in this free to play casual game. Swipe, merge, tap and fight to make your way to victory.  Simple, easy and fun, but also full of challenges, action and adventure!

Play now to become the ultimate Merge Battle 3D champion! Merge your troops now!

comments: Timers flow nicely. Plenty of free boosts to get you going. Wonderful moderators who seem to really care about the game. If you do not want to spend money you do not have to but I recommend dropping 20-30 dollars out of pure respect for a job well done. Great community and a great mobile game. Highly recommended. Try server 205 or 280 to find me. Happy gaming.

A very addictive game. I love it! Its a perfect game for the genre its going for, and I can't mention how addictive it is. The only problem I have is the player settings arent obvious. You have to tap your battle score at the top and it takes you to your stats and player settings. A gear would be better, but other than that, the game is perfect. I hope pvp doesn't become an issue for me, since I am a pve player and hate conflicts with others. Perhaps more week long invincibility shields for us?

I absolutely adore this game! There are no ads, ever, and no money is required! However! You can gain a lot of awesome stuff for very little cash spent. Also, in an alliance, if an ally buys something from the cash shop, everyone in the alliance is given gifts as well (at no charge to purchaser). These can range from pretty average to very, very nice. This game has many players from around the world, and also a tap to translate feature next to messages in other languages! ANTS RULE!

So far the game is engaging and seeing the different ant types is interesting. Im still in the beginner portion of the game with about 6 hours or so of gameplay completed. End game may be completely different, but if you're used to time based resource and building mechanics, give this game a try. Gorgeous graphics combined with realistic ant types and correct identification lead this to be an engaging time.

Ok, this is actually surprisingly good. While times do start to pick up, if you focus on keeping your alliance building maxed, it can chew some of the time down. Also there are a lot of chances for things such as free diamonds and time skips. So while some stuff takes awhile. You get enough stuff to chew down on it that it isn't all that bad. Really love it, really fun.

title: PK XD - Explore and Play with your Friends!
description:
Welcome to PK XD!

Do you want to explore this universe and join millions of people around the world?! Join us and reach a new level of fun!

TALK WITH FRIENDS
This world is yours! In addition to exploring and facing challenges, you can try different activities: relax on the floats, eat ice cream, jump really high with the power up, dance and have fun with your community!

ADOPT PETS
Your experience is even more complete with a virtual pet! From common to rare, find lots of cute creatures to accompany you in the game. Take good care of them and see how much they can evolve by your side!

CREATE YOUR AVATAR
Your character, your rules! You can be anything you want, use your imagination to combine all available items: monster slippers, futuristic boots, amazing wings, ninja swords, cat mask, fashionista clothes and much more.

PARTICIPATE IN EVENTS
We always plan very special moments for you to enjoy! Take part in our events like Halloween, Easter and Christmas, with amazing decorations around the Island, challenges and themed items!

BUILD YOUR DREAM HOME
Decorate the perfect house, however you like. The only limit is your imagination! Take a peek at the items you can find: Cloud Sofa, Dance Mat, Soft Mats, Player Chair, Kitchen Items, Bathroom Items, and more!

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS WITH MINIGAMES
Play the funniest minigames with your friends. How about participating in a Crazy Run, breaking the record at the Pet Parade or delivering pizzas to earn coins? Enter Arcade and win all challenges!

BE PART OF OUR COMMUNITY
Build the game with us! We want to hear everyone's suggestions so that we can offer the best experiences.

Stay on top of news: @pkxd.universe

comments: I would give it 5 but it has a lot of glitches in it. I play this with my grand daughters and we have a ball together but like right now the ads are not working and this isn't the first time and there are times we can't transport to each other. There are other things they could do but I really think they have done and are continuing to do a great job. Thanks guys!!

Very nice game for children! Its definitely kid friendly. There is a chat but, it doesn't allow anyone to create their own words. You can search for words like "Hi"! Or, maybe "wanna take a walk"? Also, you can make your avatar and, make your username. It won't let you make your username inappropriate, so that's good! Great app. So many updates, ALL THE TIME!

It's almost everything it says but not everything you have to get pets separately it takes a day to get one pet so I wouldn't recommend it because you can do pretty much anything you in real life so I rate this a three star actually a four it's a really fun app I recommend it get it it's kind of like Roblox you get to build your own house but you don't need to collect surprise but you have to collect coins to unlock the house items like furniture and stuff but if you want a different house it üí∞

I am playing pkxd from 2 yr . And i loved it but nowadays a very annoying issue is there. The issue is that whenever i open pkxd it loads and plays music but didn't show the screen and this is not a network issue also. I am very much irritated by this now and if the team will not solve this soon then unfortunately ,i will need to uninstall it .

The concept and the game itself is really fun. But IMHO, things are needed to fix/improve: (1) the unending mini games' bugs/glitches; (2) lacking of real social interaction with people; (3) very few places to explore; and (4) goals aren't established enough which makes it to be repetitive and boring. Also, I'm really hopeful that the houses being sold by real money come to be purchasable over time by game currencies, even if it's expensive. At least there's a chance and we'll save up for it.

comments: I started liking the game when I first got it but now I don't like it Because there is too many ads. They appear in the middle of a round which sucks Also, when we're given a topic, like police for example I dress as a police officer but my opponent dresses like she's going to the beach, that's not the topic but my opponent wins anyway Not fair I don't like it and just get rid of the ads it's so simple then I'd give it a 4 or something. GET RID OF THE ADS

This game is fun but how am I supposed to enjoy it when I'm being spammed with ad's around every 45 seconds. I know that ad's make the game free but there is no need for this many. the one star is for the concept of the game. I do not recommend you would just be wasting your time watching ad's.

I actually like the game, I honestly wouldn't even mind the ads if they were in between levels. But an ad pops up in the middle of the levels and it's so beyond frustrating. The levels are less then thirty seconds long, the ads are longer then the levels themselves. Honestly as much as I enjoy the game and its concept, it's not worth it.

Add hungry and boring. They make you watch 2+ adds every time you do a catwalk. It's so annoying to have to stop half way through the walk to watch an add. Also when you unlock new clothing they make you watch an add to use it. It's just a lie. Wether or not you watch the add you get the new clothing. Sadly the game is also boring. Each catwalk has obvious right and wrong options and your opponent is always stupid and will choose to wear a bikini to a wedding.

This game is really fun to play and has good graphics and good outfits but some of the outfits are kinda stereotypical, like the maid outfit has two low bunches, the white frilly head band and the dress has puffy sleeves and is black and white. I would give this 5‚≠ê but this game can be stereotypical. But overall I like this game.

title: State.io - Conquer the World in the Strategy Game
description:
Play our epic strategy game and conquer the whole alternative world! Command your troops and capture all the states!
This cell battle game will challenge your logic and reaction.

State io is an abstract real time strategy, a tactical clash of dots, an exciting countries takeover.
Fight against armies solving strategic puzzles to beat your rivals and expand your superiority in the world arena. Lead your army to the victory in the epic battle game. Be a winner in this war strategy!
Conquer countries and territories, block and destroy your opponents' towers, attack lands of enemies and defend your borders. Be smart and brave in this tactical and logic cell conquest! Each of your actions will have consequences ‚Äì be a true strategist in attacks and defense.

This war simulator demands tactics, not power. You are to use your brain, not muscles. Become a hero, solving this tactical dot puzzles! You will definitely have a lot of fun struggling on different maps we have added specially for you.
Be on top enjoying our free RTS either online or offline, playing 1v1 on first levels and versus more competitors on further levels.

Ready to complete this great conquest and make your domination story?! Then download the game to begin your strategic expansion.
Think strategically and react quickly conquering states and territories in the epic clash game!


*The game is designed for entertainment purposes only. Any similarities to the real world and geopolitical situation are coincidental.*

comments: Game is simple and fun, and the difficulty is gradual. Too many ads. $10 to get rid of them is not worth it. I'd pay $2 or $3 at most. Game gets dull once you reach the peak. The strategy is to just increase you earnings while away, open it up once or twice a day, and then get improve your stats. Which I like that there's passive income, but it's better to not even play and then just get passive money. Needs to get spiced up. Add a priestiege system, multiple start locations, and new things.

Ads are obnoxious, but playing in airplane mode stops that. It doesn't seem like the developers are still working on it because the game just cycles through the stages over and over again with zero variation. Troop spawn rate caps at 30/sec, but let's you keep upgrading it. Game is only difficult during the first time playing. The game generates money when you don't play, and the rate you gain is also upgradeable. Fun to play once in awhile, but don't forget to turn on airplane mode.

Some reviewers say this game has too many ads and is too easy. IMO, they're not playing it correctly. If you accept all of the reward multipliers and continuously upgrade, then yes... the game will be too easy and you will watch LOTS of ads. But the genius aspect to this game is that its difficulty level is TOTALLY UNDER YOUR CONTROL. Update ONLY when you can longer win. Then, update SLOWLY, and stop when you can just barely win. The game will be much more fun, and you'll watch far fewer ads.

This game is very easy to learn and can kill a little time, although there's too many ads if you have wifi on, and you can't unlock cosmetics with no wifi. Another issue is that the AI is very lazily designed and easy to beat despite it getting more upgrades than you. The AI factions always start by sending off all of their units to colonize neutral states or attack each other, leaving their starting states vulnerable to the player. Very low skill game and takes a while to get hard.

Ugh.many things wrong. First, "no thanks" to watching add for prize or extra gold..really does mean no thanks. But this game will force you to watch an add anyhow. Second, the adds are incredibly long. Not even worth trying to watch. Next, even in airplane mode the adds still play... don't need that extra stuff saved into my device. Then, it won't let you rate the game unless it's five stars.. have to come to playstore manually. Last, game play is too easy. Need to make AIs a bit smarter.

Jams in parking lots, challenging parking situations, angry grannies and much more. Experience one of the best parking board games, get rewarded and unlock skins, solve puzzles which get harder each level, choose which car to move so you can find smooth exits without hitting anything and anyone, build up properties, rent them and get "idle money" from them, complete levels without getting stuck, and more! Just make sure you don‚Äôt mess with Grandma...

In this funny and colorful game, you challenge your logic skills, critical thinking, and timing precision.

I understand why the ad but when your stuck watching more ads than getting to play the game it get old fast. I keep it for about a week, and progressed well but had to watch ad after ad, so much that I am now done with it. Thanks for the week of fun, no thanks for all the ads and wasted time

Fun game to pass the time, I like how there's not an insane amount of ads. It's a good amount for not having to buy the game.

title: Candy Crack
description:
Download Candy Crack for free now!

Candy Crack is a addictive funny puzzle game. In this game, you just need to click the adjacent candies of the same color to eliminate them all. Try it now and you will love this game very soon!

Blasting-Directional elimination, where to eliminate and revitalize the whole situation!

Color change-magic props, meticulous layout, maximize score!

Flip the grid props to make your situation clearer!

HOW TO PLAY
- Click the adjacent squares of the same color to eliminate them all.
- The higher the number of eliminations each time, the higher the score.
- Break the record and watch combos.
- 3 useful tools are there to help.
- Reach the target score or collect stars to enter the next level.

FEATURES
- This android app is totally FREE.
- Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master.
- There are elaborate game sound effects and music which make you feel good.
- Mouth-watering new graphics, Candy Crack looks even tastier!

comments: It was okay at first, but the closer my amount reached $1,000.00 the ads became very excessive,I mean in the most ridiculous way possible. I think I've wasted time playing this game, because my current amount is $980.32 and it will not go past that. When I reached 980.32,i ended up playing maybe 6 or 7 more boards, i lost track and it's still at the same amount. Lol.

FAKE money making game. You have to get $1000 before cash out, once you get to around $700 the cash slows down so you can't get to the $1000 very quickly. To cash out for an Amazon gift card, you have to get 50,000,000 coins. I am uninstalling this game. I gave it a 1 star, but if I could, I would give it a negative 10 star at the least.

I made this piss poor company a bunch of money yesterday watching 1 of the same 3 ads every 15 seconds. This was extremely annoying but I thought if it worked it was worth it. Early this morning I had just over $700 and over 3 million in coins (you need 5 million to get a $50 Amazon card). This morning it was all gone. I was still on a higher level but at zero on everything. Don't make money for these thieves. Developers should be ashamed. Not worth 1 ‚≠ê and I wish there was a way to report them.

I downloaded this but after reading the reviews I see it's just like the others! You play and play, it freezes at the top dollar before you get paid and you never get paid! I dont think I'll waste my time on here to even try the game when you have a million ads before you can play to never win! Naw, I'll pass! Thanks for the reviews folks. Keep it up!

If I could give this 0 stars I absolutely would. Me, being a skeptic to player views because a lot of times it's people being too whiny about things, decided to try it myself. I read a lot about the getting stuck at 980 and getting no cash so I wanted to see. I made it to 650 before I lost patience. There is an ad literally every 15 seconds of game play, sometimes more! Oh, and don't bother hitting no thanks to double your earnings by watching an ad, they play the ad anyways. Garbage game.

Challenge yourself to connect letters and find as many hidden words as you can! Unlock stunning landscape backgrounds to escape from home and relax your brain.

comments: Do you like ads? This is the game for you! An ad every other level, each ad approx. 1.5 minutes. Each level at the beginning takes 20-30 seconds, so for the first 20 hours, you spend more time watching ads than playing the game. Lock your phone and then unlock to keep playing? Watch an ad! Leave the app to do anything else and the come back? Watch an ad!

PLEASE TAKE OFF THE SOUND ON THE ADS. Nothing is more jarring and unappealing than playing a SILENT game only to have an AD come on BLASTING MUSIC. I don't mind the ads, but PLEASE take off the ones with sound or listen to the options players put in for no music and sound and apply that to the ads, as well. It's coming close to me just having to stop playing and get rid of the ads; I would hate to do that because I like the game.

This game goes on and off for me: 1). There's always unskippable ads when going from level to level. 2). It is quite, QUITE difficult to build up coins in this game. Unless you're cool with spending hours watching ads to build up coins, you'll be receiving a lot less than what you spend. I played through 16 levels to get a measly 25 coins. Keep in mind, the cheapest boost (or in this case hint) is 100 coins. Make that make sense.

They say this kind of game is good for BRAIN health. That might be true but it's exceptionally bad for my MENTAL health spending more time enduring ads than playing! Yes, I know I can pay instead but price is too high for such simplicity. On level 40 now but deleting - not worth the annoying ads for me. Thanks anyway. (Hint to app owner: longer intervals of play before ads might keep customers).

The ads in this game are relentless. I opted to pay to get rid of ads. The explanations regarding purchases are sadly lacking. You can pay to empty the piggy bank once it gets full, but you'll only have to pay again later. Don't bother. The game doesn't always recognize words. In the last game I played, I entered the word ROD multiple times, but it wasn't recognized. I finally resorted to using hints when I could not solve the word. The game filled in the missing word ROD.

War of Rafts: Crazy Sea Battle is an epic battle royale in the sea setting! Battles with other players around the world await you!

Sail the sea searching for your raft parts, expand your territory and team to defeat ‚Äòem all! Choose a color, fortify your raft with other pieces floating in the ocean and face your opponents head-on!

You can make your team bigger by picking up a stickman from the lifebuoys, and they‚Äôll become a part of your army! The bigger your crew, the better your chances to survive in the sea battle!

comments: It would be more challenging to actually play against other players. Not computers labeled player 6789. I followed these other "players" around. No growth or them really collecting many items. Very boring. I know that means you'll have to place ads at different times and not in the middle of play. I'm deleting the game.

Decent fun so long as you play with your data/wifi off so no ads ever appear, but there's no long-term reason to continue playing and it made my battery heat up so I'm going to uninstall. Also, surprised that a 200 hp 400 attack mega-raft will instantly die if it triggers fights with two separate one-tile 10/10 rafts at the same time.

Its an Okay game one of those mindless time consumer ones. The Huge problem is how insanely inundated it is with ads. You know instead of ads every battle you could let a guy finish the round before an ad. I believe developers are being paid by how many times they can get you in the store, downloading another. I delete something before replacing it, ((you got me here) yeah). It is an okay game if you enjoy watching ads. I'm sorry its time 4 me 2 find another one minus at least 80% of ADS

Everything you want from that ad you see when you play other games of the islands attacking other islands except this isn't multiplayer or at least it really doesn't feel like it there's a lot of ads so unless you pay for removal if you're not going to enjoy it really sad because this is the kind of game you want to see because it's the kind of game that would be fun just to play for hours because it's mindlessly fun
Great start to this, meaning I see potential. I see other players but I have already collected my rafts and guys, they haven't so if I attack I win. I am very interested to see where this goes.

comments: It's a unique and pretty cute concept, and very fun in my opinion. There are a reasonable amount of ads, unlike most 3D games from big companies. I also like how the bots you play against aren't unreasonably stupid like other games with challenge bots coded in, unless they aren't bots...? I do wish that you could buy more skins and trails using the currency rather than having to watch ads though.
Way to many ads. After every single level it asks if you want to watch or lose it. If you press lose it, it will still bring you to another ad regardless if you say no. So irritating.
too many adds and the levels are too short. longer more diverse levels and and you can keep the advert after each one. one or the other needs to be addressed.

Well made, but it's just not fun. In between every level theres 2 chances to watch an ad for extra rewards and even when you say no you get an ad anyway. The levels are so short and easy you'll literally spend more time trying to dodge ads than actually playing the game, and the game isn't fun enough to be worth it. And I get you can turn airplane mode on but that doesnt make it more fun, it just takes less time to realize how unfun it is.

I've earned the unicorn and the Harley Quinn skins through progression but it won't allow me to claim them! It's not fair when you win those and you can't even claim them!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! And the ads are ridiculous millions of people will not play this because of the ads after every single level not to mention the levels are 5 seconds long. I'm done with this game!!!

The game is a fun concept, but it can be cheesed easily. Of course, the worst part, and the main part of this review; Advertising galore. I get that the devs need the ad revenue, but this amount of ads is purely for profit. The worst part? A new update made it so you can't play it offline. This game doesn't have ANY online functionality, and yet I have to be connected to the Internet. Unbelievable. Thanks for reading! :)

Good idea, terrible execution. It's not very fun, considering it's single-player, plus, whenever I jump off to get ahead, all of a sudden two bots come out from behind me. VOODOO, I love your games (even if they lie about being multiplayer) but, come on. At least try to make the experience feel challenging.

title: Project Makeover

Give desperately needed makeovers to help people achieve their dreams! Choose highly fashionable clothes, hairstyles, makeup, and even furniture! Deal with dramatic characters like egotistical fashion icons, scheming assistants, or stubborn clients in dire need of a new wardrobe. Play challenging fashion-themed puzzles to help find that perfect look! And don't forget to customize your own signature style with your avatar!

CHOOSE from lots of fashionable clothes to create the perfect look!

MAKEOVER helpless clients and give them the confidence to follow their dreams!

DECORATE a person's room as well as their appearance!

DRAMA is everywhere, be ready to meet some extreme personalities!

comments: It can be fun but some levels seem rigged so you CAN'T win unless you spend money. When you're fortunate enough to get unlimited games for a designated amount of time you HAVE TO PLAY IT IMMEDIATELY or forfeit the time. THAT'S UNFAIR. If you want to play a quick game or two but win a hour, you should be able to leave the screen and come back a play when you're ready. THAT leads me to the last most egregious point...WHY CAN'T WE JUST LEAVE THE SCREEN? WHAT IF THERE'S AN EMERGENCY? FIX THAT!!!

Enjoyed it very much at the start, and they "hook" you by making the game pretty easy but as you progress through the levels they make it practically impossible to win without buying extra boosters etc. Also you don't have the option of watching an advert instead so if you want to advance you have to purchase booster packs. I love the imagery and graphics however.

I was pretty addicted to this game for a while, but the difficulty curve ramps way too hard- it reaches a point where you have to use power ups to beat levels (which of course are content you can pay for) but even with power ups the levels can often feel exceedingly difficult. I'd recommend finding a way to make all levels beatable, but add a star rating or something for those that want to go above and beyond.

This game will become a pathetic waste of time if you don't spend a ton of money after the first "Makeover." Next, get you very close to winning in the higher levels, but It's strategically impossible to finish a puzzle w/o, once again, money. I am a software engineer and know exactly how these algorithms work. Run away and run fast. These developers are selfish. Over all, I'm disgusted.

Wish I had read the reviews they were all spot on! It gets too difficult to play little puzzles you need to actually do any makeovers. I already have two of the candy crush games either be a design game or be a match up game. Its exhausting and frustrating trying to get anywhere in this game. Definitely not what it advertises. Unistalled after a few hours. Moving on

title: Snowball.io
description:
The most addictive game with the simplest control ever.
Make a snowball bigger and bump it to opponents to flick them off the play field. 
You can make one giant snowball or a  number of small balls... and you can bump it directly to the opponent or snipe them with it... it is totally up to you.

How to control: swipe to the direction you want to move, and lift your finger to shoot the snowball.

comments: I love it but would like that if you keep losing below 6 or 7th place, the ranks of the bots get lower. I got to a point where for a while I couldnt beat any bot at all. It was so angering. I get that people could easily use this to win quicker with lower ranks of bots, but you could make the rank of the bots lower only a little bit each time or when you win once or twice it jumps back up close to normal rankwise. Just a suggestion. Also make the bots aim for you less! Turn off wifi for ads ppl.

It's a pretty good game, its creative and fun. But the only issues are that there are bots and glitches. In about the first 3 seconds of a match some how someone already has a snowball about 4 times the size of yours. When a bot hits you with a snowball, 2 more bots hit you with huge snowballs when you try to get back on the land and then you always end up losing. And theres only a few glitches, one of them being able to fall through the map. Get rid of the bots and it's a 5 star.
The game in itself is good, but sometimes when I get knocked off bound, I fall forever and have to delete and reinstall the game over and over again. It has glitches. fix them!!!

This is a fun game to do when your board,I love it!! But the reason I gave it 3 stars is because sometimes it glitches by putting me in 2nd place when I won. And also there it's lots of adds, but other than that, it's an amazing game...I hope this review was helpful!!üòäüòäüòä

I really enjoy this app, really. But I have a request that I was hoping u could do that'll make rate this 5 star. Could you make it an online game instead? I'd like to challenge real ppl instead of bots. So pizza make it online????? it'd be more fun :)))

title: Matchington Mansion
description:
Do you have a knack for home decor & matching puzzles? Match pillows for a house makeover in this fun match-3 adventure!

Download Matchington Mansions for Fun, Exciting Gameplay:
Match pillows & decorate your grand mansion ‚Äì incredible boosters & power-up combos!
Piece together hidden objects, interact with in-game characters & reveal the hidden story
Unlock hidden areas ‚Äì dozens of rooms & thousands of DIY decorations!

Hone your interior design skills and protect your new house from a mischievous cousin. Follow the adventure story, unlock new rooms and discover hidden secrets ‚Äì all with a cast of quirky characters in tow. You can even spy on your neighbors and see how their design choices stack up. Are you ready to navigate this challenging match-3 puzzle?

Decorate your mansion and deck out your garden in style. 
Unlock hidden areas & makeover each room with interesting decor. 
Puzzle out the adventure story, aided by your friend Tiffany, quirky characters and a house cat or pet dog along for the ride! 

Matchington Mansion is FREE TO PLAY, with optional in-game items for purchase. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings.

I am now playing on a team, my only complaint is that the ads for mind puzzle games do not have a star in the corner to get back to playing. I won't try to get more moves that way. I have to reboot to get back to the game.

Before you download this entertaining match 3 game, be aware that it can be pretty frustrating. Obviously, the difficulty level will increase as you climb through the levels. But it becomes a real pain when you're blowing through your lives and collected rewards just to hit a metaphorical brick wall. However, if you really enjoy never-ending challenging games and have plenty of time and money to burn, I recommend Matchington Mansion.

This game is so entertaining, it has easily and consistently been able to keep me coming back at least 4 times per day, 5 days per week (honestly, it's rare for a day to pass without me playing). The levels steadily increase in difficulty, however, there hasn't been a level difficult to the point of giving up because of the frustration of inability to pass. The storyline is interestingly intricate in it's development and depth, yet easy to follow or play without having to know it. Awesome üòé

title: Wordscapes Search
description:
üíïWould you like to relax, exercise your brain, and expand your vocabulary-all at the same time? With  Wordscapes Search , the NEWEST game from the makers of Wordscapes, you can! These incredibly addicting word search puzzles are brain blasting fun! üíï

Connect letters to find every word on the board and sail through thousands of classic puzzle levels set against stunning nature backgrounds. Training your brain has never been easier ‚Äîor more relaxing. Once you start playing, you just won't be able to put it down!

FEATURES
‚û§Escape and train your brain by visiting the beautiful destinations of  Wordscapes Search !
‚û§CHALLENGE your brain and vocabulary 
‚û§LOTS OF LEVELS. Play 1000‚Äôs of puzzle board levels- with more coming soon
‚û§EARN POWER-UPS. Use boosters to find words when you get stuck
‚û§ COLLECT BONUS POINTS. Find extra words to earn rewards
‚û§ Think you can find every word? These word search puzzles are easy at the start, but get challenging fast!

WHY PLAY?
Calling all brainiacs, quiz whizzes, puzzle pros, and crossword fiends! If you like to relax and unwind with a crossword puzzle, trivia and quiz games, board games, scrabble, or solitaire ‚Äîyou‚Äôll love Wordscapes Search! It‚Äôs easy at first, but gets challenging fast. Can you beat the game? Start playing and find out!

 Wordscapes Search  is a modern twist on classic word search puzzles, combining the best features of crossword, scrabble style, word find, and word connect puzzle games. This BRAND NEW word game is proudly brought to you by PeopleFun, the makers of Wordscapes. Join the PeopleFun family and connect with us!

A bit of trivia‚Ä¶.
Quick quiz! How many words are in the English language? Answer: about 170,000 in current use. And how many words are in the average person‚Äôs vocabulary? Answer: between 20 and 30 thousand. Is your vocabulary above average? Start training your brain and become a word search brainiac: download  Wordscapes Search  and start your word puzzle adventure today! With 1000‚Äôs of puzzle board levels you‚Äôll never be bored!

comments: I would give it 5 stars if there wasn't so many ads. Most of the advertisements pop up after every puzzle and they are about 15 seconds or longer and the X in the corner is very small so typically when you go to click the ex, it takes you to the app store. But the game itself is very nice. The graphics are good and the puzzles are fun. You can rotate the puzzle to see the words better which is nice. I would recommend but chill out on the advertisements... (they ask for money to fix ads)

First few levels are fun. Once you get past level 10, the ads take longer than the levels do. There is literally a 30 second ad before each new level. And then after the 30 second ad, you have to wait for the screen to clear which is another 10 to 15 seconds. Uninstalled after just 1 day.

Had to reinstall after getting a new phone. Now, I can't play in the tournament. There is no access button. Have contacted support several times. The only thing they tell me is that tournaments start at 5 pm on Friday (I know) and that you must be on at least level 65. I'm on level 82. I wish support would get this fixed UPDATE: I have contacted the in app support and still no fix. You ruined a good game

Good game. Lots of fun levels. But there's an ad after each level which is really annoying if you finish the levels quickly and then have to watch an ad each time. Wish good games didnt have so many ads. Maybe an ad like every 5 or 10 minutes? But after every level is just too much. Just buy a big word search book. Will cost you less than paying for a game and no ads after you finish a page.

I liked this game. But the f- mystery word in a lot of levels makes it complicated. Especially if you got literally no clue what the word could be, and you don't have enough gold to buy a little booster.

make more elements!btw,making people fat is not a element dummy,elements are like dimonds,jades,emaralds,saphires,gold silver,copper,metal,acid,water,snow,black holes,lighting,fire,ice,lava,grass,wind,air.you uncultured swine!

title: Kick the Buddy
description:
Kick buddy arrives on Google Play

Explode, destroy, fire, shoot, smash, freeze, toss, send the power of the Gods and don't even think about stopping. You now have a virtually limitless arsenal to beat: rockets, grenades, automatic rifles, and even a nuclear bomb!

We present to you Kick the Buddy ‚Äî it‚Äôs more than just a relaxing game it‚Äôs more than stress game. It‚Äôs a top interactive action game. Among all stress relief games, Kick Buddy is a relaxing game where you can slap the doll and forget about your anger. It's a fun game to play when bored.

Do you want to beat the boss, or maybe slap and bash the ragdoll?
Want to smash all around you in this destroying game?
Want more kicks?

Even if you're a relatively stress-free person you need to chill out at some point in stress games like ours.

Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make the game better. Please leave us some feedback if you love what we do and feel free to suggest any improvements.
comments: Adds with every click. Some ads you have to hit three to four times before it is over. Some ads never give you an option to close it out, and I have to close the entire app. My last ad complaint is that they want you to turn the volume up to listen to the Buddy. However all their ads have the volume set at double the level which is incredibly annoying. Simply said, they just have major advertisement issues with this free game. I'm being generous with two stars

Absolutely would give this game 5 stars if it wasn't for these 2 reasons: 1. The amount of ads. Everytime you kill buddy you get an ad which is meant to be a choice ad, but forces you to watch it. 2. It's meant to be an offline game but you can't even buy stuff from the shop with bucks if you don't have internet. Fix these 2 things and I'll play it all day and night.

If you can put up with immediate ads then you might like this game. I recommend it. But this is only a 4 star as goggle games can't connect to the game... Every time I go on it says failed to connect please try again. And I do but I says it again and again. This means for me that I can't restore progress and other utilities. Please fix this and thanks for listening.

I love your game. But there are 3 things you need to know about your game: 1 is the lag it takes forever to load, idk if that's my tablet or your game. My device isn't laggy when I'm not on the app so I think it's the app. 2 is the ads. There are ads like every 10 seconds and it just gets on my nerves. And yes, I know what the ads are for. But your game has a little too many ads in it. And 3, I think there are a little much things that cost $$$. Please fix these and I will rate the game 5 stars.

I love this game! Its really funny and entiertaning! Also, very stress reliving, and a great time passer when I'm board the only thing is that sometimes, the game will freeze and kick me out when I'm either trying to play the game and enjoy it, or when I'm watching ads to get new free wepons, and too many ads, but other than that, the game is amazing!

summary: Tap to slice!
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: Its a fun time killer but a lot of issues. The ads are crazy and you can't even turn off your internet, its required to play. I bought the ad remover, and still get ads, including to revive. What was the point of no ads if I still get them?? There's options of knifes to buy, but they all act the same?? They just look different. The levels are all the same too, just repeating. More stages with extra challenges would be fun. I think a lot of improvement could be made, but its just a cash grab.

It's an amazing game, but the ads are annoying. If you buy a knife and then go out of the game, don't worry it will show after a couple rounds. So after the new update everytime that you go back into the app you have to agree that you are over sixteen (witch is stupid because there is nothing inappropriate or anything like that) and other stuff. At least the knife thing is fixed. It was a five stars and now it's two

I used to really love playing this game, it was very relaxing and enjoyable. But, it has begun to annoy me which is why my original 5 stars have turned to 2 stars: the new update has caused the game to not work without WiFi meaning you can't enjoy the relaxing side to the game without ads popping up every 10 seconds, the games seem to be so much shorter than they were before and the wheel at the end doesn't give you a chance to get x50, it's just by luck! Super dissapointed by the changes made!

Nice to kill time but the ads are constant and actually freeze the game and cause you to fail at times. Edit: Added a star because there have been updates made. The mechanics and points system still need a lot of work, but there is potential. As a suggestion, make some kind of combo system, and make some objects more points than others.

The game was great however, it doesn't let me play offline to get away from the annoying ads, pls. reduce the ads, because sometimes they won't load and loose my progress of playing a level. Also pls. add something more new since they're repetitive. I don't want to delete it but it doesn't feel playable anymore.

title: Jigsaw Puzzles - Puzzle Games
description:
Get an engaging jigsaw puzzle experience with one of the world‚Äôs most-downloaded puzzle games from a top developer! Jigsaw Puzzles is an addictive, easy to play game with over 13,000 FREE cute HD pictures. No points, no gimmicks, and no missing pieces, simply enjoy hours of fun putting puzzles together to calm down and relax.

Created by game experts and played by millions of puzzle lovers worldwide, Jigsaw Puzzles helps you exercise your short-term memory and concentration, while passing the time with real puzzles and without taking up as much room.

Indulge yourself and plunge into the wonderful jigsaw world! Enjoy piecing new bright magic jigsaw puzzles together every day!

Our puzzle game for adults includes a large number of beautiful free images of different difficulty levels from easy to hard. The game difficulty is based on the number of puzzle pieces, which should be put together.

If you are excited about solving real jigsaw puzzles, you will definitely love our app as well!

Jigsaw puzzle on your device is as challenging as real one! In addition the jigsaw app is portable, doesn't result into any pieces being lost and encompasses a wide range of puzzle games. All these features make the jigsaw app as attractive as real jigsaw puzzles.

Being a stress relieving and relaxing game, daily jigsaw puzzles for adults will help you to take a break and get rid of the everyday routine.

Discover the colorful world of jigsaw puzzles for free:

¬∑ Tons of free beautiful, high quality pictures. Choose from a variety of categories such as Colors, Flowers, Nature, Animals, Art, Landmarks, Hard Puzzles and others
¬∑ Daily free puzzle. Get a new HD jigsaw puzzle every day and try to solve it
¬∑ Mystery puzzles. Challenge yourself to reveal what is hidden in a picture
¬∑ Daily updated gallery. You‚Äôll never run out of free puzzles in our jigsaw box
¬∑ Helpful hints. Use Hint to match the next piece to the puzzle if you are stuck
¬∑ From 36 to 400 puzzle pieces. The more pieces, the harder your adult jigsaw puzzle game becomes
¬∑ Rotation mode. Turn on rotation, make the game more tricky!
¬∑ Custom backgrounds. Choose your favorite appearance to solve free jigsaw puzzle games with more pleasure.

Make every day relaxing and entertaining putting puzzle pieces together! Enjoy our free puzzle games!

Get ready for the upcoming events:

comments: Reminds me of the puzzles we used to do when we were growing up. We always received as gifts so this brings back a lot of memories. Beautiful pictures and wide assortment. Unfortunately my phone gets noticeably hot when playing. Phone temp returns to normal soon after ending play. I've also experienced pieces getting "lost" and the only way to "find" them is by using the hint button or starting over from the beginning. No big deal just unsure if these annoyances can be fixed.

The puzzle pics are are nice and the UI is easy to use. BUT.. there are some MAJOR issues with the app.. if you for any reason need to leave a puzzle unsolved or the app freezes (which happens at least twenty times a day), the app cannot continue the pics in progress. It shows the percentage, but all pieces are in place and only way to try to solve the pic is to remove all pieces and start from scratch. There should be an update coming to make the app more stable. Maybe a way to store the pics in progress offline and continue them. Or linking to a social media account to save the information.

There are lots of bright & colorful puzzles to choose from. You can also chose the number of pieces you want your puzzle to have. From as little as 24 PCs to over 200+ PCs. Depending on your age &/or preference. I also liked the fact that the puzzle itself was dividend up into four sections, automatically. Each section is done separately. The puzzle pieces are easy to scroll through and chose from. I liked the way the pieces "clicked" when properly placed together. Super fun!

I used to love this puzzle game until they started the word connect ads!! I don't mind ads, I realize that is how we can play for free. But WORD CONNECT POS ad doesn't let you back into the game unless you download the word connect game. For the live of all that is holy just get rid of that one ad!! All the rest are fine.

It's frustrating and disappointing that I can't place pieces in little groups around the puzzle when sorting by color or by picture object. I end up with a mess of pieces on top of what I'm working on. Otherwise this is great. I've been doing the 144 piece ones so I don't have to zoom and scroll. Works well.

title: High Heels!
description:
"Get ready for the best high heels game EVER! This shoe game is fun, this runway is epic, this shoe race is for baddies! The taller your heels are, the easier it will be to escape from the walls. A different obstacle awaits you at each parkour! There are rails on the roof where you have to spread your legs and slide, walls to jump, a stick to balance and a huge podium waiting for you at the end of the road.

Don‚Äôt forget! You need to pick as many as high heels on the road so you can walk on the final podium! Walking on the heels will make you feel like a QUEEN! Everyone loves to look perfect and these heels will let you shine like a star! There are many different shoe options in the game! Shiny heels, colorful heels, boot heels, rainbow heels, and even heels with wings! So just put them on and POP OFF! As you should like a queen‚Ä¶

MAKEOVER YOUR CHARACTER! You'll feel like a designer in this shoe race. Among the dozens of different accessories you can buy in the store, there are buckles, necklaces, puppies in a bag, angel wings. And most importantly, you can find designer heels with very different models and colors to suit your style!

You can get many fancy accessories to take your stylish shoe game to the next level! A full makeover! You can get fancy bags, angel heels, bracelets, devil & angel crowns, and even a rabbit tail! You‚Äôll love them all and we bet you will not take them off ever again!

This is your red carpet! Make your best walk and drive the crowd CRAZY!

comments: Although it is a very good game to play, there are a few problems. 1. The game does lag a lot(like many mobile games), and when it does, I usually miss something, such as a heel or a diamond. 2. Some levels don't even have enough heels to even finish the level, maybe check on that. Overall, it's a pretty good game to play when bored, and although there are ads after every level, they don't play in the middle of the level, like SOME games do. Took away two stars for the problems I have.

DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME game glitches and you lose ALL THE TIME takes to long to load and you spend more time waiting for it so you can play than you actually do playing! It doesn't have a negative rating or I'd give it a negative number!

Everytime when you join the game after a day it just freezes my screen but I can hear the music and everytime when I tap the screen when it froze I always die and then when I press Retry it freezes and there are way too many ads that make my phone crash! I am never playing this game EVER!! Just great, its becomes reslly laggy and most of the times it freezes or you can"t move, just great -_-

Watched more ads than actually played the game!! Watched an ad to get 3 more gold keys to open the chest/box and I don't get them, watched another ad to get what I'm owed, still no gold keys, thinking I'm going to play the game then I have to watch another ad now to claim diamonds when I don't want any, then another diamond ad straight after the last one before I can play the game finally!!!! 4 ads one after the other at 30s per ad, sorry but uninstalling it now.

Only download this if you really want to. Don't highly recommend, just recommend a little. Creators, maybe as the levels gone on, make them more challenging. Even on level 53, it is really really easy and I like apps that get more challenging as the levels go. An example of 'one of these apps' and be Line colour (what I think it is called). Plus, pls don't use adds for everything like X3 gems or to get characters (not the Queen ones) and unlock permanent heels. It just wastes your time on gems!

title: Helicopter Escape 3D
description:
üöÅ Get ready for some brutal shooting action! üöÅ

Rain down fiery vengeance üî• from above in this fast-paced third-person helicopter shooter where you‚Äôre on a mission to rescue the hostage from hordes of zombies, gangsters, henchmen, and enemy combatants. 

Keep your eyes peeled and your wits about you, and don‚Äôt stop shooting till she leaps to safety in this easy-to-play all-action game where only the fastest and the deadliest ü™ñ survive. Hyper-brutal, hyper-entertaining helicopter mayhem that will keep you coming back for more time after time.

üÜò RESCUE ME! 

‚òÖ Help the hostage üßé‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èescape by gunning down the endless stream of pursuers behind her. Use explosives and other in-game objects to take out multiple enemies or rely on fancy shooting to eliminate as many bad guys as you can. Hurl down destruction on the enemy, but just make sure you don‚Äôt hit the hostage by mistake.

‚òÖ When the going gets tough, the tough go slow-mo. When zombies are breathing down the neck of the hapless hostage at critical moments in the game, time slows down to help you cope. Take your time, smash your enemies, and rescue the hostage!

‚òÖ Varied and exciting gameplay action: levels alternate between rooftop zombie pursuits and building attacks with multiple armed enemies attempting to take you down. Only the sharpest shooters will survive, so watch your angles and get blasting to destroy floor after floor of bad guys.

‚òÖ There‚Äôs a whole exciting range of enemies to destroy, and some of them even shoot back, so shield up before your start to make sure you can survive and save the hostage.

‚òÖ Complete levels to upgrade your guns, outfit, and helicopter, and advance through the districts of the city to reach awesome boss levels with extra rewards. Try out pistols, shotguns, assault rifles, SMGs, and even rocket launchers to find the gun that helps you put an end to most zombies ü§¢.

‚òÖ Extra-special crazy levels offer a riotous alternative to regular gameplay, with guns that shoot cats, sheep, paint, and a whole heap of other weird and wonderful options to brighten up your play.

‚òÖ Cool graphics, exotic settings, a tension-building soundtrack, and stylish camera angles give the game an exciting, cinematic feel. Keep the enemy hordes at bay and watch the hostage leap to the safety of your helicopter in beautifully satisfying slow motion.

üí£ WHIRLING BLADES AND BLAZING GUNS üí£

 Download Helicopter Escape 3D now and revel in endlessly entertaining 3D shooter pandemonium that‚Äôs guaranteed to dispel boredom and brighten up your day!

comments: The big problems happens in the biweekly events. When the aliens are in the ski lodge setting, the graphics go crazy. The trees and hills block the view of the lodges. U can not see anything to shoot at but bullets are hitting the hero out of no where. Otherwise I love the game. Please keep the aliens out of ski lodges.

It starts out okay but as you play the enemy shots faster than you can. Weapons are stupid, seriously, a lever action rifle when you need a high speed gattling gun? The other problem is it switches to 3D view, which slows everything down and ruins your aim. By the time it switches back to shoot mode, you're dead. Dump the 3D, its a waste. The only way around this problem is to buy shields at 2.99 for 30, which you will burn through quickly. Clearly, this is money pit. Game over for me.

Uninstalled after playing for 1 min, ridiculous amount of ads, the game play lasted less than 10 seconds, I am forced to watch already two ads before I was even returned to the score page. I realized that the game is just a pure ads bait, designed to force you through as many ads as possible before you uninstall, the developer probably already knows that uninstall is inevitable for anyone who downloaded this game, so might as well force as many ads as possible before the inevitable uninstall.

It's not a bad game to play it's just that you always stuck shooting all these bandits in the house I want to shoot some of those green guys and the girl jumping off of the building and grasping on to the helicopter that's more exciting you guys think you can make a game just like that instead of being stuck on shooting these bandits in the housesü§î

So far it's pretty fun. The music is worth it alone. There are ads that I've seen but the music makes the wait not so hard. Just started playing, I'll update if I find anything. DEVELOPERS. LOVE THE MUSIC GUYS. Great Job.

title: Royal Match
description:
WELCOME TO THE BRAND-NEW ADVENTURE! SWIPE COLORS, SOLVE PUZZLES, DECORATE THE CASTLE, AND EARN COINS. Royal Castle is filled with thousands of fun and challenging match 3 puzzles! Connect 3 or more color items in order to clear the board and beat the puzzle! Royal Match is free to play and with tons of fun! Play now!

In the Royal Match, King Robert needs your help to decorate Royal Castle with great taste. So, in between completing match 3 levels, don‚Äôt rush for another fantastic episode, but visit the King‚Äôs castle! Receive coins for completing rooms in the Royal Castle, build home with a style, get bonuses and extra boosters to continue your saga!

We have lots of sweet puzzles to enjoy! Each new episode comes with free coins, unique awards, surprising tasks, wonderful areas and uber cool matches!

Jump into the next level match 3 gameplay through marvelous graphics and amazing puzzles:

- An unique match 3 gameplay and fun levels for both masters and new match 3 players!
- Collect loads of coins and special treasures in bonus levels!
- Blast powerful boosters waiting for you to unlock them!
- Be careful about the set of obstacles on the road such as birds, boxes, potions, cupboards, diamonds, magic hats, coin safes, mysterious mailbox, and piggy!
- Open amazing chests to win magnificent rewards such as coins, boosters, power-ups!
- Explore the new rooms, royal chambers, splendid gardens, and many more exciting areas in King Robert‚Äôs home!
- Decorate the areas, including the King‚Äôs room, kitchen, garden, garage, and many other amazing rooms!
- Challenge your friends on Facebook and reach the top of the leaderboards!

Explode obstacles and build amazing power-ups to beat joyful and challenging levels! Keep unlocking wonderful areas by playing fun match 3 levels! Come along now and join the fun!

Bingo: It is 100% ad free and no wifi needed - internet free .

Start swap for the endless fun.

Need some help? Visit our support page in the Royal Match app or send us a message at contact@dreamgames.com.
