comments: It's another "Gardenscape" knockoff, but you have no choices, so it doesn't feel like it's your design. The art is cute, vibrant colors, but my biggest problem is the fraudulent ads for this game. If they showed the real game play it would be a 4* game. And if they actually made the game in the ads, it would have been a 5*+ game. Right now, it's just a lie.

this game is great. love the graphics and the color combinations. so lively and colourful! the only thing i wished the game allowed was the option to gain extra moves by watching ads as an initial one-time chance per game, instead of 900+ coins right off the bat. but other than that, i'm enjoying it! also, i liked the one-on-one chat support for issues built right in the game. i had the opportunity to use that function today and they responded promptly. kudos to the devs for this game! üëç

I was enjoying this game until I hit the 150 levels. Those levels are unwinnable. I have played level 157 so many times that I couldn't even begin to count. I don't have any in game money left so I can't add 5 more turns to the level. Not that 5 more turns would help anyway. And I refuse to spend real money to help me get through these levels. When you read all the other reviews telling you that you cannot win the levels, believe them! This game is no longer fun. I am going to delete it.

Royal Match is great choice if you like matching games.You can join a team and get lives from your team mates which comes in handy when you're on one of the many hard levels. I would have given the game a 5 star rating but the one that thing that really irks me is you have to work really hard to overcome the aforementioned hard levels and your reward is a pittance, like between 35 and 50 coins compared to what you have to spend, 900 coins or more to get an additional 5 lives.

Game is good. When you reach levels higher than 500 the levels become impossible without power ups and then you must use everything to get past it. Used at least 75 lives, used every power up, now I have none. I am not paying for extra anything. This became frustrating so I have uninstalled the game. Thank you it was fun until it wasn't.

Use your brain and steal the items and treasures you want, playing for fun. A smile will appear on your lips every time you pass a level. Each level is a different puzzle, your task is to get the item you want to steal.
Various puzzles and difficult tests will challenge your mind.
Train your logic, memory, intelligence, problem-solving skills, and creativity.
Think you‚Äôre smart enough to solve all these tricky puzzles?

Hey, I saw some inprovement in the ads today! Some of the levels are a bit easy but I don't blame the creators, you can't make a hard puzzle everyday. Great game!
The is quite soo easy game to play!! And i love it.. i give 4 star because.. only one problem that i dont really like it.. the ADS.. toooo much ads.. btw i have complete all levels!

title: Homescapes
description:
Welcome to Homescapes, the most heartwarming game from Playrix's Scapes‚Ñ¢ series! Solve match-3 puzzles to restore a wonderful mansion on a verdant street. Exciting adventures start at the doorstep!

Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home!
 
The game features:

‚óè Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!
‚óè Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.
‚óè Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!
‚óè A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!
‚óè Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.
‚óè A cute pet: meet –∞ naughty and fluffy cat.
‚óè Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house!
 
Give the old mansion a complete makeover! Show off your designer skills by furnishing and decorating the kitchen, hall, orangery, and other house areas, including the garage! Thousands of design options will give you maximum freedom to explore your creativity, change designs any time you want, and eventually create your dream house!

Homescapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.
 
Enjoying Homescapes? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/homescapes/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/homescapes_mobile/
 
Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to homescapes@playrix.com

comments: Initially, I enjoyed the game but as time progress and with new updates, the levels are getting impossible, where you'll be stuck on a level for DAYS!! This was a very relaxing game for me but now its just frustrating, and not to mention you can't enjoy any event becuz you'll be stuck on a level, thus, unable to complete the goals. And if you were to watch the gameplay of any levels, you would notice that the number of moves of each level has been significantly cut down. What for? Disappointing!

I used to quite enjoy wasting time (and de-stressing) playing this game but they have completely wrecked it by reducing the number of moves in the hard stages (e.g. used to be 24, now 13) that makes them almost impossible to achieve as you have to wait for that lucky game when all the stars align and you get out. No skill. I've been stuck on one level for almost a week now and have given up. Any recommendations on a replacement de-stresser would be appreciated (and I was SO close to level 5000).

I love this game. Let me rephrase, I USED TO love this game! Lately it seems like every other level is a "Super Hard" level & I end up stuck for a week or more to finally have to spend money to get unstuck only to be stuck again 3 or 4 levels later. ü§Ø I have spent much more than I care to admit playing this game I am done if something doesn't change quickly. I am taking a break when Dance Season is finished bc I bought the Golden Ticket. Which is useless since I can't pass levels! Disappointed

Super addictive, but Evil rotten greedy game, literally impossible to advance without spending money. They have cut the number of moves you have to work with by HALF recently so you don't stand a chance (Youtube videos from 6 months ago prove it). Also, I don't care about cleaning up the house and all the animations of it, stupid pointless annoying waste of time. Frustrating. I understand games needing to make money, but it shouldn't be required to pass a level.

#Changedmy5starsto3 Love this game but over time it has become a bit frustrating. Pieces moving in the opposite direction of which you swipe. It happens constantly and usually as you're about win or make a major play. ü§îLevels have gotten way too difficult. Nothing wrong with a challenge but let's not forget this is still supposed to be fun!!

title: Family Farm Adventure
description:
Family Farm Adventure is an exciting game of exploration and farming! 

Pack your bags and roll up your sleeves. Start your journey in Family Farm Adventure!

Family Farm Adventure features:
- Explorations. Explore a mysterious wild tropical island with the fearless photographer Felicia and archaeologist Toby on their quest to solve every puzzle.
- Decorations. Decorate your flower farm! Restore the houses, decorations, and centerpieces that are essential for the Festival of Flowers. Celebrate this event with everyone.
- Farming. Farm on a tropical island. Harvest crops, raise animals, and prepare food.
- Adventures. Complete challenging quests and take part in the adventures of Felicia as she travels through mysterious islands.
- People and Animals. Meet friendly and unique people, as well as quirky wild animals.
- Treasures. Collect rare sets of treasures and ancient artifacts, then trade them to get rich.

Enjoying Family Farm Adventure? Join our Facebook Fan Page: https://www.facebook.com/FamilyFarmAdventure

comments: I've been playing this for a couple months and really like the game. But I've also seen how quite quickly the developers have gotten greedy making energy tougher to get and things use more energy so you need to buy items. Extra materials needed are very rare. The ads in the game work sporadically so extras that way are also rare. Per the forums on Facebook, I'm not the only one that feels this way. I'm going to delete this one.

I like the game. But u should of listened to the reviews before downloading it. U am lv. 14 now. The biggest issue is the energy. I log on with full energy and collect the energy in my farm get a total of 103 energy. It is about 5 minutes of play time that is silly. I am not happy with that. The cost of clearing is completely ridiculous. I can't imagine what it's like at higher levels. I understand why it this way, is so we spend the money we work our butts of for. I am considering on leaving.

I enjoy the game play and the story line, but it takes forever to build up enough energy to complete anything. Yes, there lots of ways to get energy, but you don't get enough when it costs too much energy to clear things. And I can leave my game all night and barely build up any energy because of the energy limit. Also, they want you to buy every little thing and it doesn't last long, or too hard to complete things to earn rewards I paid for because not enough energy.

Storyline, graphics, and gameplay are great. However, I don't think I have ever seen a game pushing so many microtransactions and ad-viewing in my face. They aren't even good deals (if they were, I'd actually be tempted). You can't spend hours at a tube because your energy depletes, but I don't mind checking in a few times a day.

I love this game, BUT some items take over an hour to make and are needed for ALOT of the orders, therefore, you are stuck or forced to pay alot. I have paid some. Developers, can't you modify the game some to keep us playing? I don't want to lose interest but this is the point of games I usually find myself leaving games because it take sooo long to progress. I am certain others feel the same. Consider the player/payers. Otherwise, great game so far. Almost level 20!

comments: I downloaded this game out of sheer frustration at the ads that are posted on YouTube, they never show the puzzle being finished. The game is fine, the lil stickers are cute, the game is fairly easy and a good game to download if you're just looking to waste some time. The main drawback is there are too many ads to enjoy the app as a way to de-stress; but hey, I get it, we're all out here tryin to make money so its whatever.

The game itself is pretty decent. It's not super hard, but enough to get your brain to work a bit. The problem is there are so many ads making it so you finish one maybe two stickers then get an ad. Theres an ad every 20-30 seconds of playtime. Many of the ads are hard to skip or have disappearing skip and x buttons. I understand apps gotta make money somehow but this makes the app basically unplayable without purchasing the ad free version.

i don't see any ads in this game.(because i changed to "director mode" from settings.)but reason,why i rated this 3 stars bc... i downloaded this game from youtube ad,and in that ad,while folding the paper,it made sounds like. FREE TO PLAY ON MOBILE

Console quality HD gaming on your phone with customizable controls, voice and text chat, and thrilling 3D graphics and sound. Experience the thrill of the world‚Äôs most beloved shooter game, now on your phone for easy on-the-go fun.

BELOVED GAME MODES AND MAPS

Play iconic multiplayer maps from Call of Duty¬Æ: Black Ops and Call of Duty¬Æ: Modern Warfare¬Æ, available for the first time for free. Or squad up with friends in a brand new 100-person battle royale survival map. Join the fun with millions of players from all around world!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR UNIQUE LOADOUT

As you play CALL OF DUTY¬Æ: MOBILE you will unlock and earn dozens of famous characters, weapons, outfits, scorestreaks and pieces of gear that can be used to customize your loadouts. Bring these loadouts into battle in Battle Royale and thrilling PvP multiplayers modes like Team Deathmatch, Frontline, Free For All, Search and Destroy, Domination, Hardpoint and many more.

comments: The game when it works is great. I can only play the game super early in the morning or late at night. During the day every single game I join I can play for around 30 seconds and the game freezes up. I reboot cod rejoin the game and freezes up again. Garbage. I'm pretty sure these issues are mostly on Android phones. Everyone I know that plays this game has an iPhone and they have no issues

This is my third time writing a review for this game and this time it'll be good. I love what y'all did with the meta it just seems balanced, but I do still hate the fact that most crates are a gamble and how the spins are also a huge gamble. In my opinion how they do things with items in Cold War and Warzone is probably a decently better thing. I'm not saying make everything $20 but just make things a bundle. I also know that there is bundles, other then that this game is pretty good.

It's not good for free player . I am playing this game from February 2020 , I have played approx 7k BR matches . The worst part of game is Lucky draws and CP . There is no other way to earn CP , we have to purchase it and I am a student , how can I get money . I also want some good things not all but atleast one . But overall a great game if it weren't for that.

The lag is now ridiculous, the same network, the same phone but this version is leagues behind the previous in terms of smooth game play It is a big problem. I play cod so One star till further notice

title: Galaxy Attack: Alien Shooter
description:
Earth's last hope is in your hands, take control of the lone spaceship and protect Earth from alien swarms. Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the Universe from its evil enemies. In this space shooting game, you will be facing an increasingly large number of enemies in hazardous environments. As the game progresses, you will earn the right to upgrade your spacecraft to unleash its full lethal capacity.

HOW TO PLAY:
* Touch screen to move and kill all enemies.
* Collect items to upgrade or change your weapons.

FEATURES:
* Multiplayer mode: 1 vs 1, 1 vs 3
* High quality images optimized for tablets and large screens.
* Ability to use active skills during the space battles.
* The game is packed with 160+ levels on various difficulties.
* Beautiful levels with immersive missions to complete. 
* Multiple extreme boss battles. 
* Upgrade your guns and lasers.

Enjoy classic space combat - powered up. Download Galaxy Attack: Alien Shooter now!
Follow us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/GalaxyAttack
Join Group with us
https://www.facebook.com/groups/GalaxyAttackAlienShooter

comments: Fun game concept but terrible execution. Riddled with bugs leading to lost progress all the time, and recently hit several times by hackers. I've been locked out of my account for close to 10 days now, separately events progress was lost. Right now it's really not worth your time and effort. Very disappointed, submitted feedback via the app and on Facebook multiple times in the past, was always ignored. ---- They fixed my account after much complaining. Game got more stable lately. 1 to 3 stars.

Love the game, but for some reason, the latest update(34.9) is not available in my playstore. I can't do pvp without it. I have tried all the obvious fixes. I emailed the developers, they responded and said it's fixed. It's not, nothing changed. I assume they're done, and so am I. Uninstalled. 8/13- reinstalled, still no updates available. As much as I like the game, I may soon have to change my rating. It seems as though customer support has given up.

Gameplay is OK. But might get boring in a few days (maybe i have overgrown such games). Too much cluttered. Too many buttons on the home screen and any other screen. Whatever u want, there is an ad for it and multiple ads. And u can just earn all the currency by watching all the ads. No need to even play the game (pun intended). i actually enjoyed playing this game as 'Instant Play' for more than a year. This was my default 'Go To' game to pass some time. It did not have so many buttons and options. once i installed it, i unistalled it in a week. It would have been better if the interface was not so cluttered with so many buttons / gifts. Maybe the developer could move the buttons away from the home screen into some other 'Single Button'

The controls are finicky, and if for any reason you lose the save data, either by factory reset or you get a new device, any purchases and/or progress is permanently lost. Doesn't matter if you signed into google play games. Doesn't matter if you diligently hit that save button at the end of each session. When you download the app and sign in again you will have nothing. Support does nothing to help either. Update: 3 years later and the ability to restore progress is still nonexistent.

You gotta take the good with the bad. The game will lag. You loose the game AND your coins and crystals and NEVER compensated. The game has bosses you cannot beat. They are constantly updating, which is an improvement but like I said, Good work the Bad

comments: The upgrade has made it Worse. At least we could watch annoying ads to continue if we ran out of time or clogged the board but, now that that option is gone, it's not worth playing. I will never buy extras from you so stop trying to make me. I love this game but you've ruined it. I'm only keeping it in the hope you come to your senses and make it playable again.

I love this game! I've been playing it for a while, and it has remained extremely challenging - but not impossible. Other matching games eventually become so easy that I lose interest. Or they become so difficult that it's impossible to successfully complete them, and that is no fun either! None of this happened with Tile Master 3D. HOWEVER, after completing about 550 levels, I had to stop playing, much to my dismay. The screen freezes up, or goes completely black, making it impossible to play.

The game is really really fun, I enjoy playing. I would give it 5 stars but it is very frustrating that they stop in the middle of a game for an add. Not sure how long my patience will withstand interruptions of my focus. Up date...this game keeps messing up and rotating during the game, Can't play when rotated it's way to small to play. I love to play this game but will have to take it off and hope they will update it. Also the game with the most adds, but some are quick adds. 2.5 stars now.

title: Comics Bob
description:
üóø  Comics Bob ‚Äì Mind-bending puzzles and classic cartoon fun! 

Comics Bob caveman! Comics Bob not clever man. Comic Bob love ‚ù§ cave lady. Cave lady in danger. Comics Bob confused. Comics Bob need friend with big brain! üß†

üî• Yabadaba-doh!

Help lovable doofus Bob and his beautiful lady üë© friend overcome the trials and tribulations of paleolithic romance in this wacky cartoon puzzle game where you make the choices for the hapless prehistoric heroes. Choose right or choose wrong, the answer‚Äôs always guaranteed to be a blast as situations unfold with the humor and ingenuity of classic cartoon capers. 

Sneaky saber-toothed tigers üêØ, manic monkeys, tricksy pterodactyls and even inquisitive aliens are all conspiring to rend our star-crossed stone-age lovers  asunder, so you‚Äôll need all your lateral thinking and puzzle-solving skills to save them, get them back together and ensure the future of the human race doesn‚Äôt go tumbling over a cliff into oblivion.

ü™® Stone-age technology!

‚òÖ Endless prehistoric puzzle fun ‚Äì enjoy dozens of unique levels of logic adventures with Comics Bob and his stone-age queen. Each situation has two possible outcomes: disaster or delight for poor bewildered Bob, but so much fun for you that you won‚Äôt mind trying again if you can‚Äôt get it right first time. ü§Ø

‚òÖ A Paleo diet for your brain ‚Äì attune your sophisticated 21st century brain to the wild primitive thinking of the stone age, where the tools are simple but the uses they can be put to are ingenious. You‚Äôll need all your guile and imagination to choose the right answers and get Bob and his missus past the obstacles that stand in the way of true love.

‚òÖ Cave art, cave music, cave party! ‚Äì the setting may be primitive and the gameplay couldn‚Äôt be simpler, but the graphics and music in Comics Bob are gorgeous, recalling over a century of classic cartoons and comics, and ensuring a joyful experience for players of all ages.

‚òÖ You can‚Äôt stop progress! ‚Äì regular updates and new episodes ensure the fun keeps on coming. What‚Äôs Bob got up his loin cloth this time? You‚Äôll never guess in this zany puzzle-solving adventure where the surprises never end.

Get primitive!

Tired of the complexities and stresses of hi-tech modern life? This is the game for you! Get back to a simpler and even sillier time when women were real women, men were really dumb, and romance somehow flourished nonetheless! 

Download Comics Bob today to explore a wild and wacky ancient world filled with colorful creatures and crazy situations, save humanity from its own stupidity, and enjoy innocent, endlessly entertaining pre-historic puzzle fun!

comments: The game is glitchy. Problematic, but that isn't the biggest problem. The problem is the message here. We must wear trendy clothes, have TikTok, and go on extreme diets... really? At the end of each level there's a boy waiting for you. Basically, you're making all these choices to get a boyfriend. Sexist much? Not to mention the amount of bullying you can get away with if you're popular and pretty. Don't follow this game. You don't need the boy and you don't have to be a queen bee.

This is just an opinion game, and the game chooses on it's opinion! So annoying! Not a good example for kids. In the ad, it had books and a golden cake. It said to choose the cake. Not true! Reading is healthy for your brain. Cake is junk food and could give cavities. Plus, there is probably a boy out there who likes girls who like to read. A life lesson is in this review. It doesn't matter what your girlfriend likes for you to marry her. It matters that she's nice to you.

This is a awful game in general and I would be glad to explain why. First off the gameplay sucks and second its showing kids that if you become vegan you'll be popular or wear a revealing outfit youll be popular or you can't read books you should only do makeup instead you won't be polar or you'll lose friends. NOT HOW LIFE WORKS. I get it it's a game but come on you can do better than that. Instead it should show that everyone is perfect the way they are. By the way I'm a kid saying this.

Okay, I decided to check it out just for fun and the gameplay kind of sucks. Same thing over and over. As for the moral of the game that everyone hates so much, I don't think thats the issue with the game. The game isn't saying that you should do such drastic things for popularity. I feel like most people who play the game have a good understanding that you shouldn't do the things shown. For me though, the gameplay is what made me give 3 stars. Too many ads. Low quality. Repetitive.

You may be wondering why i gave this game only one star. Well this game is called queen bee wich just sounds like a terrible game. I will say that from experience i have gone through many fases where I think I need style-ish clothes and perfect teeth and just to be perfect to fit in. In this game you litterly have to be perfect by choosing the choice with the green thumbs up and if you dont you dont get the boy at the end of the game and you dont get the possey to be even more popular. Dont play

title: Blockudoku¬Æ - Block Puzzle Game
description:
Blockudoku¬Æ is an original combination of sudoku and block puzzle games. It‚Äôs a simple yet challenging free block puzzle you won‚Äôt be able to put aside.

Match blocks to complete lines and cubes to get them removed. Keep the board clean and beat your high score in a block puzzle! Test your iq and win the block puzzle game!

Block puzzle game features:

‚úî 9x9 block puzzle board. Merge cube blocks on the 9x9 grid, which should be familiar to all sudoku fans, to build lines and squares.
‚úî Blocks of various shapes. Strategically stack sudoku blocks consisting of cubes on the board to destroy them and keep the board clean.
‚úî Complete Daily Challenges in the block puzzles and get unique trophies.
‚úî Join Seasonal Events and get unique animated postcards.
‚úî Compete against other players in Tournaments, beat your high score, and climb the leaderboard.
‚úî Color themes. Choose between a minimalist cube block game or a classic wooden block puzzle.
‚úî Challenging goals. Never stop test iq and challenging yourself in a block puzzle game ‚Äì try to beat your high score or compete with friends.
‚úî Combos. Master the block puzzle game by destroying several tiles with just one move.
‚úî Streak. Score more points by destroying elements with a few moves in a row.
‚úî Unique mechanics. Blockudoku¬Æ was created to be an incredibly successful mixture of sudoku and iq block puzzles.
‚úî Addictive gameplay. Play block sliding puzzles when you are bored or want to train your brain ‚Äì anytime, anywhere.

How to become a Blockudoku¬Æ master?

There is no time limit in this block puzzle game, so no rush. Think one step ahead if you have to face a difficult move. It might be your last one.

Try to merge classic and woody sudoku blocks on the puzzle board to destroy lines or 3x3 squares with every move in order not to fill up the board.

Find your zen by balancing between destroying block figures as quickly as possible and getting as many combos and streaks as you can to score higher.

Why play this block puzzle game?

Blockudoku¬Æ block puzzle was made for people who want to relax and train their brain at the same time. This cube block puzzle game includes combinations of various scales and complexity together with simple addictive gameplay which is similar to tetris and sudoku. Whether you are tired or in low spirits, a few rounds of playing Blockudoku¬Æ block puzzle will cheer you up and let your mind relax.

If you like unblock and block games, tetris, sliding puzzles, woody tricks, merge or block hexa puzzles, then Blockudoku¬Æ is the perfect option for you. Take a break from the daily grind and blockade bad thoughts by immersing yourself in this brain teaser. You definitely won't be bored playing block puzzle games! Relieve stress or train your brain with a relaxing yet challenging iq game of Blockudoku¬Æ anywhere, anytime!

comments: I installed a game, not an advert, The overall concept really isn't bad, it's a puzzle game which acts kind of like Tetris. Unlucky for you, the game is almost impossible to play due to the amount of disturbance caused by ads at the start and end of levels. These ads are usually are skippable after 5 seconds, but are so frequent that your play time will be watching advertisement rather than gameplay.

Ads are very frequent. I get it's free, but there's reasonable and then there's ridiculous. I wish all these ads in games were muted, because no one needs to know what I'm doing on my phone. The ad for this game that got me here was the unique shapes, however there is no cat, just a grid. I'm getting really tired of the bait and switch nature of game ads. Not being able to rotate pieces is annoying.

Too many ads and they are extremely loud even after turning off sounds in the game menu. They also pause whatever music/podcast/etc you are listening to to play their own sound. This happens before and after every game you play. The game also cheats and gives you bad pieces sometimes to force you to watch more ads. Decent idea for a game but just has too many hoops to jump through to actually play.

Wow ... because of the ads at bottom of screen u r NOT able to see the shapes u need to place. Then when u raise shape to c it then try and put it back to raise next shape that 1st one places on board but that's not where u wanted it to go. Hey game folk fix that, I should be able to c shapes without having to touch them.

I was playing headball 2 and ur add popped up! And it doesn't close unless I play the mini game! Why the heck should I be forced to play the mini game! I haven't even played this game! You get this one star just because of your annoying add! And also the name of your app is really depressing! So if I could give you a -5 I would! Anywhich way, please make your adds closable without playing the mini game in order to remove this bad review from your app

comments: Good. Love every level (except Can't Let Go) and the music is oh so good (especially Cycles). The only problem is that it's easy to rage and get broken screens , broken phones, etc. Also, it would be nice if the music could be downloaded in the game rather than from New grounds. If this all doesn't make sense, then just play the game. You'll love every part of it.

I think this is the best geometry dash except for the one u have to pay for. I've beat every level three coins except for clutterfunk which is only 100% The levels are great and the songs are awesome. I only have one problem. Sometimes the songs aren't rythmitic and timed with the jumps. The songs play faster than they should. I've tried it on 3 different devices and the problem stays so I don't think the problem is with my iPad. I would be glad if it was fixed but anyway 5 star.

It is unfortunate that not all the RobTop levels are available, and also disappointing that you cant even go in the level editor at all. However, I understand why you cant do these things, as it is not the full version. It includes enough content for me to still enjoy playing it, but it is a tiny bit disappointing still.

This game is Amazing! I've always wanted to play the full game of Geometry dash but after I installed this game I never even needed the full version! For a free version of the actual game, I'd say it works brilliantly. For the positives, It has great quality and amazing content! It also makes you feel like your playing the actual game! For the Negatives all I would really say is can you please settle down the ads. Other that that it's a brilliant game. I highly recommend it. üòÑüëç

title: Top War: Battle Game
description:
TOP WAR X TRANSFORMERS Collaboration event is now live!
Autobots! Roll out!

Download the game now to get collaboration hero Bumblebee for free!!
"Find out Transformers in-base decors, exclusive Avatar Frame, Nameplate , events and more! Commander!

Optimus Prime is requesting your help!"

The Dark Legion is coming! The Tyrant rules the world!
Wars continue and people are homeless. Who can save the world?
 
Join the Liberty Alliance and step forward fearlessly and become the strongest Commander!
 
Merge to Upgrade
Whether it's a building or units, you can upgrade as long as it is merged! Top War is an innovative strategy game featuring merge to upgrade gameplay, no more long upgrade waiting times, just merge two together and the upgrade will finish instantly!
 
Recruit Legendary Heroes
Land, Navy and Air Force army troops have gathered! Hire and upgrade heroes with unique skills and lead the three armies to become invincible!
 
Various Class Options
Want to become a warrior like a Combat Elite on the battlefield, or a professional who makes various kinds of magic weapons? There are Tactical Masters, Grand Marshals, Legendary Craftsmen, and Great Scientists for you to choose from. Use intelligent combinations of Classes to win!
 
Build an Idyllic Island Base
Starting with a deserted island, build a base to train armies and then make the base more stylish with variety of buildings and decorations. Come and show-off your unique style!
 
Online Battle with Players from all over the World
A variety of battle modes, Battle of Kingdoms, Wild Monsters, War Robots,Throne Showdowns and experience real battles with your alliances, fight for glory, dominate the World!
 
Eternal Land, Cross-Server Battle for Domination
After a long period of construction and development, make way to the Eternal Land. A new large-scale cross-server gameplay with unbelievable battles, the experience will fulfill the desire in your heart: Conquer the World!
Gather your alliance friends and go to unveil the mystery of the Eternal Land!

comments: This game is a pointless scam. You literally just click things to upgrade, and they take longer and longer each time. You can't win a fight against anyone stronger than you, and most people pay literally hundreds of dollars each month for pointless shiny things. So unless you plan to spend a lot of money don't bother to even download this game.

The reviews are as entertaining as the game. Every game is pay to win/dominate these days. Servers don't run on thank yous and programmers don't work for appreciation. With that said, you can easily play and enjoy this game without paying money. That includes playing on one of the top alliances as a ftp player. I've done it with multiple accounts on multiple servers. I also have a main account that I have put a decent amount of money into. It was well worth it. Love this game!

A great game that doesn't require pay to play in order to do well starting out. Been playing for 5 days and have accumulated 50 bucks worth of in game currency. A couple of bugs like having another game open on your phone will cause it to freeze out sometimes but all in all having a blast. As far as "artillery game" goes not sure but is a great strategy and kinda feels like COC or Evony online.

HORRIBLE customer service, pay to play I downloaded this game in February and discovered quickly that to compete, you have to be willing to shell out serious money, packs start at a dollar or 2 and quickly ramp up to $100, new packs being offered almost daily. There are a lot of features in the game (which is nothing like the ad, btw) which are interesting but customer service if something goes wrong is a nightmare. There is a well known issue with comps disappearing, I lost 3, too bad so sad.

Enjoyed playing this game for 2 or 3 days. After you get so far into it, there are long waits between being able to play unless you pay, which is fair enough, the developers need their money, but it does look a bit to expensive to me so I uninstalled the game instead. I tried watching adverts but quite a few wouldn't return you to the game and would require a forced close of the game to continue, losing the benefit if watching the advert, so I gave up on that fairly soon in the game.

title: Bazooka Boy
description:
Blast through levels and destroy everything before you with a bunch of amazing weapons! Collect all and master their different and unique qualities! Send your enemies flying, explode their bases and crush their buildings! Satisfying destruction and unlimited possibilities to shoot your way to victory! Fun ragdoll enemies and crazy explosions with levels upon levels of awesome content and challenges, go and wipe out all the enemies to win!

Flashy exploding effects and awesome physics make each level a unique action puzzle. 

Can you solve them all without crushing yourself with a bad shot?
descriptionHTML:
Blast through levels and destroy everything before you with a bunch of amazing weapons! Collect all and master their different and unique qualities! summary: Blast your way to victory and wipe out the enemies with crazy fun explosions!
recentChanges: - Bug fixes and improvements
comments: Sigh. For every minute you spend actually playing, you'll have TWO minutes of mandatory ads to watch... But wait, that's not all, the game continuously has ads on the screen as well. But wait... not only do you have to watch ads, but they are deceptive... they put up fake buttons that don't end the ad, they take you to installation screens or OTHER ADs. And when you "win" a prize you have to watch another 30 second ad. Imagine watching 18 hours of Super Bowl for 3 hours of game play... yeah... not going to win any affection. I understand wanting to make money, but this is downright harassment. Oh, and you also get the same ads over and over and over and over and over and over and over ... I should have known this would happen, I installed this game based on ads from another game. The only upside: the game play appears to be true to the advertisement I saw unlike thousands of other games where the ad and the game play are completely unrelated.

For the record: I paid to remove the ads, it was worth it. I like playing this game - just to pass time and experiment with different guns. I am on level 1004 (but in truth, they repeat after about 250). Anyway, the first time around I learned that if you accept the last mystery outfit, the game will freeze the next time you reach 100%. So, I reinstalled the game and now I click "lose it" for the last mystery outfit. The first time around I couldn't play past about level 350.

More advertising than game! By a lot, too! For every 10 seconds of game play, you have to sit through a 30 second ad. I timed it, it's not an exaggeration. I have never seen a game this ad heavy before in my life. I thought it was a joke ar first. It's literally advertisement after advertisement. You get 3 bazooka shots MAX before a 30 second ad (or TWO!) Instant and permanent uninstall. Amazingly Ad inundated.

The game concept itself is good, and the mechanics are fine. But you'll spend as much time watching ads as you do playing the game. It takes 15 seconds to pass (or fail) a level, and after two attempts you have to watch an ad. Get free awards? Watch an ad to claim. Double your winnings? Ad. You get the idea. It's $2.99 to remove ads, but for what? There's no music, minimal sound effects, and very basic graphics. Zero effort was made into making this game look good or be enjoyable long term.

Little dude celebrates too damn early. It freezes at one scene. You have to play it several times before it will move on to the next level. Once you move on and it gets back to that particular scene it does it again, play it several times and...well, you get it... Well... other than being repetitive & not able to buy anything with all the coins you collect, it was ok to play.

title: Imposter Smashers - Fun io games
description:
How can you survive in an arena full of Imposters? Smash and Run! 

Imposter Smashers - Fun io game is a super cool, easy and relaxing game. To win this, your mission is simple: Smash other crewmate by a huge hammer, Consume their power to become bigger and stronger, Be the only Imposter survival in the battlefield. However, be carefull and try to advoid bumping into other tricky impostors, otherwise, you'll be smashed.

You can choose among serveral roles to add more exciment: Hunter, Assasin, Captain, Trapper, Sword, Gunner... with unlimited skills and items. In this io game, where mutilplayer battle other to be the last one who survive, making yourseft a strong and smart one is crucial. It's super fun, check it out!

HOW TO PLAY: 
- Hold and drag to move
- Get closer to crewmates and smash them
- Run fast and don't be hit

GAME FEATURE:
- Easy and addictive gameplay, control with only one finger
- Serveral roles with impressive skins and skills
- Awsome graphics
- Countless challenges, countless fun
- Play online and offline

Download Imposter Smashers - Fun io games and enjoy this funny addictive game.

comments: Super fun game. I love the gameplay BUT the rounds are very short and there are way too many ads. Ads between rounds, ads when you open the shop or challenges. Anytime you click on something there's an ad. Way too many.

It's a cool and fun concept, and that's all that's good about it. It is INCREDIBLY buggy, and it's just an ad grinder. Every single time you start a new game an ad is getting prepared for you to watch after said game, and if you die. Even when you're not in a game, for example, editing your avatar, there's an ad every 8-12 seconds (yes, I counted), which at this point, is just abusing ad policy for mobile game creators.

Too many ads. Can't win or die without an ad there is the occasional ad but it just spams them. Like every three games is fine but every game is just dumb. Also how many notifications I get is mind blowing. Lemme watch stuff in 0eace without you blowing up my phone. Its fun to play but this stuff is so annoying I can't even give it two star.

Way too many ads it was like everything I clicked on there was an ad. I'd open the game and there's like two ads. If that was different the game would be fun as heck. But it's horrible because of this

Garbage game forces ads. Offers a multiplier for watching an ad and you have to watch an ad regardless if you accept the multiplier or not, then it doesn't even reward you after the forced ad. Typical like every other app. At least other apps are fun. Don't waste your time. Developers don't reply to honest reviews.... watch

title: Genshin Impact
description:
Step into Teyvat, a vast world teeming with life and flowing with elemental energy.

You and your sibling arrived here from another world. Separated by an unknown god, stripped of your powers, and cast into a deep slumber, you now awake to a world very different from when you first arrived.

Thus begins your journey across Teyvat to seek answers from The Seven ‚Äî the gods of each element. Along the way, prepare to explore every inch of this wondrous world, join forces with a diverse range of characters, and unravel the countless mysteries that Teyvat holds...

MASSIVE OPEN WORLD

Climb any mountain, swim across any river, and glide over the world below, taking in the jaw-dropping scenery each step of the way. And if you stop to investigate a wandering Seelie or strange mechanism, who knows what you might discover?

ELEMENTAL COMBAT SYSTEM

Harness the seven elements to unleash elemental reactions. Anemo, Electro, Hydro, Pyro, Cryo, Dendro, and Geo interact in all sorts of ways, and Vision wielders have the power to turn this to their advantage.

Will you vaporize Hydro with Pyro, electro-charge it with Electro, or freeze it with Cryo? Your mastery of the elements will give you the upper hand in battle and exploration.

BEAUTIFUL VISUALS

Feast your eyes on the world around you, with a stunning art style, real-time rendering, and finely tuned character animations delivering you a truly immersive visual experience. Lighting and weather all change naturally over time, bringing every detail of this world to life.

SOOTHING SOUNDTRACK

Let the beautiful sounds of Teyvat draw you in as you explore the expansive world around you. Performed by the London Philharmonic Orchestra, the soundtrack changes seamlessly with the time and gameplay to match the mood.

BUILD YOUR DREAM TEAM

Team up with a diverse cast of characters in Teyvat, each with their own unique personalities, stories, and abilities. Discover your favorite party combinations and level up your characters to help you conquer even the most daunting of enemies and domains.

JOURNEY WITH FRIENDS

Play together with friends across various platforms to trigger more elemental action, tackle tricky boss fights, and conquer challenging domains together to reap rich rewards.

As you stand atop the peaks of Jueyun Karst and take in the rolling clouds and vast terrain stretching out before you, you may wish to stay in Teyvat a little longer... But until you are reunited with your lost sibling, how can you rest? Go forth, Traveler, and begin your adventure!

SUPPORT

If you encounter any issues during the game, you can send us feedback via the in-game Customer Service Center.
Customer Service Email: genshin_cs@mihoyo.com
Official Site: https://genshin.mihoyo.com/
Forums: https://forums.mihoyo.com/genshin/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Genshinimpact/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/genshinimpact/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GenshinImpact
YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/c/GenshinImpact 
Discord: https://discord.gg/genshinimpact
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Genshin_Impact/

recentChanges:
Version 2.0 "The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia" is now available!
New Characters: Kamisato Ayaka, Yoimiya, and Sayu
New Area: Inazuma
New Event: Inazuma Main Event "Thunder Sojourn"
New Story: New Archon Quests and Story Quests

comments: A decent game, but there are some areas that can be fixed. Ever since Inazuma dropped, my mobile couldn't handle some of the commissions. Example, the commission "full speed ahead" in Inazuma is very difficult since the gliding challenges would not load fast enough. Therefore couldn't reach the destination within the time limit. I would really appreciate if Mihoyo can fix this problem, because I have been struggling with this commission for some time now.

Great game, alone or with friends, and across pc or mobile. My favorite mobile game in recent years, and one that's kept me engaged for almost a year already. Art is beautiful, story and characters are memorable, and story progression isn't blocked on paying. This is a gacha game, so you can get better characters by paying, but I appreciate how the game doesn't feel like it requires it.

This game is amazing! It has interesting lore, the characters are well designed, the graphics are great, and the gameplay is overall fantastic. I would give it 5 stars but there's been a lot of bugs since the last few updates. It keeps kicking me off, leaving me forced to redo quests and battles and after the game starts everything's buggy. I just find it funnier than anything else,(EX: I saw a npc sitting without a chair) but it is kind of annoying to have to redo difficult battles and quests.

I usually play competitive games. MOBA like Dota, LOL or other games. It's my first time playing a game with an open world genre and to be honest this game gives me a lot of "stress-free vibe". The ambiance of the game, the angelic background music, the simple yet aesthetic design of the character and the world. Whenever I'm in a lot of negativity and stress, I play this game and it gives me peace and comfort. Thank you for making this game.

There is no reason why you shouldn't give this game a try, It's exciting, the graphics are phenomenal and there is so much story and detail! I understand the fact that, because the game is free, there needs favorable parts for the people that pay. Despite that, I would love if MiHoYo gave more primos, the grind needed to have a good chance for a 5* is insane.

title: Type Sprint: Typing Games, Practice & Training.
description:
Ready to challenge your brain and typing speed? Type Sprint is one of the most exciting type battles! Join this breathtaking typing race against quick sneaky opponents, go level by level to complete various missions, and become the best type runner. From simple typing games to tricky word trivia ‚Äî this texting game has plenty of brain-busting and typing practice!
 
Type Sprint is packed with match 3 games, word problems, hidden objects, and different riddles that will test your memory, typing speed, and strategic thinking.

BEST FEATURES:
 
5-in-1 type run with levels, fun missions, and rewards. This is one of the best running games you‚Äôll never get tired of!
Dynamic and educational typing race. You don‚Äôt simply run and type but also improve your texting skills.
As simple as abc: fun gameplay, easy navigation, and nice design. The type run you'll definitely love!
Crowds of sneaky opponents: from easy-to-defeat losers to smart and skillful type runners. Leave them all behind!
Endless fun type and brain-pushing games. Not just play‚Äîthink!
 
Great time filler and excellent typing practice. Texting games have never been so addictive!
 
Have fun running, typing like a pro, and beating every level in one of the most popular typing games. Become the master of fast typing and enjoy this running game for free, and we‚Äôll be keeping a keen eye on your feedback to make it the best texting game ever. We can‚Äôt wait for your review to hear what you think!

this game is kind of amazing but on that part when you get hit by the wall I did not know you had a type before it this game is amazing I would love to use it but it's like it has offline players

title: Toca Kitchen 2
description:
Do you want to be the head chef of your very own sushi restaurant? Check out Toca Kitchen Sushi, the newest app from Toca Boca üëâ http://bit.ly/TocaKitchenSushi_GooglePlay 

The wildly popular Toca Kitchen is back! With new guests to cook for, more tools to play with and new food combinations to test out, Toca Kitchen 2 invites all chefs to get messy and start playing!

GET CREATIVE
Who said dishes have to be pretty and tasty? In Toca Kitchen 2 you can cook however you want! Juice tomatoes, boil the salad or make a burger. Come up with your very own recipes and treat your guests to something special.

MAKE A MESS
With six different kitchen tools to choose from, you have the perfect setup for preparing fun foods! Load up with your favorite ingredients, add a squeeze of messiness and finish off with a pinch of weirdness. Time to let your guest have a bite! Was it a winner? 

WATCH THEIR REACTIONS
Discover your guests‚Äô preferences by watching their reactions. Oven-baked fish head with fried leftovers and lettuce juice coming right up! Oh, they didn‚Äôt like it? Try adding some salt. It‚Äôs fun to get the ‚Äúew‚Äù!

We added a whole lot of fun stuff! You can now enjoy cooking:

New foods!
- Chicken
- Prawn
- Pineapple
- Corn
- Peach
- Strawberry
- Watermelon 
- Onion
- Octopus
- Spaghetti
- Rice

New condiments!
- Ketchup
- Dressing
- Soy

Watch the characters react to spicy hot sauce and sour lemons or and laugh at loud burps. 

At last but not least, we added more levels of grossness to the characters. Have fun!

Features:
- New ingredients in the fridge
- New characters to feed
- Stronger character reactions
- New juicer and oven
- Deep fryer! You can now deep fry anything. Get your crust on.
- No rules or stress - just open-ended, kid-directed fun!
- No third-party advertising
- No in-app purchases

What are you waiting for? Get in the kitchen and start cooking!

Toca Kitchen 2 is a free cooking app for kids that‚Äôs perfect for aspiring chefs. Kids can roleplay a chef in a kitchen full of tasty foods and ingredients! Learn how to cook your favorite dish or experiment with fun combinations to feed hungry customers. This fun cooking app is sure to deliver nothing but fun for kids!

There‚Äôs no time limits or rules, right or wrong, so explore all the ingredients and tools the kitchen has to offer! Cook up some crazy food and feed your guests. 

***

Subscribe to our YouTube channel!
http://bit.ly/YouTube_GooglePlay

***

ABOUT TOCA BOCA
At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids‚Äô imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 130 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

PRIVACY POLICY
Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: http://tocaboca.com/privacy

comments: This is the best cooking game I have ever seen. No levels, coins, gems, telling you what to do, times or buying with real money. You can make the food how you want to. But please add more people and a soup pot. Still this game deserves 5 stars.

This game is really fun! Not much ads, no lag for me, but the reason why I gave it 4 stars is because sometimes it glitches me out of the game but over all its very good! And its not just for ages 6-8 like it says, I'm 10 and I'm still playing, my little cousin is 5 and she is playing and understands it well! We both love it and hope another character joins to be fed!! What I really like to do is mix ü•¶ and ü•ï together and boil them and make ü•¶ and ü•ï stew! This is the best cooking game ever.

I love this game but It needs a little bit more things to do like maybe a place to make sandwiches, microwave, coffee maker, pancake and waffle maker, place to make salads, place to make burgers, place to make pasta, place to make Popsicles, and Things they should add like bannas, ranch, milk, cheese, cinnamon, sugar, syrup, eggs, and bacon. But that is ideas I have I don't think it will be added but it would be cool if it did. But overall the game's awesome. Just needs more is all.

This game provides a huge scope for the imagination. There are so many food choices and ways to cook them. There are no promts or rules, just freeplay. And I think people out of the recommended age range (like me) can still enjoy it. I play this game for hours in a row. I even noticed a vegetarian mode in the simple settings menu that takes away meat from the refrigerator. That is so considerate. Also, no ads! I 100% love and recommend this game.

I love this game and all other TOCA games. It would be a 5 star, but there are a few things to improve. It would be nice if there were more varieties in fruits, veggies, more bowls, pans, stuff like that. Other than that, the game is fine.

title: 2 Player games : the Challenge
description:
If you want to play with your friend on the same device, this is the right game!
But also if you have no friends to have fun in multiplayer on one device, just play alone against the AI!
Challenge your friend with this collection of 2 player games and enjoy the beautiful graphics of the minigames!

Choose between one of the 2 player games ( and remember that you can also play alone against the AI if you have no possibility to multiplayer):

Ping Pong :
Move the racket with your finger and challenge your friends!

Spinner war :
Push your opponent outside the stage! Two players on a small area are too much!

Air hockey :
Use your finger to move the paddle and score letting the puck entering in your friend's goal!

Snakes :
Don't touch your opponent's body and stay alive!

Pool :
The classic pool game for 2 player on one device!
 
Tic tac toe :
Instead of using pen and paper just open the app and challenge your friend on the same device! A two player classic!

Penalty kicks :
Let the goalkeeper dive and kick the soccer ball to make goal! 

Sumo :
The multiplayer version of a famous Japanese sport!

And much more! (Like minigolf, racing cars, sword duels, chess...)

This collection of 2 player games features beautiful minimal graphics to keep your focused on the duel with your opponent and it saves scores between matches, this way you can dispute a 2 player cup and let the challenge go on between minigames!
Unleash the power of local multiplayer on one device / one phone / one tablet, and bring the fun to the party!
Disclaimer: this multiplayer game can ruin friendships!

comments: It's a great game. This game keeps getting new games added so you never get bored of the game. It also has an air you can play against which I'm glad about cause I got no one to play with. üò• The minigames are great, but I wish there was a game mode like survival or a campaign or something. But even without that I think it's a great game.

Pretty good game overall. Though, I have some problems with it. Firstly, the hard bot seems unbalanced. On some games, like shuriken bamboo or basketball, the bot is almost impossible to beat, but then on games like chess or king of the yard, they're super easy to beat. Secondly, it seems like you put no effort into some maps. Specifically, tanks. The map on that is literally two rocks. Please fix these to enhance your game :)

The game sucks you can't beat the bots and the games are rigged like in pool if a ball gets close to a net then it will just go in even of you put all you're power into the shot. And in pingpong the ball goes through the paddle. And in tic tac toe the computers are enstien level good.

AMAZING!!!! Ive had this game for a long long time, and I must say I love the new updates! Even the new logo looks beautiful. It would be cool if you add a thing that counts how many hours/minutes you spent playing a certain game, just an idea. :).

A number of interesting games that are sort of similar. It's fun in that you can play against the have it you can play against a friend. I enjoy the ping pong game the most, I think. I'd enjoy more games like hangman (where the players chose a word), darts, or five-in-a-row. The music in the home screen can't be turned off and is obnoxious. But it's a fun pass-time for friends.

title: Fashion Battle - Dress to win
description:
The most entertaining free game of the year is already here! It is your time to shine, dress well to impress everyone, and win this clash of fashion! The game has already been viewed millions of times on TikTok and has become a popular trend. Dress well according to a specific concept to overcome your opponent on the runway. Ever wondered how it is like to be under the spotlights and do a catwalk? Now it is your best chance to show your fashion taste and shine! You will be selecting new shoes for girls, high heels, clothes, bikinis, night dresses, even accessories like sunglasses and designer bags. Some concepts will be about casual clothing while some will be all about luxury.

The best thing about the game is it is free! Now it is your time to become a part of this makeover project for your model. you will feel like the lights are on you. You are the designer and the game is your sketchbook! Dress up your model and become the best stylist ever. Find the best possible clothes that will rock your high heels or complete your style with a designer bag, all of these are up to you! Join this highly addictive 3D adventure and be a part of this luxurious game!

For feedback: https://discord.gg/3GRWE2k

Have fun!

comments: I would have given it five, however there are way too many ads and everytime an ad pops up I can't close it out when it's finished and go back to the game like most ads you click an X or hit "close", ads on this game doesn't have a way to close them. It's frustrating because each time I have to close the game and wait a few minutes to go back to playing. Other than that I enjoy it very much. Can you ease do something to fix the problem with the ads so the game can be enjoyed.

I think this is a fun game. Cute clothing options and customization options. However, I've played long enough to notice how the scoring isn't very consistent. if the model does well in a round, they will purposely score you lower, there's also no telling exactly how anything is scored. It's just kind of random, you can't strategize. But overall, I do enjoy this game.

I love the game, and all that lot of good effort, but there is a bug ( not sure if a bug). So, whenever a person somebody basically looks like me last time on night club or any other dress title. And I look like them they win, but if it's opposite they would look the same as them and me as myself they would win again. And I feel like these people are bots they always dress the same and again and again. This Review is from a mobile player.

This is a good game and it is quite addictive but there are way to many adds and some ppl do bad on purpose I kind of wish they would be really good and I can actually battle. Also when I think something is bad and I did good the 'judges' would give them a really good score when there outfits don't match. To be honest this game is really good and addictive but there are some down side to it - one ur queen u carnt go anywhere else ur continually playing the same rounds -

Very fun actually, and super addicting. I've been playing pretty consistently for almost 6 months now and have over 30,000 gems. My one and only problem is I have nothing to do with them. There are items I can buy with the gems, but it says the game needs to update. So far, the game hasn't had any updates since I've downloaded it. So. It's kinda sad.

title: Match Tile 3D - Original Pair Puzzle
description:
Did you like our Match 3D game? Where can you match pairs together to clear the screen and win the level?

Loop games is happy to announce our new triple pair matching 3D Tile Puzzle Game. We are excited to give you Match Tile 3D.

Match Tile 3D is easy to learn and fun to play puzzle game.
This Game is designed to relax all your muscles, release your daily stress, and increase your memorization abilities. All of that while playing a fun and easy to play pair matching puzzle game.


How To Play Match Tile 3D:

Tap on three tiles that look the same and connect them into triples.
Keep doing that until you clear all tiles from the screen.
Keep having fun, start new levels and become a 3D puzzle master.

The Game has many different triple sets of 3D objects that are designed to be easy to memorize.

We have a lot of fabulous levels, including;
üêµ Cute animals
üçì Sweet yummy food
üß∏ Cool toys
üòá Exciting emojis
 ‚ùì Surprising new shiny objects every week, all free.

Features

‚õ±Ô∏è Relaxing game design & unique 3D objects to connect

Match Tile 3D is a game designed with your well-being in mind. 
With many fun & cute relaxing 3D objects, each level is more interesting than the one before. In each level, the difficulty of triples and the number of tiles also slightly increases to keep your brain challenged.


üß† Well-designed brain trainer levels that help you to challenge yourself

Match Tile 3D will make it easier for you to memorize objects & details by playing our brain trainer levels. You will start to notice your memorizing abilities becoming better with time and that you master to solve challenging puzzles very fast.

Ready to play?
Start with the play button and complete the first tutorial level, which takes 10 seconds to teach you how to connect tiles into triples.
Try then to connect all sets of tiles to pass the first puzzle.
After completing the level, challenge yourself against the time and improve your matching skills. Over time you will master memorizing 3D tiles and objects while having lots of fun.

comments: This game is becoming very annoying. It keeps crashing. Sometimes it picks up where you left off, other times items are returned to the pile and sometimes it takes all the progress you made away. I really enjoy this game and wish that these glitches would be fixed. Just now had three items left and it stopped again (mind you this is one game, it has taken 30 minuets) now it says that I ran out of lives. Great, now I have to start all over. Need to find a game to replace this one.

Quite easy. Unlike the 3d match you start off at easy levels and levels get harder as you. Also you tap on the items to select rather dragging them to the bottom. The only thing you need to watch is that the correct item has been selected. If the boxes at the bottom fill up before matching 3 then the game is over.

So far, I'm enjoying the game, but found it unplayable with the ads, so I got the paid version. My only complaint is that I can't play it untimed because I prefer games with no time pressure. Would give 5 stars if I could turn off the time countdown.

It's a surprisingly addictive game. The first few levels are pretty easy.... But, get through it because it becomes more challenging pretty quickly and involves strategy and foresight! Also, the touch/response reaction time is awesome even on my "basic" phone!

The Candy Crush Ad locks down my game and wont allow me to close the ad once the its finished. Just requests I download the game, what I do ia close the app and then reopen to resume playing. However today it kicked me in the middle of a level and made me start over loosing my ufos. I have however enjoyed the game. Just buggy

title: Portal Gun Master 3D
description:
Portal in Portal out! Trash anyone and anything that comes your way.

Portal Gun Master 3D is a new action game where you must Shoot Holes to your Enemies to get rid of them. This casual game contains different worlds and guns that are awaiting for you. Enemies such as aliens, cops and the mafia will shoot you back!

Take your Gun, target your Enemies and Shoot them!
descriptionHTML:
Portal in Portal out! Trash anyone and anything that comes your way.

Portal Gun Master 3D is a new action game where you must Shoot Holes to your Enemies to get rid of them. This casual game contains different worlds and guns that are awaiting for you. Enemies such as aliens, cops and the mafia will shoot you back!

Take your Gun, target your Enemies and Shoot them!
summary: Beat your Enemies with your Portal Gun!
recentChanges:
- New exciting levels!
- Amazing new skins!
- Bug fixes
comments: I get that you need ad revenue, I really do. So I don't mind ads between levels. But you put an ad in the middle of a level before it was finished, which disrupts my play and is unforgivably crass. So you get 1* and I'm uninstalling. Shame, because it wasn't a bad game until that point.
Fun game but, forced ads. If you click out of the Ad, they force you to repeat you're last level. Not worth it if I have to watch an ad after every level.
Needs a bit more difficult levels like maybe 1 more. Rest was fun, everything was awesome.
So ridiculus it wont even open at all it just says it cant open it no matter how hard i try. It even mentions bug fixes. What a lie
Really fun and engaging! Definitely recommend Playing this ! üòÜ

title: Acrylic Nails!
description:
Come get your long nails done at the ASMR acrylic nail salon for a perfect makeover! Design and paint acrylic nails. Acrylic Nails is #1 in satisfying games and is the best ASMR girls nail woman salon around. Get your long nails done with beautiful designs, perfect paints, and of course lengths.
