recentChanges: Bug fixes for better game playing
comments: The app itself is OK, I just wish it wouldn't add the finished nails to my photos as it is taking up storage. It is also quite automated and you don't get much freedom with the design. My 7 year old cousin finds it fun and I reccomend it for younger people but anyone above the age of 10 would probably find this quote boring. Also the game is very different to the advert.

Honestly it is a great game but it can use some updates. For example the nail polish colors. I wish there was more of an option. Also, I wish you could mess up; if you know what I'm saying. The game is always so easy I wish the customers were a bit more picky, like in realife. Also, id maybe like to see some more diversity. There is clearly only white and black customers. Maybe we could see some Asian, Middle Eastern, and Hispanic customers. Although, the game is pretty great overall.

That a wonderful game , I have downloded it for my younger sister which is o ly 2 years old and she plays this game with a great fun ... .. but I have give it 4 stars they can improve some thing in game as they should give more nail powers in it , more nail designs and most impo , they should increase difficulty level as its for 5 to 10 years old kids

The whole general idea of the game is a good one, but it gets boring pretty fast. There isn't much to do and half of the new stuff you can get are only obtained by ads. There could be more stuff to do (like buying designs or choosing furniture)

I am very dissapointed in this game,in the demo they advertised us the possibility of hurting our clients therefore making them Not pay us the max amount and making the game less bland but in the actual gameplay , it is impossible.Furthermore, the nails seem to just shape themselves when applying the acrilic powder (elongating the bead around to make the nail take shape) making the gaming experience totally automated(1)

title: Tomb of the Mask
description:
Tomb of the Mask is an arcade game with an infinite procedurally generated vertical labyrinth. Seeking for adventure you get into a tomb where you find a strange mask. You put it on and suddenly realize that you can now climb walls - easily and promptly. And that's when all the fun begins. 

You'll face a variety of traps, enemies, game mechanics and power-ups. And as far as time doesn't wait, get a grip and up you go.
descriptionHTML:
Tomb of the Mask is an arcade game with an infinite procedurally generated vertical labyrinth. Seeking for adventure you get into a tomb where you find a strange mask. You put it on and suddenly realize that you can now climb walls - easily and promptly. And that's when all the fun begins.

You'll face a variety of traps, enemies, game mechanics and power-ups. And as far as time doesn't wait, get a grip and up you go.
summary: Addictive tomb labyrinth. Time limit and lava are advancing ‚Äì go only up!
developerAddress:
Maximos Michailidis 6
MAXIMOS PLAZA TOWER 3
3106 Limassol
Cyprus
support@playgendary.com
recentChanges:
We are ready to make your game experience even greater! Bugs are fixed and game performance is optimized. Enjoy!

Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make the game better. Please leave us some feedback if you love what we do and feel free to suggest any improvements.
comments: It's a fantastic game. Great little arcade-style game to kill time. All I can really say. But oh dear God the monetization here is horrendous. The energy system is atrocious. I burn through it all in five minutes, and when that's done, it asks me to sign up for a subscription. To an indie arcade game?! Hell no! And the $30 "No Subscription" option is just as bad. I have purchased games that offers other-worldy experiences for less. Do not recommend.

This is the third time I have downloaded this app\game. I completed it 2 and their are 325 levels... I played it alot. It is SOOOOO fun. I recommend. Also when you run out of energy you can do arcade mode. Also you can turn of music and sound if you wanted to play quietly without disturbing anyone. Again great app, recommend to you.

OK, look: This is one of very few modern mobile games that is actually worth trying. Yes, there's lots of ads, but those can be easily removed without any kinds of mods. Playgendary, I have one request for this game: Switch port. It would feel right at home on the Switch, seeing as it has a touch screen, and could also use the sticks or d-pad. $5 on the eShop and I could see it being pretty popular.

Okay, originally I gave this a 4 star because I don't like the snakes, but the pop up ads are horrible, they pop out of no where and usually tricking you into pressing the "buy" button. Constantly you have to watch an ad for everything, to get a life, before and after the game, when you enter a game, for a chest! Sometimes during the game, despite this, it's a fun game.

Perfect game This game is really fun, but my problem is the energy system. You can only have 5 energy at a time, and energy is so valuable because you literally can't play the game without it. I wish maybe you could have like 10 energy at a time....?? And the long dragon snake is just too surprising so you can't get out of the way quick enough. If you dont fix the energy system it would be cool if you put 2 revives instead of 1 per level.. but still, this game is so fun. Played all 450 levels!!

title: BitLife - Life Simulator
description:
How will you live your BitLife?

Will you try to make all the right choices in an attempt to become a model citizen sometime before you die? You could marry the love of your life, have kids, and pick up a good education along the way.

Or will you play choices that horrify your parents? You could descend into a life of crime, fall in love or go on adventures, start prison riots, smuggle duffle bags, and cheat on your spouse. You choose your story...

Discover how bit by bit life choices can add up to determine your success in life the game.

Interactive story games have been around for years. But this is the first text life simulator to truly mash up and simulate adult life.
descriptionHTML:
How will you live your BitLife?

Will you try to make all the right choices in an attempt to become a model citizen sometime before you die? You could marry the love of your life, have kids, and pick up a good education along the way.

Or will you play choices that horrify your parents? You could descend into a life of crime, fall in love or go on adventures, start prison riots, smuggle duffle bags, and cheat on your spouse. You choose your story...

Discover how bit by bit life choices can add up to determine your success in life the game.

Interactive story games have been around for years. But this is the first text life simulator to truly mash up and simulate adult life.
summary: A super fun life simulator where YOU control what happens with your choices!
recentChanges: Don't mind us, Bitizens, we're just here cleaning the house and performing routine maintenance!
comments: The concept of the game is cool and it's a fun game. But if you buy TWO separate additions. One of them being titled God mode I should be able to do anything in the game. But no you still have to pay to go back in your person's life. Kinda makes it alot less fun. But you guys go ahead. Have people pay for a membership without saying there's more to pay. For "God mode" and then let's make them pay again even though they wanted to play this free phone game so much they spent 10$ already

The games slow and crashes often. I played the game when it was newer and didn't have any problems but then an certain update (which I can't remember what it added) then it crashes (which makes you lose everything you've done that year) and takes a minute just to change screen. At first I thought it was my phone then I upgraded to a new phone and had the same problems then I learned that some of my friends had the problems too. Not all of them though, if the game runs good nice if not delete it

I've never really liked simulators before....this game though... I can't say a lot about it because I'm still exploring....The ads are annoying but it's only because I'm not ready to pay for it to go away get.... but the games seriously growing on me.... I guess you'd really have to give it a go to understand what I'm talking about.....

Hello. I love your game and have been playing for a few years now. I just started to have this issue where the game keeps freezing up. I uninstalled and reinstalled and started again but then it frozen again. Will let me do different things but doesn't display that I did them or that I pressed age. It just freezes. Will give 5 star when fixed

I love the game. Literally the best game I've ever played. But the problem is that You guys don't update Android as much as you do apple, so all of the advertisements that come up (such as the royalty update, the pro sports updat, and the mafia update) Android users can't play it until months later. While apple users get to play it once they see it. But that's the only problem that I have with this game. Otherwise, good job devs.

title: Hero Squad!
description:
Surround yourself with the best army to survive against the monster hordes!

Recruit new units with destructive weapons to survive as long as possible :
- Shockbow who sends electric arrows to stun enemies

- Akimbo shooting very quickly with a gun in each hand 
- Shotgun who bursts in a cone and neutralizes zombie groups
- Grenade throwing explosive stuff in area to kill shielded troops 
- Sniper aiming from far away and piercing rows of monsters


Go through the halls and collect powerful bonuses to reinforce your troops!

Run to the helicopter to save your army and escape the battlefield!
Create your army now and become the strongest one!


We are waiting for you on the battleground, are you ready for action?
descriptionHTML:
Surround yourself with the best army to survive against the monster hordes!

Recruit new units with destructive weapons to survive as long as possible :
- Shockbow who sends electric arrows to stun enemies

- Akimbo shooting very quickly with a gun in each hand
- Shotgun who bursts in a cone and neutralizes zombie groups
- Grenade throwing explosive stuff in area to kill shielded troops
- Sniper aiming from far away and piercing rows of monsters


Go through the halls and collect powerful bonuses to reinforce your troops!

Run to the helicopter to save your army and escape the battlefield!
Create your army now and become the strongest one!


We are waiting for you on the battleground, are you ready for action?
summary: Shoot them all!
recentChanges: New levels
comments: I enjoy the game but there just a couple of things I find wrong with it. First one is a glitch/bug... if you have more than 1 Telepath in your team, one of them will shoot at absolutely nothing. The beam will just fly off in a random direction. The second thing is there is no way to take time off for opening chests other than with gems. Times for opening chests are quite long and there should be a way to maybe watch an ad to take off a couple hours or so.

Pretty good game. Reminds me of archero but less challenging. At a point where every time I open the game and launch a mission, when It gets to the point to pick your first squad mate, nothing shows up on the cards and when you click to select it just continues loading and only gives you the option not to pick anyone. Then when you reach the point to pick a power up, same issue, the pictures on the cards never appear just continuously loads, please fix for 5 stars

Just an ad money farm, lets you play a bit with an ad every so often, then after a while makes you watch an ad between every single level of a map, essentially forcing you to pay for no ads or putting up with whatever trash the ads are trying to get you to download next every 2 minutes. Gameplay isnt half bad, but not worth the time spent watching adverts.

This game is really fun and worth at least trying out. In my experience the ads weren't as bad as what others are saying but they're still there between every level. After about an hour of playing you will have played pretty much all the game has to offer besides getting the other heroes, I wish the world's would get progressively harder or had longer rooms with different enemies. Would play much more if there was just more to the game

Would give it 5, but a bug has popped up. I am stuck in the 12/12 room at the end of a world and can't seem to progress even though I already got rewards at the end. Gameplay: Fun and easy, ads make it look dumber and less involved then it is. It is a card collection/RPG style arcade shooter. You collect units, upgrade them with coins, and do missions. World's so far have been unique enough to be enjoyable. Ads/IAP's are part of it, but I haven't felt like you need to partake. 4/5.

title: Animal Transform Race - Epic Race 3D
description:
Are you in for a joyful and speedy transformer race? If the answer is yes, we have the most epic race for you in place! Animal Transform Race. Come and give all it takes to win this epic race in the form of an animal. This is an adventure that‚Äôs undoubtedly worth embarking on! As you race through the runway full of various obstacles, you need to transform from one animal to another to match the animal‚Äôs ability to the obstacle awaiting you! 

You need to have sharp attention and concentration skills to win the race! It‚Äôs all about the calculated speed and reactive change of animals that will get you on top of the game! This is the most exciting transformer game you‚Äôve played in a while, so come and join the animal transformer race now! Each level will uncover a new set of extraordinary obstacles that you need to overcome, so you‚Äôll never get bored or be out of challenge! 

Here are some animal transformer tips for you: 

‚Ä¢	The cheetah will move fast in the land.
‚Ä¢	The elephant will destroy obstacles that come between him.
‚Ä¢	The shark will move fast in the water.
‚Ä¢	The monkey helps you to climb walls.
‚Ä¢	The eagle will fly fast in the air.

Main game features: 

‚Ä¢	Full Epic Race Gameplay
Join the adventurous race in the form of an animal and transform from one animal to another to win the obstacle and level up through the game! 

‚Ä¢	Perfect And Amazing Animations.
The amazing graphics and 3D effects will blow your mind! You need to see to understand what I‚Äôm talking about!

‚Ä¢	Lots of Exciting Levels.
You‚Äôll never get bored or be out of challenges; we have many levels and incredible obstacles for you in place!

‚Ä¢	Simple and Easy Game Controls.
The game is so easy and fun to play! Just relax and let the fun begin!  

Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

From the Studio that brought you Mr. Bullet, Happy Glass, Ink Inc and Love Balls!

comments: The idea is good. But the game feels unplayable with forced ads. It also has optional ads on top of that. Uninstalling really because I am not a personal fan of being forced to watch ads. The occasional ad would be fine, but this game forces you to watch an ad after each level. Not recommended.

I love this game but I will like some sorta boss fight in the game and special animal's like the loch Ness monster and big foot and the Werewolf and yeah but they should be required for let's say a add and like some level's are like gusse the path like one path is easy and other is hard or one is possible and other Impossible and stuff and about the food... It's cool but it needs to be Free no ad's no coin's but after all great game and love that I can play in a car and stuff but hope it comes.
I love the idea behind this game to transform your animal into different types of creatures it so far doesn't have ads in my opinion but so far it ok
Too many ads. After an optional ad whether you watch it or not there will be a forced ad after that. There is an ad each round, I cant take it
the game is fun, runs smoothly (on my device) and it also helps stimulate your brain by making quick decisions üëçüèΩ

recentChanges: New skins added
comments: It was so interesting. there're was less ads also. I want to 4 stars but I gave 5 stars because I love this game so I gave 5 stars. Why I want to give 4 stars because after some levels it was so difficult so I want to give 4 stars. Ok anything I gave 5 stars happy ok thank you for giving cat escape
The game is amazing with cute costumes and nice trails, but the only thing wrong with it is that it would be better if you keep less ads. But the game is really really nice.
It's fun and challenging kinda feel bad for the little guy but one thing just..doesn't grow on me and it's the ads I don't know why but it's kinda annoying but still fun even when your offline

So cute and fun! Really want to get the little guy out! Only thing bugged me was learning to control him with finger. Felt bad when I rammed him into walls, furniture. Made him look blind, me sad about it. Finally found a skin I liked to change to like level 177, but it didn't take. Oh well. Had to search for help on the thing that protects him from getting whacked if he doesn't move. Should have had how to tip for it! Fun!

I really wish that this game had a joystick mode where you controlled the movemnt of the cat with a joystick instead of the cat following your finger because sometimes the cat would go in a random direction and would get me caught. To get an earned skin, I had to watch an add all the way through once, but then it didn't give me my skin so I had to watch another one. Other then that the game had a really nice concept and I like the idea behind it.

title: Angry Birds 2
description:
Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start the fun slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, climb the leaderboards, gather in clans, collect hats, take on challenges, and play fun events in all-new game modes. Evolve your team and show your skills in the most exciting Angry Birds game out there!

Get to know all of the iconic characters and experience the fun gameplay that has captured the hearts of millions of players. 

Features:

‚óè DAILY CHALLENGES. Have a minute? Complete a daily challenge and earn some quick rewards.
‚óè LEVEL UP your characters with feathers and up their scoring power. Build the ultimate flock!
‚óè JOIN A CLAN to take down the pigs with friends and players around the world.
‚óè COMPETE in the ARENA. Compete with other players for some friendly bird flinging fun and prove who is the best.
‚óè COLLECT SILLY HATS. Collect hats with different fun themes to level up your flock‚Äôs fashion game and take part in special events.
‚óè IMPRESS THE MIGHTY EAGLE in special challenges in Mighty Eagle‚Äôs Bootcamp and earn coins to use in his exclusive shop.
‚óè LOTS OF LEVELS. Play hundreds of levels with more added in regular updates and limited time events.
‚óè LEADERBOARDS. Compete with your friends and other players and prove who is the best on the global leaderboards.
‚óè CHOOSE YOUR BIRD. Choose which bird to put in the slingshot and defeat the pigs with strategy!
‚óè MULTI-STAGE LEVELS. Play fun, challenging levels with multiple stages ‚Äì just watch out for Boss Pigs!
‚óè FREE to download! --- Angry Birds 2 is completely free to play. Although Angry Birds 2 can be downloaded for free, there are optional in-app purchases available.

 ---

This game may include: 
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13. 
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse to any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from third parties.

Although some features are available offline, this game may require internet connectivity for certain features. Normal data transfer charges apply. Note: When the game is played for the first time, there is a one-time download of additional content that cannot be completed while offline.

Terms of use: http://www.rovio.com/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy

recentChanges: Minor bug fixes. Bugs: the only thing that (almost) makes us angrier than the piggies.
comments: Geez... AB2 is getting worse. I haven't had gems in forever and the game glitches out in the middle of an ad taking 70 gems from me. For a game that people spend money on, you'd expect it to run in tip top shape. It's such a shame what this once fun game has been reduced to... And to add to this, I've been shut out of my profile and am not able to ressurect it. So, good on you ab2! You have a great scheme going and I believe you got a total of $200 from me over a period of 3 years.

DON'T CLICK ON ADS! Pay to play game, and Rovio cheats. Birds weaken during BOSS levels. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME. This isn't the same fun game we loved. They also need to reduce prices. I don't mind paying, but their fees for gems needed to win levels are ridiculous. $20 or $30 at a minimum is nuts. And it takes forever to save enough gems. Shame on you, Rovio. You destroyed a great game with your greed. *** And don't expect a response from them, either. They obviously stopped caring about us. ***

I originally gave it a full 5 stars. But now, I'm not sure. The game is absolutely fun! ...Unntil you have to constantly take care of a hatchling that nearly everything in game is dependant on. Eventually, it gets harder and harder to take care of that bird. You have to constantly feed it apples everyday to upgrade your birds and slingshot. I wanna knock down some pigs, not constantly take care of a hatchling that needs feeding a certain amount every 24 hours. This game is still good though.

Gameplay is fine, but for some reason the game says you can't download the whole file from the store. This seems inaccurate as you can download over 2 GB directly from the play store. As such I will not be giving this app storage permissions.

I have enjoyed playing this game however there are a number of problems that make this game unfun like having to install newer versions repeatedly and the wait time between screens . the newest version is much faster and more enjoyable. July 29,2021 was my first update on a new install of this game. It is now one week later and a new update is required ....again . The average update is 50 mb. Plus ad storage . This can quickly use up space on your device.

title: Candy Crush Soda Saga
description:
Download Candy Crush Soda Saga now!

From the makers of the legendary Candy Crush Saga comes Candy Crush Soda Saga! Unique candies, more divine matching combinations and challenging game modes brimming with purple soda and fun!

This mouth-watering puzzle adventure will instantly quench your thirst for fun. Join Kimmy on her juicy journey to find Tiffi, by switching and matching your way through new dimensions of magical gameplay. Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Monthly season updates bring unique quests and exciting gameplay for you to explore! Complete quests to progress through the Season Pass while earning rewards and boosters to help you on your Saga.

Show your competitive side in the Episode Race! Compete against other players to see who can complete levels the fastest and progress the quickest. Or work as a team in the 4 in a Row game mode where players work together for Sodalicious rewards!

Candy Crush Soda Saga Features:

*Over 6000 match 3 Sodalicious levels

*Mouth-watering graphics, with 3D characters and an ever changing environment

*Monthly Seasons all year long, filled with challenging quests and a reward-fueled Season Pass

*Game modes bubbling with fun and unique candy:

Soda ‚Äì Switch the bottles and match candies to release purple soda and save the Candy Bears

Frosting ‚Äì Match candy to smash the ice and set the Candy Bears free

Honeycomb ‚Äì Match candies next to honeycomb to release the trapped Candy Bears

Jam ‚Äì Spread the jam across the board

*Unique candies and scrumptious new matching combinations:

Match 4 candies in a square to make a Swedish Fish!

Match 7 candies for the all new Coloring Candy!

*Explore juicy worlds and levels with even more characters!

*Team up for tasty rewards in the 4 in a Row game mode 

*Complete levels in the fastest time for sweet prizes in the Episode Race!

*Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master

*Players that Facebook Connect will have access to leaderboards where you can challenge your friends and compare your highscores!

*Easily sync the game between devices to unlock the games full features when connected to the internet

Candy Crush Soda Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/

Twitter @CandyCrushSoda

YouTube @CandyCrushOfficial

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Candy Crush Soda Saga!

comments: Its great . It's got really good graphics. Reward schemes are good. Daily rewards are given promptly. But since past one week the daily mystery box gift has stopped. It says " contacting " even if you have good speed WiFi. A gift box opens and says " unable to connect to server" . So a request to please solve the problem. Your game is a really hot favourite of mine. So hoping you will get this message and solve the issue.

This is the best designed "match 3" game I've ever played. But I guess the developers aren't making enough from in-game purchases now because they've added ads. And because of the way they're set up, every time I need to restart a level I'm forced to back all the way out to the level list so they can show the ad - which I'll ignore. Then I have to do extra steps to get back to where I was. I just updated hoping that had been changed. It hasn't & I'm out of patience. Goodbye Candy Crush.

This is my go-to game and by far the best Candy Crush game of the bunch. I just started playing in April 2021 and have reached level 2872. Each puzzle level is fun and some can be quite the challenge. I love it. My only complaint is how costly this game truly can be. I didn't really keep track at how much I was spending until I viewed my monthly bank statement. Enjoy the game but be careful, those in app purchases can really add up fast!

Best game ever. My stress reliever. I always challenge my husband. I wish they can come up with a better rewards and competitions. Like cash rewards and solid prices. Imagine getting a big basket of all the sweets you swipe everydayüòúüòúüòÄüëå. Trips and more, that will be awesome.

Although I do like the game and play daily I rated it 1 star because I don't get videos for extra moves which causes me to have to play the same level several times. I refuse to buy gold or pay gold just to make 1 additional move. I also do like how people are allowed to just sit on a square instead of completing that square so the line is finished and we get the prize. If it's a team effort and they don't participate they shouldn't get the prize.

recentChanges: - Bug Fixes
comments: Far too many new events, weapons (that are next to impossible to earn) changing ability to earn shards to purchase new weapons from all events other individual and squad to only individual then making the scores so high to reach those milestones it's impossible. I've played a long time and invested a ton of cash. I don't mind spending when it's worth it. Far too many ways for players to cheat using hacks. This should be a priority instead of new weapons. Can't compete with cheats.

SOOOOO MANY ADS! BEFORE AND AFTER EVERY SINGLE STAGE!!! YOU HAVE TO USE THE BACK BUTTON TO EXIT ADS, THE "X" DOESN'T WORK!!! I'm positive this is done on purpose purely to annoy and bully you into buying in game currency! This game WAS fun before the ads took over. CUSTOMER SERVICE IS NON EXISTENT!!! I'm refusing to invest anymore $ on this app till the incessant nagging from the ads is HEAVILY REDUCED!!!

Everytime I exit the game all my accumulated skulls will go back to zero. It's upsetting since I try to collect them as much as possible for them to be gone in instant. Also it lags, the character will fall off the building making impossible to shoot them. I hope you can fix it better. Thank you!

This game would have gotten a 5 star. However they are all about spending money. It won't let you finish a mission just because you built a rifle that said tier 5 instead of 4. It shouldn't matter about the rifle. Guess I'll delete this game. I don't recommend it.

A entertaining game, the missions are described in a concise manner, short and to the point with no opportunities for confusion about the objective. There is a wide range of rewards made available through completing goals within the game; for example, once you reach level 5 in experience there is an achievement made available and you can collect money. The money in the game can be used to buy more, or upgrade already owned equipment. The missions get progressively more difficult. Very fun game.

title: My Talking Angela
description:
Talking Angela is a virtual pet with a style the whole family can enjoy!

- Players can bathe her, decorate her home and feed her delicious food.

- Angela has a variety of mini games designed to test skill, reflexes and puzzle solving ability.

- Players can collect stylish stickers to collect and swap with other players.

- Angela can select unique outfits from a huge selection of fashion items, including dresses, shoes and makeup. A new makeover whenever she wants!

- She can even learn cool dance moves to her favorite songs. Whether it‚Äôs ballet, K-pop or disco - Angela takes to the stage and makes some magic!

DOWNLOAD FOR FREE AND START PLAYING MY TALKING ANGELA NOW! MAKE HER A SUPERSTAR!

This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates Outfit7 Limited has established COPPA compliant privacy practices to protect your child‚Äôs personal information. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

My Talking Angela offers users an exclusive monthly subscription, allowing access to exclusive additional gameplay features, as an optional in-app purchase.

The Captain Cute monthly subscription ‚Äì which offers the Captain Cute outfit, the option to resume playing 4x per mini-game session, and unlimited energy for playing mini-games ‚Äì is priced at $4.99 per month.

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at the confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews every month unless it is canceled any time before the end of the current subscription period. When you cancel your subscription, the cancellation will apply from the next subscription period onwards. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your Google Play Account settings after purchase. Please note that deleting the app does not result in cancellation of your subscription.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising
- Links that direct users to other apps and Outfit7's websites
- Personalization of content to entice users to play the app again
- Watching videos of Outfit7's animated characters via YouTube integration
- Items are available for different prices in virtual currency, depending on the current level reached by the player
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchase using real money (level progress, games, in-game functionalities, ads)

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
EEA privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/eea/
US privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/
Rest of the world privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/
Customer support: support@outfit7.com

comments: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING! One of the best games I have ever played! It is so fun spinning the wheel and having her dance and dressing her up! I used to think that it was impossible to get the jackpot, but after a LONG LONG LONG time, I had finally got it! It gave me 5000 coins and was so worth it! Also the little dances are ADORABLE. Just wanna say the rumors are a lie and just YouTubers tryna get fame, likes, and views. Don't believe these YouTubers! Anyways this game is totally worth the download!!

Not an actual review for the game but I just feel like explaining this: My Talking Angela doesnt have people looking through her eyes, those are just rumors from years upon years ago and it's safe to play this game.

Amazing, wonderfull app.. But the fact that people say "There is a camera in her eyes" or "help i played it at 3AM and.. " It was a rumor its fake there is NO camera in her eyes and if there was the hacker (Person behind all of this.) wouldve gotten arrested. Thank you.

title: Crossy Road
description:
Join over 200 MILLION players worldwide and experience Hipster Whale's massive viral #1 hit!

Same device multiplayer: Compete against your friends and family on the same device.

Play Crossy Road on the Big Screen with Android TV! 

Why did the Chicken cross the road?
Why did the Pigeon leave THAT there?
Why did Specimen 115 abduct that cow?
Why did Unihorse eat all that candy?


FEATURES:
 - Collect over 150 retro-styled, pop art inspired characters 
 - Cross roads, train tracks, and rivers ‚Äì endlessly hop forever 
 - Dodge traffic in a candy wonderland with the Android Robot 
 - Simple, pure, innovative gameplay 
 - Free to play


Have any problems or suggestions? You can reach us at inappsupport-googleplay@crossyroad.com.


**DON'T LOSE YOUR CHARACTERS!** 
- Go to game Settings and Sign-in with Google Play to save your characters, game progress, scores, and achievements! 
- After signing in, your progress will be saved to your Google Play account
- To restore your game progress, go to Settings and click Restore Game to restore all of your characters 
- You can only restore saved progress that was saved from version 1.0.6 onwards 
- We are working to support saving from multiple accounts on a single device in a future version. The current version works well with one account per device or one account across multiple devices.

The game requires access to the following Permissions ----------

- Read device state and identity - READ_PHONE_STATE permission

- The game requires the LOCATION permission to target and deliver video-based advertising:
The game implements opt-in video ads that players can watch to earn free coins if they choose. Watching video ads is voluntary if players want to speed up the rate they earn coins to win new characters. We require the Location permission to provide location based video ads to provide more relevant ads to players.

summary: Endless Arcade Hopper
recentChanges:
It's summertime in Japan! Grab your yukata and discover all new characters in two fun new worlds!

Collect a free Matsuri Chicken character for a limited time only!
comments: I really like this game! This game really is just a game were you jump past cars, trains etc but for some reason I really like it. The game has challenges ever 24h (You play against others around the globe to see who can go the furthest within the game) I like how it is different maps for differnt characters.I recomend this game to thoose who are a little bit competative, have paitience and are willing to keep trying to get better. hope you like the game :) Sorry for any spelling errors in here.

Woah, this game is really fun! The characters are cute and the rules are simply-simple and also I don't get why people complain about the game itself being boring? It's not boring it's fun! They should atleast appreciate it, yet they just complain. And others complain about the loads of ads Why don't you turn off your wifi because it's an OFFLINE GAME.

This is the most generous and overall fun game ever. Let me explain how this beautifully sculptured game describes itself perfectly. 1st of all, it DEOSN'T shove ads in your face or offers, I CAN RESPECT THAT. And if you wanted to you could turn ads and stuff off in which I find very clever and thoughtful of the company who made this. OTHER GAMES ARE LITTERED WITH THOSE THINGS. And the gameplay is very engaging and tipitty top. I got this in microsoft store (PC) And am writing this on bluestacks

I hate the ads. Played for 2 minutes, got an ad, and then couldn't get out of it. There were no '√ó' buttons, and I couldn't go back to the game after closing the app and coming back. Idk if this is a bug or not, but if it is please fix it devs, I want to play your game.

I like this game for calming my anxiety. It's simple, but really fun yet doesn't frustrate you when you die. The characters are simply adorable and it has a fun, colourful blocky style. Suitable for all ages. I had this game when I was much younger and came back to it and it's even better than before.

title: Stack Ball - Blast through platforms
description:
Stack Ball is a 3d arcade game where players smash, bump and bounce through revolving helix platforms to reach the end.
Sound easy? You wish!!
Your ball smashes like a brick through colorful platforms that block its descent, but if you hit a black one, it's all over! Your ball shatters to pieces and you have to start your fall all over again.
But even black platforms are no match for a fireball falling at full speed! Choose your strategy: speed up like a madman or stop and wait for your next chance to roll and jump. Other ball games wish they were this fun!

Why Stack Ball rules:
- Crazy fast speed
- Fun gameplay
- Bright vibrant graphics
- Simple and easy to play
- Great time killer


========================
COMPANY COMMUNITY: 
========================
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AzurGamesOfficial
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/azur_games
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/AzurInteractiveGames

recentChanges: Fixes & Improvements!
comments: Fun for a few minutes, but quickly gets repetitive and boring. Also, the play-to-ad ratio is way too high. It only takes 10 seconds to blast through a stack, then you have to watch a 30 second ad. That's right... 10 seconds of play to 30 seconds of ad. You can pay $3.29 to remove ads, but that's not really optional if you want to keep your sanity. Technically free to load and play, but... Seriously? Bottom line (IMO): It's not worth the money. Rather than remove the ads, I removed the game.
Better play this with your wi-fi turned off. There's ads every after level and 15 seconds plus before the [√ó] mark appears.

Ok this game is pretty cool and original but there's some people that realy want do get no ads/advertisements because that's annoying and there's some people that dont like the ads video because there's some sexual and the childrens will download the game but this game will deleted but im not saying that this game got not his mistake because he dont create the video ads right? So dont say that the creator is bad because he just created the game for 'fun' so if you dont like ADS off the wifi :)

This game is amazing I enjoyed the lot when I play this game I feel very relaxing and it is very intresting gama please made more game like this and very important point It did not used a net we can play this game any wher any time and with without net and I I did not have the words to say obout this it is super duper amazing'

title: Dancing Race
description:
Want to enjoy music but the old way is too boring? Join us in Dancing Race, the best music fashion walk game ever! 

The first time you can enjoy a high heels walk with music. Only on Dancing Race! 

Collect as many high heels as you can on the wacky runway to become a high heels game queen. Be careful! You will be addicted to this amazing and interesting high heels game. The higher your heels, the more chances you have to get to the podium. It‚Äôs time to show up to the crowd who had the best walk-on heels!!

üë† How to play:
Hold and drag to collect as many heels as you can. Think that it‚Äôs easy? You wish. The more you cross the levels, the harder the game will be. Walls to jump, rails on the roof where you have to spread your legs and slide -  that‚Äôs just half of the amazing world which is waiting for you.

üë† Game features: 
- Various characters, shoes, high heels
- Trending popular songs in line with the beautiful theme

This is a really bad game when I got this game there was so many ads if I like every second there was one this game is a rip off of high heels and I I play high heels it's much more better and not that much so I write this game of one I wish there was a zero that would be the actual rating üò°üò°

title: Word Maker - Word Connect Game
description:
Welcome to Word Maker - the free word connect app that will quickly turn into your go-to brain game. The best combination of crossword puzzle, word connect games and word searches - Word Maker app was created so that you can spend moments of relaxation and fun while you put your mind skills and vocabulary to test!
Fans of word games online and offline, measure up your word search and letter connecting skills - will you be able to find all the words hidden in the crosswords?  Are you up for this free word game puzzle challenge?

From New York to L.A. and around the globe, jump on this addictive letters-combining word game adventure to discover the world and enrich your vocabulary at the same time:
- Exercise your brain with thousands of challenging word puzzles. 
- Test your word game skills, enhance your vocabulary and unlock new Word Maker levels as you climb the vocabulary ladder. 
- Earn gold coins every step of this exciting word game free adventure!

HOW TO PLAY WORD MAKER:
- Swipe the letters in all directions to line up and combine these letters into words that fill up the crosswords blanks horizontally and vertically on the board
- Tap the Hint buttons to get clues on word making
- Tap the Shuffle button to change the order of letters
- Get more hints on connecting words and letters with the help of coins you collected or by watching videos

WORD MAKER APP FEATURES:
- Thousands of unique free word connect games challenges.
- Well-designed word game and crosswords interfaces, beautiful graphics and backgrounds that take you on a global tour with our unique Travel Theme
- Search and connect as many words as possible to unlock new levels and earn extra bonus coins.
- Free Daily bonus rewards - it's worth solving those crosswords every day!
- Word games that are suitable for both kids and adults.
- The perfect exercise for your memory and your mind skills.
- Test your vocabulary limitations and enhance word knowledge.

Discover everything Word Maker has to offer right now, play every day and your brain will thank you for the workout! 
Enjoy playing and connecting words? Leave us your rating and review - we look forward to hearing from our players!

comments: I have been playing this for a while I am on game 870 at the beginning there weren't all the ads now there's an overabundance of ads and things,trying to make you buy. I would have given it five stars but too many ads.

Buggy, ad-filled. There's 30 seconds of ads after every 2nd puzzle. Lots of "buggy" ads, causing accidental clicks, navigation to sales site, or hangs requiring phone reboot. Now it's forcing me to upgrade to latest version and all progress is lost. Don't start.
I like this game it definitely helps to pass the time. It is challenging at times. When you think you know what word to put in...and it makes you have to think a little.

So far I am enjoying this game. It helps stimulate the brain. This is a step up for those that love Word Search or Cross Word Puzzles. Give it a try! I am positive that you will make this activity a part of your daily routine. Very relaxing!
Game great. Don't like 30 second commercials. Commercials should run just long enough to show advertiser's name. Play on train to and from job site. Can't waste time on 30 second commercials.

description:
A deadly virus has swept the world.Almost all of humanity have turned into zombies. Lead your followers to survive the apocalypse: that is your quest.
Match-3 Puzzle meets Strategy! Solve the mysteries and build an impenetrable sanctuary. The future of humanity is in your hands.
Tip: Use your brain to defend your brain!

‚Äª STRATEGY + MATCH-3‚Äª

comments: Loved this game even though it is 1000% pay to win. Several features that make it fun and allow you freedom to do almost anything you want. Had it rated at 5*, until the new update dropped and they changed the cost of server immigration. I started on server 188, and moved to server 21. When I moved it cost 12 immigration tickets, equivalent to $60 if bought outright. After the new update, if I decided to go back to 188, it would now be 60 tickets, equivalent to $300. That is laughable. 1*/5*

I Finally have found another game that I'm enthralled with. I thought I wouldn't like it because of the monsters (i.e ZOMBIES) oh contrary. Even though it's not anything like the advertisements it's still alright. Just bring your patience and u to won't be able to put it down. To the Developers I may change my mind and give it 5 stars, depending upon any bugs that I may encounter after the recent upgrade(s.)

A game that can be highly addictive. It has a steep learning curve and requires A LOT of time and dedication. While is it an undoubtedly pay-to-win game, you can still enjoy most of its content playing at your own level and pace. The game's events are fairly generous, and there are ALWAYS events. The biggest criticisms are its p2w nature and the big bullying the weaker. I highly recommend joining a competent and helpful alliance, and keeping resources in your bag where it can't be plundered.

Game is excellent for those who want to pay for everything . For us few whom don't pay to play the game takes more time th,an anyone could expect , we don't have day's to spend collecting resources when we end up eventually getting what we need , we get plundered by players who are always more than 6 Levels higher than us , how are we supposed to grow when the game is against the non paying players , there has to be a cut-off point as to how many levels higher a player can be before attacking .

False advertisement. Game is not what the ads look like. It's also glitchy and very slow. Unless you pour money into this game your growth is very limited and unless you like sending troops out and wait to see the results there really isn't much else to this game. It's slow! The only thing this game did well is the alliance system. Players on the game are generally nice and helpful.

title: Slapstick Fighter - Stickman Ragdoll Fighting Game
description:
Featuring physics based fighting which makes your stickman fighters interact realistically with each other & the environment. Unlike other stickman games your limbs have a physical presence in the game, while still giving your stick man tight responses to your inputs. 

We were able to keep the best part of physics based fighting games, dynamic rag doll stick fight finishes, while still giving you full control of your stickman while you fight. Other fighting games either miss out on physics combat, or make their ragdoll games with sloppy controls. 

No other stick man games offer this amount of simple controls, deep fighting, realistic movement and ragdoll fun.

Controls were designed to be simple and playable with two fingers, or thumbs. Most inputs are taps making it as easy to play as the best tap games, while at the same time keeping more game play depth then most stickman games.

Arenas in the game range from a traditional martial arts dojo to city rooftops.

You can also challenge your friends on the same device. Finally end your rivalry and find out who is the supreme rooftop city fighter.

Fight styles range from straight brawler, kick boxing, and a giant thug. 

In addition to different fight styles, a range of equipment makes each stick fight unique.

Arenas also have different mechanics. Arenas will change in size and feature spring boards, ice floors and spike walls all aimed at making the ragdoll games more dynamic.

comments: Fun and simple, easy to pick up. Works great on mobile devices, dosen't try to be something it's not. This is exactly what a mobile game should be. My only problem is it makes you watch adds to unlock items to customize your character. It even makes you watch adds to change your characters color. They should either let me buy the items with in-game currency, or remove customization entirely.

it's a perfect game with four unique gamemodes, unique defense and attack weapons, and the controls are super simple! yet the game still manages to make every single level so much different, even if they're the exact same! I would definitely recommend this game, my only criticism on it is that you can't use baseball bats in two player matches

I some what like this game. The only thing that is getting me real mad is there is so much ads, you cant go a second without seeing ads. IT LITERLLY AT THE BOTTOM OF YOUR SCREEN WHEN YOU ARE FIGHTING. But the only thing is that is kind of... dont know... But its weird. Like hitting people with a bat?! Killing, hurting. Dont play this game if you dont like that stuff. But its pretty good. I give this a 3/5.

Its a great fighting game. Its simple and i can quickly memerize the controls. It is fun and not too easy. It is a challenging game but winnable. Its about strategy and smarts which i like. I finished it in only a few days. The adds are pretty often but but im able to get around them. I can understand because its free but they pop up a little too often. Cant wait for more content.

While a pretty fun game most of the time, I have some gripes with the minimalistic controls. They're not really the best for a fighting game such as this, especially the double tap for the fall-back and rush attacks. Plus, having to retreat to block usually nullifies it's usefulness, as most of the attacks that can't break a block won't be able to follow you if you're walking back. And the need to tap twice for some attacks makes input extremely unintuitive. Nonetheless, I had a lot of fun!

title: Rob Master 3D
description:
Play with the charming and smart criminal, and try to sneak in various properties in order to collect precious items.
Varying mini-games will relieve all your stress.
Become the master of robbery!

comments: This game is bland, the minigame collection that this game presents has games where you can win with very minimal effort; I didn't have fun playing this game. Not to mention the fact that this game has so many ads that not even turning on airplane mode could remove some of them. Also the visuals look somehow worse than a PS1 game, how is that even possible! If someone forced me to beat this game or have them shoot me, I'd pull the trigger myself. ~Haremf*****249

This game is bland. All the levels keep repeating and they're all no challenge whatsoever. The ads are just too much. You don't even get to keep the characters you unlock. You have them for one level and then you're back with the original and that one mini game where you throw money at your furniture, it always ends up getting furnished the same way and the game's honestly just bad quality altogether.

I love robbery games and I'm so glad you made this i will give you two stars but unfortunately this game is same with a new texture. All levels are easy except one because it's broken. Everything feels like a chore. The extra characters are dumb there generic and bright. The prison escape game is broken it doesn't work properly. The objects are there for one round. I all the way to 100 which says alot

This game was fun but, why its rated so low is due to the lack of doing anything really, you just collect money. I wish you could change clothing or something, or at least buy or upgrade houses or land but, there is nothing to do other than unlock skins that doesn't work. I wish this will get better over time but, like most apps like this, I doubt it but, who knows, also it sometimes lags or crashes.

This game is just truly magnificent. The aspects of drip and robbing is life changing. I believe that people who play this game ascend beyond human comprehension. I love this game because the scenes where it has the diamond testers and 6ix9ine is just mind-blowingly astronomical. People who play this game don't need other mobile games. This game makes other games look like 0 stars. The greatest part about this game is that it's free. The only criticism I have is that most people don't play it.

comments: It's so fun! You have options as mastering levels or going freely on maps! You can customize your character too. You can add things to your map and change trick speed and more. There's no adds either or a long loading screen. You can grow Your skills and master all moves and ramps. Recommend to 7-8 + (Cause controls can be difficult without a tutorial)

This game is great. The trick animations are cool and the park creation is fantastic. But for getting good at this game there is a noticeable learning curve in getting high points for tricks. Also, the currency system is rather steep to get ahold of and you will have to grind a lot of you don't want to pump money into this game. Other than that, Skate Space is just a fun way to pass time and do some insanely cool stunts.

To be completely honest, this game fun but I don't think its at it's full potential. I like how it feels like skate 3 and how u can edit your own parks, but instead of having to unlock tricks, u should be able to do all of them. If your thinking about getting this game, I highly recommend getting it, though it's not the best, it still holds up.

Very fun game. The idea of the game (skateboarding) came across very well. You can do a bunch of cool tricks and edit your map. You can also change your map and your character. The overall performance is very good as well. It takes a bit of getting used to but when you do, it is a very fun game to play. If I could I would rate this game higher. It's a 10/10 for me, I hope you'll enjoy it to.
The game is AMAZING! You can ride a skateboard do cool tricks The p One thing I wish for is when you go on the board I wish you could flick the joystick up. Besides that it's an amazing game

comments: Great if not for the bugs. I'm up to level 9 of the insane puzzles, but every time I click to play it, a different (lower) puzzle opens that I have already completed. I'll back out to the main menu and try again, but will get yet another different puzzle. For example, I'll get puzzle 7, then 3, then 6, all instead of 9 which I should be getting to play. As well, a few puzzles refer to "hand" in the clues but "head" on the grid itself. Otherwise I'm really enjoying this app/game

I love playing this game, but all of the problems in the game stop me! In the Normal levels once you get to level 172 at least one of the clues is in a different language which prevents you from completing the puzzle. Once you reach level 38 in the Hard level it won't let you go any farther - and the same problem in the insane level. You can't go past level 8. Sure there are some spelling mistakes, but the glitches need to be fixed! Disappointing..

Very nice game! The levels are adequately challenging based on difficulty. I found this game through an ad. Given the amount of scam advertisements these days, I assumed the game would not be as advertised at all but it surprisingly is just as depicted. There's also no annoying ads popping up every few seconds like in other games. You only get 1 after each puzzle but they tend to be short. And if you play higher difficulty levels the timing between ads is ok since it takes a while to complete.

I really love these kinds of logic problems. They're fun and entertaining. This app is a great concept with good design and godawful implementation. A lot of the clues are written clunkily, as if they've been translated a few times, and some of them are straight up wrong. Not to mention the app's lack of zoom function for larger puzzles. It has a wide variety of puzzles, though not all actually function.

Some bugs! The first "insane" puzzle all the clues say "hand" and the puzzle says "arm". I had to re-do it several times. When you saw the puzzle wrong it gives you the option to erase your mistakes, but every time I did that it started the puzzle over completely. I would like to love this app, but in this state it is almost unplayable

title: SortPuz: Water Color Sorting Puzzle Games
description:
SortPuz is a very fun and challenge casual color water puzzle game with a huge breakthrough in the gameplay of puzzles. üå°Ô∏è Sort liquid of various colors into glass bottle according to the water color, so that each bottle is filled with the same color.

The color sort puzzle game interface is very simple and the sort operation is very easy, but it exercises your logical ability very much. üòÄ üòÄ With the increase of colors and bottles, the difficulty of water sorting puzzle will gradually increase. Rich and interesting game levels are here waiting for you to challenge! Enjoy SortPuz: Water Color Sorting Puzzle Games!

< SortPuz > features:
‚ù§Ô∏è One finger control to complete the sorting games
‚ù§Ô∏è Thousands of color match levels
‚ù§Ô∏è Play it for free
‚ù§Ô∏è Exercise your brain with color sort
‚ù§Ô∏è Best spare Time Killer
‚ù§Ô∏è Small running memory but good experience
‚ù§Ô∏è Play science games anytime, anywhere
‚ù§Ô∏è Easy play, hard to master my-water
‚ù§Ô∏è Support phones and tablets

< SortPuz > Gameplay:
üß™ Tap any glass to pour colored water into another glass. The rule is that only water of the same color and there is enough space on the tube can pour each other.
üß™ Try not to get stuck with coloring water, and don‚Äôt worry if you get stuck in color-switch, you can restart the level of water sort at any time.
üß™ You can also choose to add sorting props, add a tube to hold the coloring water.

Notes: You need to learn the rules of pouring water carefully and use them proficiently to get it right.
Only by mastering the color games rules can you quickly spell out the combination of water bottles and do right color match. üåà üåà

Dear players, we hope you're having fun playing our game! We read all your reviews carefully to make the game even better for you.Please leave us some comments to let us know why you love our game and what you'd like us to improve it!
comments: I actually think that this isn‚Äôt that great that the previous one. I honestly loved the older version to the point I play it the whole day, but I can‚Äôt seem to find it. Disappointing. It was clean, simple and just relaxing. I didn't mind the ads since you can play it offline and you can have additional bottles for a single ad. Please, if the developer/s sees this comment, please take this into consideration. Or release another game or apk with the older one because that used to be my favorite.

This is one of those mindless kind of games you play when you can't get to sleep at night. That's not to say it's bad at all. It's actually quite good at what it's trying to achieve. It's not bogged down with story when it shouldn't be, It's mostly very pleasant to look at, and there's not too many ads. Um...the only thing I might change is the art for the flasks...I am a perv but they kind of look like condoms ngl. But, yes pretty entertaining, very satisfying. Would totally donate art for it.

I'm at level 710 and I have 100 coins. There are no rewards for completing the puzzles which forces you to watch ads to get coins. Isn't completing 700 levels deserving of at least something? The colors are also kinda gross. Brown, gray, puke-green, yellow and orange make me want to vomit.... I suggest adding more rewards and changing the color pallete. The actual puzzle is fine. Just fine. Good for passing time. Needs work though.

ADS ALL THE TIME. Way too many ads, which sucks because the game really can be addictive... but there is an ad in between EVERY LEVEL, EVERY restart, EVERY time you want to replenish your "undo's"; and if that's not bad enough, every time you leave the app (say for a phone call or to check another app) they plan another ad when you come back to it, even if you just watched one before you left!!! Honestly I played a lot of levels, but I'm sick of it - uninstalling!

Some ads will go to a black screen after it plays then knock you out of the game completely. When back in, you start allover. An ad is played after every game. I watched more ads than I played the game. It is a cute game but I just wanted to play and didn't get to. The issues I had made it unenjoyable so sadly, I will be deleting. Good luck in making it better for others.

title: Need for Speed‚Ñ¢ No Limits
description:
Claim the crown and rule the underground as you race for dominance in the first white-knuckle edition of Need for Speed made just for mobile ‚Äì from the game developer that brought you Real Racing 3. 

Build the ride that shows your style with a range of cars and customizations. Launch yourself between chaos and control as you hit the pedal and roll into underground street racing. Takedown the competition, up your rep, then kick into more races, more customizations, and more cars. Make your choices and never look back.

This app offers in app purchases. You may disable in app purchases using your device settings.

CUSTOMIZE EXTREME RIDES
Stock your garage with the real-world cars you have always wanted, from manufacturers such as Bugatti, Lamborghini, McLaren, Pagani, Koenigsegg, Hennessey, and more. Then trick them out with the our in-game customization system from spots like the Mod Shop and the Black Market, giving you over 2.5 million custom combos to play with. Your rides are waiting ‚Äì take them to the streets to go head-to-head with the competition and prove yourself. 

DRIVE FAST ‚Äì AND FEARLESS 
Steer onto the streets of Blackridge, accelerate over jumps and around debris, into traffic, against walls, and through high-speed Nitro Zones. Flip on the nitrous and thrust yourself into another level of adrenaline-fueled driving and drifting. Around every corner is a fresh race as you clash with local crews and local cops. It‚Äôs a world full of wannabe drivers ‚Äì can you stay in front and earn respect? 

RACE TO WIN
Never back down as you race anyone crazy enough to take you on and increase your rep. Dig, drift, drag, and roll your ride to the finish line while outrunning the police on your tail. Burn rubber in over 1,000 challenging races ‚Äì and that‚Äôs just the starting line. Be notorious, own the streets, and score the world‚Äôs best cars. Because one ride is never enough!

---------------------

summary:
Dominate the competition and rule the streets.
Download to race now!
recentChanges:
In this update:

‚Ä¢ Team up with Tyler during an unprecedented storm to get the Bugatti Centodieci
‚Ä¢ Take on a new challenger in the XRC to earn the Lotus Evora GT430
‚Ä¢ Earn the '67 Chevrolet Camaro SS in the latest Proving Grounds

Plus, new customization options are now available in the Modshop, a new car series debuts, and we have all-new video content in our Inbox. Join the conversation and look out for more surprises by following @nfsnl on our official Instagram.
comments: Great racing competitive multiplayer racing games, with good graphics to top up all that action. With the nitro and drifting. This is the full package. Of the need. The NEED FOR SPEED. I just wish you could make a more larger map. This time don't add boundaries a white line should tell you this is the race line. And make bigger jumps. And lastly scenes of the player and Kim, Tyler, Darius and all the people not just words and pictures talking. The game sometimes crashes for an unknown reason

Good game BUT 1.FUEL It limits your experience. At least do 1 fuel per race and lower the gold for the refill 2. Even if you pay, you have to pay more. The game isn't generous. It's not giving money, gold etc. and the items you win to upgrade stuff is like lottery. Also, when replaying a stage it takes fuel 3. EXTREMELY overpriced. Vip, store even with game currency everything is too pricey. EA can do better than this. At least the campaign shouldn't be that limited. I'm done with the payments

I love the graphics, animations, n the concept, but I really hate how time consuming this game can be 4 us to progress. It's almost impossible to without paying anything with real money. Some events even need certain cars to join, but it's really difficult to get the blueprints free through other chapters. In the end, you'd have to pay to but the blueprints. Spareparts to upgrade are also hard to get, which again resulting you to pay to get them, which I won't do cuz it's not worth it.

Going through the reviews. Not a very good game if you have to pay to win. Underground is a joke, especially if the car you are racing is faster than you. At least in career you can hit cars to slow them down. Underground you race against a ghost car that has no damage and can drive through cop car. Lol

Good quality cars are expensive, getting blueprints for free, is a nightmare . Getting the necessary upgrades for your car expensive, Gold is expensive, VIP points are expensive. Basically if u are a casual gamer like me it good but fuel runs out too quickly. Think abt this, I once saw a Lamborghini blueprints for R900! I could either spend money on one car or actually use the same money to buy ps4 games, almost everything on the game is expensive

comments: Yall I almost never leave reviews EVER and this game is super good! The graphics ate good quality and there are some times in the game where you can make your own choices of what to add to the makeup look! Not like those other makeup games you get bored of quickly. My only issue with the game is that sometimes it's a tad bit laggy after doing a certain makeup part or freezes for a moment, and the ads though theres really not much of them! You only really get them after finishing the makeup look.

This is a really good game, but there is a few things I don't like about it.nNumber one, it had SO many ads. And when you have finished watching an ad, it restarts your make-up progress and you have to start again. Annoying.Only download this app if you can deal with these things.

This game is fun and it is really cool but this game has way to much adds. To much adds to really play the game. When I finish putting on one makeup, there is an add. There was an add as soon as I finished putting all the makeup on the girl and then I tried to say no thanks for x3 cash but there was an add over it so I couldn't. This game needs less adds. Uninstalling now.

I mean... it's okay. Your just basically doing the same thing over and over again but the graphics are cool and I like that abt it but it got boring quick and you just do the same thing over and over. I dont rly recommend

The game was really fun. But the ads are just insane! Every step I do there's always an ad before I do the next step it's really aggravating if the ads were not bad the game would have a five star from me

title: Merge Life
description:
In Merge Life, you will decorate your child‚Äôs room as they grow up! Become obsessed with endless interior design projects, but don‚Äôt forget about the child's needs, as they‚Äôll start crying and misbehaving. Your goal is to merge items to complete ‚Äúorders‚Äù like a bottle of milk or a toy. And as you complete orders you‚Äôll get golden stars (for being a good parent!) that you will use to upgrade the bedroom and accessories!

Once you‚Äôre finished with the bedroom, it‚Äôll be time to make the toddlers room! And then the tweens room, then the teens room, all the way up to their first apartment. Make sure the room's interior design matches the age!

There are millions of items to merge and unlock, exploration will lead to game changing discoveries. As you level up through the game, the child has to choose a life path option - astronaut, athlete, or rockstar. Help them in this important decision-making process!

Decorate the Child‚Äôs Room: Decorate as they grow up!
Merge Items to Complete Item Orders: Merge items together to complete your tasks for a specific item.
Unlock New Items: As you level up through the game, you can unlock new mergeable items.

Merge Life is so much fun. Join and see for yourself today!

Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

From the Studio that brought you Mr. Bullet, Happy Glass, Ink Inc and Love Balls!

Follow us to get news and updates on our other Award Winning titles;
https://lionstudios.cc/

Instagram.com/LionStudioscc

recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: The game play itself is very fun, I even enjoy it more than other merge apps I've played, but the ads ruin the experience. You can't go a full minute of game play without an ad, which is just too much. Ads don't usually bother me, but it makes the game frustrating, especially since some of the ads make the game freeze so you have to restart the app.
I love this!!! I paid for no ads and don't mind watching one or two here and there to get a few bonuses!!! It's highly addictive and I need new content cos I'm already at Age 33!!!!!!

Too expensive, too many ads. I begrudgingly paid to remove the forced ads, but it doesn't get rid off the ads you need to get a handful of energy, which of course runs out so quickly, in essence trying to force you to buy more gems to to get more gems. Definitely a pay to play, it would be fun if it actually let you play for free for more than 2 minutes.

It is a really fun game. But its almost unplayable with how many ads are in this gane. Everytime you do one of the missions (which is just simply merging something together and claiming the mission) you get an ad. So while i could have done 5 missions in 2 minutes i have to sit and watch an ad in between every one. So those 2 minutes turn into 7 minutes. At least make the ads a little less active. I uninstalled it from annoyance.

Ad hell. Get to age 1 and suddenly every time you turn something in a single merge or otherwise and you have an ad. And 4 dollars to basically even get to play this game which isnt eve great to begin with. It runs fine but the whole concept seems to be built around taking peoples money "pop this bubble only 20 gems." "You ran out of energy would lile like to refill?" Doesnt feel much like a game. Just a quick cash grab. Damn mobile can be so disappointing.

title: Bounce and collect
description:
In Bounce and collect you have to drop balls in the right place to collect the maximum and unlock the next challenge.
Enjoy!
descriptionHTML:
In Bounce and collect you have to drop balls in the right place to collect the maximum and unlock the next challenge.
Enjoy!
summary: More balls!!!
recentChanges: - Bug Fixes
comments: Used to be a fun and relaxing game while still maintaining a modicum of strategy. Before the recent update. Now it's just frustrating. My last level, 443, I had 6,273 balls at the end of the first stage. Dropped them through a 2x AND 3x multiplier, and what did I end with? 2,009. That's not just broken; it makes you want to throw your phone in frustration when you're just trying to get a high score. CHANGE IT BACK!

good concept. problem is the ADS. Interupting the game, you watch an ad after each game. worst of all, the ads SLOW the app down to a point it's not longer able to be played. the "high score" list is absolutely BS. Play the game offline and the names still change. they are just random generated names. waste of time. --UNINSTALLED!

The game is a weird. For some reason you get stars when the stars do absolutely nothing. And the leader board is obviously full of not real people, and after a while (top 1000) you need to always get "better than 99%" to even move more than 2 spots. And for some reason after a while when the box is full the multipliers just stop working and the same with any special block. The game is fun but it gets really repetitive after about 4 hours of playing. This is a decent game If you like wasting time

It's a fun game overall, but once voodoo bought it, it just went downhill. It used to occasionally have ads ever few levels, but you could just turn off wifi to not see them. Now you are forced to play with internet or else you will literally not be able to do anything. All in all it's a fun game and worth a download, I just wish you weren't forced to use internet.

This game is the best but I have a couple of problems. First of all you are showing ads in the middle of the gameplay and I can't like concentrate and it's getting pretty annoying. The second problem I'm having is the lag and the freezing. When the balls are adding up a lot, it's a problem which causes the game to lag and bug a little bit. Even when I started playing the game, it freezes and idk why but please fix this mess right now or I'm uninstalling this app!

title: Word Connect
description:
üíïDo you enjoy the excitement of classic word games? Are you a real puzzle game master? DOWNLOAD Word Connect for FREE! Start your word story and enjoy the brainstorm NOW! üíï
 
Simply swipe the letter blocks and build words to collect coins! Find the clues to solve the crossword puzzles! DOWNLOAD Word Connect NOW to begin training your brain and become a word master!
 
It‚Äôs time to uncover hidden words and build as many words as possible! Come and begin your word story!
 
What makes Word Connect so special?
 
‚Ä¢ Authoritative Dictionaries! The game is powered by Oxford Dictionaries.
‚Ä¢ Addictive gameplay! Simply swipe the letters to build words! 
‚Ä¢ Tons of words! 13596 levels in total await!
‚Ä¢ Different Modes! You can choose from normal mode, crossword mode and the daily challenge! Come and solve different puzzles!
‚Ä¢ Daily Bonuses! Log in every day to play exciting daily puzzles to collect big bonuses!
‚Ä¢ Alternative Themes! Up to 11 cool themes for you to choose from!
‚Ä¢ Vintage Style! Our wooden block graphics will bring back nostalgic childhood memories!
‚Ä¢ Hidden Bonus! Extra words are waiting to be discovered! Find extra words to collect bigger bonuses!
‚Ä¢ Play Together! Ask your family members and friends for help to solve the puzzles and send coins to each other on Facebook!
‚Ä¢ No time limits! You can use your time wisely to find new words at your own pace!
‚Ä¢ Level List! Want to check previous levels? Go back to the Level List and play again!
‚Ä¢ Offline Mode! No wifi? Don‚Äôt worry, you can play Word Connect anytime, anywhere even without a network connection!
‚Ä¢ Multiple Choices! Supported on both phone and tablet.
 
Word Connect is an app designed to train your brain and learn new words all while having a great time. Share the fun with your family & friends and enjoy Word Connect together!

This year, we are going to have a series of updates to bring you a better game experience! Get ready for the new era of Word Connect and enjoy your own word story!

recentChanges:
A new version of Word Connect is available!

1. Join the BBQ Picnic event from August 16th to 22nd:
- Prepare your BBQ Picnic and win rewards!

comments: (2020)-Too many ads and some that run too long. Been playing this game for over 4 years and it used to be my favorite game, but now it is my least liked game due to the ads and too many game competitions. It needs a feature that allows players to communicate with one another or the developer via chat or something similar for either questions, concerns, assistance, etc, not ads that take up more time than playing the game. Wish the developer would consider these changes. 07/21/21- too many ads!

Game is very challenging. Been playing for over 4 years. Love the various special activities. The badge tournaments are my favorite need more. Helps pass time. Was playing this game on a flight those near me wanted to know the name of the game. My husband loves it. Love the daily challenge events and other opportunities to earn coins. Need more time to view dictionary after last word.

Great game, lots of different words, never a dull moment. Keeps your brain in trim. The more levels you do the more obscure the words are. Well worth playing. Love the daily challenge. Always adding new levels, although some words are spelt the American way. Don't always get the Thanksgiving, St Patrick's Day, Halloween bonuses. Always good to play when you have a spare 10 or 30 minutes. Game spoilt by far too many adverts, most are over 30 seconds long and you get 3 adverts between each level

awesome, good brain activity, stimulates my mind, enjoyable, addictive good, fun loving, I love the new point system. The new challenges are super super fun. I love the theme challenges. 5 star game. The great challenges promises to be even more exciting. Thank you for the extra points for every season. Extra points all of the time. Seasonal games to play for extra points. I love the unexpected points. The Easter theme is very pretty. The themes are seasonal.i love it. Brain teaser.

Like the new version, I'm enjoy playing everyday ‚ò∫Ô∏è I see they have upgraded the game to make it more challenging, adding more on the daily challenge. There are too many advertisments, in this game, make me not want to play sometime. The advertisements are making the game not fun anymore TOO MANY ADS! The ads are becoming very annoying, please less ads. The advertisements are to long, the apps keep closing. Did we upgrade the game? I really enjoy this game.

title: Dice Kings
description:
Download Dice Kings for FREE to roll your way to riches in the most unique dice game on the Play Store!

DAILY COMPETITIONS
Roll DOUBLES and break the SUPER CROWN to climb the ranks in daily competitions to win!

BIG JACKPOTS
SMASH your way to success as you grow your jackpot by attacking the Dice King. Win energy to CHARGE up the ATM for the chance to win!

Dice Kings isn‚Äôt just another board game. This is a whole new way to play dice!

Dice Kings Features:
