comments: Honestly it's an almost fun game, no I don't believe cashing out is possible at all, but its still ok to play, the smashable boxes have a habit of being in VERY hard to reach areas, and cash (points) able to be won from individuals should be limited to $5 max, only 2 stars because, 1 this company is well known for NOT paying its players 2 false advertising 3 unreachable objectives

I have been playing this game for over a month and I was up to almost 700.00 then I go to bed and got up and they had let someone take 168.00 from me. You have to wait forever to get a chance to try and get your money and of course you don't. Even the green boxes are rigged and the site never works right. I want my money. I down loaded it to make some money to help with my social security and instead I am fed up. What's worse is my son's saying we told you so.

Just a waste. The ads are ridiculous! You can't even trade the coins you collect for the gift cards in the store. The jackpot you supposedly collect you never win. You will get all but one puzzle piece to actually have a chance to win their bigger gift cards. You basically have to buy dice to keep going in the game. Lots of work needs to be done on this game. At least let the players spend the coins collected instead of them being dead. If we could do negative stars I would.

Game was fun got hacked in my face had a balance of 100.00 rolled looked up at my balance it went to 76.00 I'm always playing players with low atm balance. The revenge play no ad to load come back later...Then when I do play someone with a high ATM balance the game switches from that player or if you are lucky to get a ATM challenge you'll only get like 4 or 5 dollars out of their ATM Game is phony !! Wasted money and time never could cash out . Take the rest of my $ uninstalling!!

Game starts out nice but the close you get to rewards all of a sudden you start getting oops something went wrong and it keeps you from winning like the game up until that point and I was ready to cash out and then it does everything I can to keep you from it including let other people in to see you money I won on their crown game and it says your awarded I was awarded $60 and it still refuses to pay out it throws ads up when you're trying to win to try to disrupt you sucks

title: slither.io
description:
Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?

If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!

In slither.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!

Download now and start slithering! Good luck!
descriptionHTML:
Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?

If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!

In slither.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!

Download now and start slithering! Good luck!
summary: Play online with people all over the world! Can YOU become the longest player?
recentChanges:
Added cosmetic support

Improved gameplay speed
comments: I LOVE IT!! It's so fun and the controls are extremely easy to get used to... Two problems, though... The game lags if you don't have a really good connection on multiplayer, and me, being a person who mostly plays offline, asks you that the offline snakes be a BIT bigger? When you're playing offline and you get really big, all you can find is tiny snakes. The ones on the leader board aren't actually on the map. All I ask is that there be some bigger snakes on offline mode. Otherwise, perfect!

Would be a spectacular game if the owners weren't greedy and lazy. PC players have a massive advantage over mobile, able to zoom out their field of view. Blows my mind anyone would even play this on PC in the first place, but to each their own. Player controlled griefing bots are endless, merciless, and sap all joy from the game. I've had snakes go right through my body, straight to the head. Oh, sure, okay. This game is broke as hell. Was fun for like 20 hours. Bots ruined the whole experience.

It's fun..but.. It feels as if it's lacking somewhere. Perhaps if offered in the "offline", ai play, difficulty levels. Even though I play decently & play .io games,. A faster snake almost always gets me! I Want to play this game! Love the look of it, buttttttttt it gets annoying It's fun factor is short lived. üòï I've prolly deleted about 5 times already. Few months later, try it again..ü§ó then..oh it's still the same. Paper.io is better. I'll try again in 6 to 8 months ;)ü§ë

This is one of the best games ever, well done to the creaters! This is a very simple, easy-going and straightforward game. It is a bit laggy sometimes but that is fine. I would recommend this game to anyone. This is also a good time killer and I love how you can make your own skin. You can also do lots of skills in the game. To kill, I just stick my tail out, trap or rush into someone's face. I am now so good at this game and get 1st place sometimes. Right now, My highest score is 74,710.

I want to love the simplicity and mindless effort in this game, I really do. But every single time I have a good amount of time invested in a game and I'm at a good momentum building length, everything I'm looking at disappears and I'm left staring at the black back round. Every. Single. Time. Zero issues with my phone and internet. If my daughter plays on her phone or computer (she has the same phone), she has no issues. Crashes way too much.

title: Color Switch
description:
From the creator of Color Switch comes Color Switch: Phoenix, a re-envisioning of the original game.

With 200 million downloads and counting, Color Switch was the fastest mobile game in history to reach 50 million downloads and is loved by players in over 150 countries. With this new version of Color Switch we‚Äôre bringing you even more challenges, mini games, and very exciting new features not seen before.

How to Play
‚óè Tap, Tap, Tap to get the ball past each obstacle.
‚óè Follow the color pattern to cross each obstacle.
‚óè Timing and Patience are the keys to victory.
‚óè Earn stars to unlock new balls.
‚óè Beat Every Challenge and get a High Score in Endless
‚óè New Modes and Levels added with each update

Please send all feedback to support@colorswitch.co. We'd love to hear from you!

comments: Well.. It is a very good app from my experience, its very addicting and entertaining but there's just one or two things wrong with it. Firstly when I pause because I have to do something in an infinity game, when you unpause I feel like it should keep you where you are and wait for you to rap again, like it would if u spent stars to continue. I also feel like there should be a mute button to turn the music/hopping sound off

This game is a blast!!! Please more modes. I'm having so much fun with this game. Definitely one of the best ones yet. I understand the ads and it's Ok. More updates would be great. It is okay if you take your time. I'll be waiting because of all the levels. Great game overall. Out of 10. 9/10. And out of 5. Well. 5/5. Hope you read this have a wonderful day / night‚ù§Ô∏è

This app is amazing despite the ads!There are many levels to try and play. You can get stars by playing these and you can spend them on different balls! You can even get rewards and other things that can help you on your way to becoming a pro! Not only this , but the game itself is amazing and i have no doubts(except the amount of ads).And the best thing of this is how you can play offline and you don't have to worry!It is amazing and i definitely recommend this app!

Its fun game and i would get it again if i had nothing to do and i would give it five stars but theres a few things that bother me when playing, first of all the theres a pretty big delay when im clicking to move the ball im not sure if this is only for me or with others too, second there is no mute botton to mute the music in the game so i can't listen to music or things like that while playing.

Great game, (I've played this when it was not ad-based and now its shocking!) but I would like to share a few problems: 1. there should be a start from beginning button when you pause. 2. at least you should give like an ad in 3..2..1... since when I click on the screen and an ad pops out I've mistakenly clicked on the ad... 3. When you watch an ad to continue or unpause the game you should start little away from the obstacles. Every time it just touches the obstacle the moment you continue...

title: Tetris¬Æ
description:
Welcome to TETRIS¬Æ, the official mobile app for the world‚Äôs favorite puzzle game. Hang out and chat with friends in private TETRIS TOGETHER matches, battle to be the last one standing in 100-player TETRIS ROYALE mode, play a quick round to beat your own score, or play infinite rounds to master your skills in the TETRIS Single Player Modes. TETRIS forever!

Enjoy the ultimate block puzzle game with these amazing features:

üëë TETRIS ROYALE üëë
‚Ä¢ Battle against 99 other players in last-one-standing matches.
‚Ä¢ Clear lines and use boosters to send attacks or defend your Matrix from Garbage.
‚Ä¢ Earn Tournament Points to climb limited-time leaderboards and win rewards.

ü§ù TETRIS TOGETHER ü§ù
‚Ä¢ Invite friends to compete in your own private matches.
‚Ä¢ Customize these puzzle games to your group‚Äôs skill level.
‚Ä¢ Talk to each other while you play with real-time voice chat!

üïπÔ∏è TETRIS SINGLE PLAYER üïπÔ∏è
‚Ä¢ Master your skills with the iconic Tetris gameplay you know and love.
* Pick between the Traditional mode for endless rounds or the new Quick Mode for when you want to play Tetris but only have a few minutes to play. 
‚Ä¢ Rotate Tetriminos, clear lines and crush your high score.
‚Ä¢ Available offline - enjoy Tetris anytime, anywhere.

üèÜ JOIN A TEAM üèÜ
‚Ä¢ Squad up and chat with friends
‚Ä¢ Work together to complete shared objectives and earn rewards as a Team
‚Ä¢ Compete against other Teams in Tetris Tournaments

üß© PUZZLE YOUR WAY üß©

The world‚Äôs favorite block puzzle game is now a game for everyone to play together, anywhere. Tetris forever!

recentChanges: New season progression is available with unique rewards for you to claim. Be sure to complete as many Season Goals as you can before the season ends!
comments: this version is substantially worse than the 2017 version from EA. This doesn't control as precise. In offline games, if you choose out then your game is not saved. Lastly it takes way to long to load. This game came out in 1985, why does it take over 12 seconds to load? These devs would make a lot more money if they optimized such a simple game.

Play To Win microtransactions ruin an otherwise fun version of this game. The battle royale is so fun, but you can just pay for powerups that make you nearly unbeatable. The art, themes, avatars, challenges are fun, make it engaging and exciting to push for better. But microtransactions spoil the entire experience. A season pass is fair and fun, but pay to win microtransactions are inexcusable. Sad to see a great game taken advantage of in this way for profit.

I would rate this game 5 stars as I love it, I enjoy playing the royale mode and I love how each month they bring out a new season. However, I've rated it 3 stars because having to watch an ad before EVERY SINGLE game is completely ridiculous. It ruins the game, especially when you have to watch ads for the lucky box on top of that. The amount of ads makes me stop playing because I can't be bothered watching them before each game.

The gamelay itself is fine, it's just good old Tetris. However, the game has way too much ads, every start and end of a game you would get an ad, we get that you need the ad-revenue, but why every single game? The voluntary ads are acceptable as it's your choice to watch it, but was there really a need to spam ads every game? Another problem is the fact that the Tetris Royale mode is very Pay 2 Win. The game would be better if you fixed all of this.

Just an alright way to play Tetris. The game has touch controls by default and they're actually pretty good but it is way too easy to accidentally register drop downs when on default sens. There are on screen buttons which are better but again they feel too easy to clic. The contsnt updates are cool but there is an ad every new game which is really annoying and there is a SUBCRIPTION SERVICE TO REMOVE THEM. Plus no marathon mode unlocked at the start. Also of course there are microtransactions.

FNF Music Live is a fun music simulation game. You can experience a lot of popular songs featuring several characters: Boyfriend, Girlfriend, Daddy Dearest, Mommy Nearest, Monster and Spirit. Besides that, we have some guest characters like Skid and Pump, Pico, Tankman and Whitty.

Featured:

- Easy to play
- Interesting experiment

We always update the product to be the best, try it out and don't forget to leave a review. Thanks !

title: Mighty Party: Magic Arena
description:
Mighty Party is a turn-based strategy RPG that is an excellent example of combining action, strategy, battle rpg and turn-based roleplaying games. We took the best from different genres to create an amazing experience for you in the world of Massively Online Role-Playing Games. Challenge mobile gamers from all over the world, crush your enemies in battle arenas and rise to the top! We will change the way you think about Battle chess RPG games!

Various battlefields with random obstacles and different heroes with unique bonuses 
to hone your strategy skills. Explore the map, defeat powerful bosses and mighty magical creatures, build your storyline, accept quests and embark on a journey! 
Assemble your forces and lead your Mighty Party to Victory!

Collect and evolve hundreds of heroes and monsters with unique abilities and epic combinations of magic and fighting skills. Upgrade their equipment and skills, marvel at their new costumes and abilities, strengthen your team! Warriors, Knights, Undead, Mages, Elves, Dragons, Orcs - there are hundreds of magical creatures and countless characters to choose from!

Plan your own offensive and defensive turn-based strategy with thousands of card combinations, because powerful heroes alone can only get you so far. Use your wits, come up with tactics and strategy, use brute force, and slay your enemies!

Join other players in guilds and clans to crush opponents and bosses for the most valuable loot and claim the battle chess RPG victor's crown!

Evolve your warlord for a better appearance and abilities, and combine them with your battle chess deck of heroes and monsters.

Download the game for free to experience epic turn-based strategy turn-based Idle RPG battle chess and embark on an exciting adventure in this battle chess turn-based strategy!

Some Features:
‚óè Challenge other players all over the world in battle chess!
‚óè Join other players in guilds and clans to conquer all!
‚óè Level up your hero!
‚óè Come up with your perfect strategy!
‚óè Gorgeous graphics and a wide range of locations!
‚óè PVP battles in real time!
‚óè You can try to be afk at any given moment - no problem! You can even try to be an AFK Hero in battle arenas! But will you be a successful afk player? We don‚Äôt know.

More Features:
‚óè Turn-based & fast-paced innovative battle system. Real strategy and tactics!
‚óè Dozens of war heroes for infinite battle combinations.
‚óè Epic Warlords with unique battle skills.
‚óè Captivating PVP (Ranked Battles, Brawl, Arena matches, Tournaments, Survival, Raids, Events etc.) with great rewards!
‚óè Single player campaign with an epic story across the realm. A true hero‚Äôs Journey!
‚óè Turf Wars is a game mode where your guild alliance fights using their troops against opponents to gain the most valuable territories. Prepare the Guild for glory!
‚óè Lots of ways to evolve mighty heroes: level themup, bind them with others, turn them into Legendary heroes, or upgrade Turf Wars skills!

Receive Magical and Legendary Chests. Recruit and Evolve new battle Heroes. Gather your Mighty Party. Clash with other players in PVP battles. Join the strongest Guild Alliance or Clan. Become everyone's strongest opponent!

Note:
Mighty Party is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in your Google Play Store app settings.

A network connection is required.

Support:
Are you having problems? Please contact us via e-mail: mightyparty.panoramik@gmail.com or in-game by going to Settings > Support.

Visit our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/mightyparty.game
Join our Discord Server: https://discord.gg/yzYQa7

comments: It's actually a fun game. But it's trash!!! Everywhere you click, you're being asked to pay for something. The 1st couple of days I loved the game. Then I started progressing and thing went downhill.. the hof is a joke. You should be able to stay in a higher legue if your deck isn't that great but the developers try to force you to upgrade your might with 100 different "deals". It has potential but it's definitely for pay to play players. And if you came here from a ad, that's not in the game.

This game is a cash grab. When you finally get past someone in the "campaign" you come to someone even harder. You can buy jewels to get better characters and level up, and you will have to do it again two characters later. Quit making it harder so that people have to pay to get past a certain point. Developing trust with your consumers works so much better. Make it to where you can get a decent amount of jewels for 0.99 or 1.99. Once I see anything over 4.99, I dont even bother with it.

Decently fun little game, but after spending a little money on it only to have the mighty pass benefits fade and have to pay again I've lost interest. Remove a lot of the Pay features and it would be a good game. If you've got money to burn its fun for that, but after losing the mighty pass and realizing virtually everything on it has to be renewed every month or so for the full amount just isn't worth keeping the game.

Very fun game at first but then it boring even after paying for upgrades the game got too hard and impossible to beat. Bit at first you got all the upgrades and leveled up really fast. Some of the gaming is hard to understand and not too much help is provided. I might play a little longer but giving up after a week. The great thing is that there is only in game ads and a lot of them but it beats watching a 30 second commercial like some other games. This game can have potential

It is a good game but after reading the comments and finding out myself that what you spend doesn't last was really disappointing. Can you imagine how much it cost to get to VIP7 and then find out its timed for 14 days..... Don't imagine because I'm very sad about it myself... what you pay for should be yours to keep. Especially if that money is a lot. Unless this changes I would like a reimbursement.

recentChanges: New skins. Zoning. Bug fixes.
comments: The game has three notable things: 1. The easiness. You don't have to have skill to "play" it. 2. The bugs. From the infamous black screen to the ads that won't allow you to continue. 3. The numbers. Seeing numbers in the millions can be sorta satisfying, but that isn't enough. Not bad, especially because I love seeing massive numbers, but the bugs make it unbearable.

I don't usually give reviews of games, but this game, by far, has been the most infuriating thing I've tried to play. Not only does it crash before the game boots up often, but when it does work and you've finished a round, sometimes you're given an ad that you can't get out of. I don't mean you wait for it to finish, I mean nothing appears to get you out of the ad so you have to force stop the game and reboot it, restarting the infuriating cycle again. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS GAME!!!!!

Well then, what's my experience with this one? A fantastic once-in-a-lifetime game that is truly amazing at what it wants to achieve, or another ad-filled, unfair piece of mobile game garbage. Well, i wish i could answer this but yea, i'm one of the people in this crowd of reviewers that got the infamous black screen curse. The game gives me the voodoo logo and then just shows a black screen. When you then proceed to tap the screen, the game chrashes. So i really can't say anything about it. üòï

People! What has our world become! Everyone is complaining about some black screen when what they are waiting so long for is the real probem! The game is so bland! You just go up and down with a dodge. It is so obvious that they just ran out of ideas. The black screen isn't the problem, GO GET SOME IQ POINTS AND GET A GOOD GAME. And I just looked at the description and it says, AND I QUOTE "bug fixes" BUG FIXES! I don't know about you, but I ran into the black screen just like all of you!

Heard some pretty much negative reviews on this, but i got to say that i at least enjoyed it a bit. This game is just your basic flappy bird clone and stock market game. I find it enjoyable and satisfying that once you gotten towards the multipliers, you money increases rapidly. For the most part, this game isn't bad, but i wouldn't call it good for the most part as at the end of the day, it is still a bit bland.

title: Solitaire
description:
Solitaire by Tripledot Studios is the new best way to play the classic card game you know and love for FREE, offline and online!

The most popular card game in the world, classic Klondike Solitaire, also known as Patience, is a great way to relax and train your brain. With beautiful graphics, fun animations, and free, offline play, Solitaire is the best game to pass the time.

Take on great daily challenges or play unlimited random and winnable solitaire decks for free! Play it your way, with a 1 card or 3 card draw, and choose between classic or Vegas scoring. Customize your cards, table, and game mode to play Solitaire just the way you like it!

Featuring:
‚ô£ Classic Klondike Solitaire gameplay
‚ô£ Fun daily challenges
‚ô£ Playable offline
‚ô£ Detailed player statistics
‚ô£ Unlimited free undo
‚ô£ Unlimited free hints
‚ô£ Customizable card and table design
‚ô£ Vegas and Classic Solitaire scoring modes
‚ô£ Cumulative Vegas scoring
‚ô£ Random or Winnable solitaire decks
‚ô£ Left-Handed Mode
‚ô£ Tablet support
‚ô£ Beautiful HD Graphics

For those of you who haven‚Äôt heard of the game before:
Klondike Solitaire uses a standard 52 card deck of playing cards without jokers. The objective of the game is to expose all cards and move them into the foundation piles. There are 4 foundation piles (one for each suit) that are represented on the screen by an ‚ÄúA‚Äú written on it. These piles are built upward in suit from Aces to Kings. 
In Solitaire there are 7 tableau columns that are built downward (in decreasing rank from Kings to Aces) in alternating colours (red and black). The aim of the game is to clear all the rows into the suitable foundation piles. 

Solitaire is a great opportunity to train your brain, improve your problem-solving skills, relax and have fun! Return to the timeless PC classic as it comes to your phone so that you can play it anytime, anywhere!

Thanks again for playing, and as always If you have any suggestion please let us know at solitaire-support@tripledotstudios.com

Play the #1 FREE SOLITAIRE card game on Android NOW!

Already a Tripledot Studios Solitaire fan? 
Like us on Facebook and stay tuned for the latest news:
https://www.facebook.com/Solitaire-398627873927679/

summary: Solitaire Games Free - Best Card Game 2021
recentChanges: We‚Äôve made some small improvements under the hood in order to make the game experience even smoother and all the more relaxing. As always, it‚Äôs no-fuss Solitaire, with a beautiful design that lets you simply play!
comments: A fun game like the card game that I learned in the 1960s. Only 3 stars because of rule changes over time. Examples are the options to deal 1 card at a time and shuffling the face down cards when out of moves. That would have been cheating. I uninstalled the game a number of times in disgust. I am 71; I guess younger people hate to lose. I use and enjoy it but if it had the old rules I would give a higher rating!

I enjoy solitaire and this app is definitely that. It's not aesthetically pleasing by any means but it plays. The games can be challenging too. I usually play it as a nightly ritual to help me sleep. This app works great, and I have no qualms with it.

It is a very fun very nice solitare game I love to play it. A plus is that it doesn't need wifi to be able to play it so it's nice for plane rides car trips etc. But one downfall is even though it says no ads it still had ads but it is still a good game so I recommend getting it to play.
Don't like the amount of time it takes between games also have to quite playing because you can't get rid of some stuff you don't want play. Will probably delete the game.

I have played a lot of solitaire games. I was playing one And there were so many ads I couldn't stand it and I Uninstalled it. It seems they all have Ads However, this one is not irritating and the deck is well shuffled.. On some of them I won so easily it didn't seem worth it to play. I highly recommend this solitaire game. It has hint that can be turned on and off. It also offers degrees of of difficult and easy. I play a lot and I prefer difficult.

title: Block Puzzle
description:
Drop the blocks to create vertically or horizontally lines of blocks without gaps. When such a line is created, it gets destroyed. Keep your board clear and keep your cool as things heat up in this simple but addictive puzzle game!

Block Puzzle Features:
- Beautifully easy and simple, no pressure and no time limit
- Visually stunning graphics and amazing soundtrack
- Easy to pick up, but hard and challenging to master
- Perfect brain-teasing game & perfect for little pocket of time
- Create the perfect strategy and keep your lines clear with endless of blocks

developerAddress: Flat/RM603  06/F, Laws Commercial Plaza 788 Cheung Sha Wan Road, KL
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: This is my favorite game to play...I just wish that I could switch the blocks around before I put them on the board, sometimes. Please consider making a change to the game, please and thank you! Also might I add that you could possibly make a video tutorial on how to play the game, by someone actually playing the game correctly. I want to watch carefully and try and figure out the pattern and math and logic behind the blocks. Catch my drift?

IT IS a learning curve as I did not understand your initial format.I am injoying the challenge to make the best pointsI have learned some of your methods and will try to double my score sometime. I shall continue to enjoy the game and do not wish to see any more types.I continue to enjoy your game, it is a challenge to keep moving. What is the top score come to?It is still a very entertaining game which offers a good challenge ( miss spelled ), age definitely has its draw backs.

Block Puzzle's a whole lot of fun to play+spend that extra time you have or when you're waiting for an appointment, etc.Not to mention it's a very challenging game üéØ to play!!! I L ‚ù§Ô∏èVE playing this game!!! Vicky Wassn I just can't get enough of the game!!! It's a really "GREAT" game!!!

I loved the game when I used to play but now it seems like it won't even let me get up to 1000 points because they purposely rig the thing to give me shapes that are impossible to fit anywhere. I don't know if it's following an algorithm or what's going on but its pretty annoying. Maybe they don't want me to play the game anymore. Idk.

I am very good at playing this puzzle game but the higher you get the more rigged it is you go to move a piece and it just automatically pulls it back so I don't recommend this game at all it is rigged. They really need to fix that bug in the game did it's not cool! This game is not worth your time because the higher up you get in the points the more they started rigging it you try to move a piece and they snatch it back don't even waste your time!

title: Stealth Master - Assassin Ninja Game
description:
Are you a good ninja?

Have you only learned about these mysterious martial arts from ancient Japanese legends? Don't you think that's the less interesting way? Don't let your daily routine bore you: download the breakthrough action game Stealth Master! Test your professional assassin skills üî™ and take on the risky challenge of completing bloody missions. 

‚òõ Dive deep into the unique life of the best ninja ever and kill as many bad guys as you can! Countless deadly weapons, plenty of innovative features, and billions of dollars ‚Äì that's just half of the totally secret world that is waiting for you right now! 

To become an outstanding ninja‚Ä¶

Attend the best university for ninjas, write a thesis on how to kill in 5 seconds, and start searching for employers‚Ä¶ No, don't worry, it's just a joke! But who knows, maybe that was true way back in ancient times, like 2010. That's not how things work today, though!  

In the modern world, future ninjas rely on stealth üê±‚Äçüë§ and download the game for killers:

‚óè Bloody missions that gradually get harder: more bad guys and more "targets". Yes, it will take more time and more effort on your end! 
‚óè A wide variety of special features: you can purchase extras like weapons, super abilities, or armor. Buy as much as you can afford ‚Äì no limits!
‚óè Each individual weapon is unique and has its own style. Some weapons are so good that you can kill several bad guys at once with them. 
‚óè Up to all levels within one contract for assassinating the big boss.
‚óè Every contract offers you a totally new and interesting location. 
‚óè Integrated "keys": some doors you have to open by yourself. Guess how!
‚óè Oh! There's one important thing you should know: you can easily be killed. Take care!

Another cool plus is that you can change your good looks and become a different hero, and there are 4 characters available. But remember: first, you were born as a ninja! 

Is it that real?

Even though it's just virtual reality, it will definitely give you goosebumps! 

The tense atmosphere is created with the help of upbeat music, realistic "broken vase" sounds, and game design in the style of "Mama, I'm a criminal". Besides, you'll never know what's waiting for you on the next level‚Ä¶ 

A little advice for future ninjas.

First of all, the big boss is a target that's not so easy to kill üí£. Be patient and make several attempts! Second, collect as much money as you can (actually, this is just good practical advice). Third, enemies in the game can be easily eliminated with a one shot. Don't waste your precious time on other parts of their bodies! And last but not least: be a good person and only fight the bad guys! 

‚òõ Psssst! Listen to me‚Ä¶ Some of your friends are already on their way to becoming a ninja! What are you waiting for? Download the game and start your bloody mission!

comments: Good game, but is misleading in their labeling. For example, you can watch 2 ads for about 70% chance of getting a new character. I've watched 30 ads, and have not gotten one of the better characters yet. Unless I their numbers aren't misleading and I actually got a 0.0000000014% chance of not getting anything, they have misleading advertising and are lying to get you to watch more ads.

I've had this game for about 3 months now and it's been fun for a while. It's good to pass the time. But after about the 5th boss the game just starts acting really busted if you don't pic the weapon that goes with your character. Total turn off.

This game is amazing.its fun and interesting.theres only one problem which is the weapons you get for you heros don't work.when I got Lora's pistol when she tried to shoot them she broke very bone in her body and they did not shoot
It an ok game but it has way too many adds and I mean like an add after every level ant to top it off the levels are super short and way too easy like only 3+ easy to kill henchmen per level
The game was great, but now it glitches so much! Please fix.

title: Township
description:
Township is a unique blend of city-building and farming! 

Build your dream town! Harvest crops at the farms, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with exotic countries. Open restaurants, cinemas, and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world.
Are you ready to become a farmer and city-manager to build your dream? Let‚Äôs get started!

Township features:
‚óè Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town
‚óè Various crops to grow and later process at your factories
‚óè Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill
‚óè Your town's mine packed with ancient artifacts to discover and collect
‚óè Lovely animals to take care of
‚óè Farms to manage and expand
‚óè Exotic goods brought from islands
‚óè A zoo to build where you can even breed animals
‚óè Country flags and famous landmarks you can use to decorate your town, like the Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, and many more!
‚óè Play with your Facebook and Google+ friends, make new friends in the game community create your own clans! 

Township is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.

*Internet connection is required to play the game and enable social interactions, competitions and other features* 

Enjoying Township? Learn more about the game! 
Facebook: www.facebook.com/TownshipMobile 
Twitter: twitter.com/township_mobile 

Questions? Contact our Tech Support at support@playrix.com.

THE GREAT GATSBY
* Complete tasks in town and in events to win rewards!

comments: I really love the game and the detail is fantastic. Dont play this if you dont want to pay money as they very rarely give you the things you need to make the shops etc open, so your town takes ages to expand. Although if you buy the golden ticket they give you a lot more which helps your town. But I'm not someone who plays the mini games much and don't like that in the golden ticket you have to play them to get the points. Where before it was other missions which was better.

It catch my eye and decided to give it a try. Only play games like this on tablets. Have an original iPad but came across a Sony tablet on sale at WalMart. It runs pretty good but drops the game at times. I am hope to continue to play as I enjoy the type of gameWorks well now & am pleased. I would enjoy it more if the"piggy bank" was gone. Again.,. Get rid of the "piggy bank ".,. Please?!!

The game is amazing I'm using it for almost a year and it's so cool. The only problem is that the special decorations for events, that we used to buy with Township Cash, doesn't appear any more (maybe in our region I don't know) Please fix it. There's no special decorations anymore so the game is getting boring. There's nothing to do with the Cash right now.. Thank you

Customer service has ignored me for quite some time. I just emailed a new issue with the clock stopping & not progressing on the Pirate rescue mission unless I'm active in the game. The clock is supposed to continue consistently. I'll update this review if I ever hear from their customer support. Update: Support is a joke! They said they would give 25 points for a glitch & it never happened. Contacted them again just to be told it's because I'm using a mobile device. Will never see the points.

I have been playing Township for nearly 6 years and I can't believe how stingy this game is with the rewards! It takes a lot of effort and then when I spin the prize wheel, it only gives 2 items ! I have never received a prize that was worth the effort. And only 5 T cash for levelling up ?!! If the developers don't think us players are worth more it wont be long before I loose interest . I'm nearly at the point now.

title: Blob Runner 3D
description:
Are you ready for a super fun run race? Blob will be your favorite runner of all times! 
Your goal is easy - Watch out for the obstacles, push them off and collect all jellies to become a GIANT blob! 
If you can‚Äôt escape from the deadly obstacles and lose a limb, or a few, don‚Äôt worry! Our friendly jelly can continue the running for you, no rush, just clash all jelly particles and sculpt your Blob from scratch!  

Remember, the price pool at the end will be determined by your ability to get your Blob bigger. Get bigger, stronger and super jelly to collect special rewards! We may also have some surprises as you slide on the roof :)
Wait! Did we mention you can also make over your Blob with super cool hats and plenty of color matching skins?! Join this epic race and show your unique style by customizing your Blob Runner :)

recentChanges: New levels added.
comments: Gameplay somewhat fun. But its not worth the constant barrage of adds they throw at you. 10 sec level followed by mandatory adds. Uninstalled right away

Game is fun, but don't buy. They still constantly try to get you to watch ads after youve bought it. Plus most collectables require you watch an ad, which is pretty awful considering youve paid for it.

Do you want to play a mildly fun game with no point and get hit with a bombardment of ads? Then this is the game for you! I enjoy the little obstacle courses, but there's an ad after every single one, then they want you to watch more ads to get higher multipliers, THEN even if you unlock something special in the level or get a new skin, you have to watch an ad for that too! All in all, you spend more time watching ads than actually playing the game.
Paid to remove ads, and the game still constantly plays ads. Gonna be uninstalling this one.
Too much advertisement. I have to watch a video ads every round. The ads are also longer than a round. That's extreamly noisy. Will not recommend it game to anyone

it is very good game but same problem in all the game of add and I am only saying that please degrees some adds whatever the game is very good it has many facilities like marble painting, spray, acrylic, stencil and many more I am only suggesting that degrees adds ,the game free download I am giving 1star you because of the adds

comments: The game overall is hard but fun the only thing I have against it is there are quite a bit of ads. You have to watch ads to get the songs. Watch ads to continue after finishing or hitting the wrong color in a song. Like I said the game overall is hard but fun. I'd recommend this to anybody who likes upbeat songs and are okay with ads.

I got this app like 2 hours ago and at first it kind if fun, but after 20 minutes it gets boring.There are adds before you start every round and when you finish every round. And it gets really annoying. I do not recommend this game. You should not play it, its really bad. I have to 2 stars for the first 20 minutes were it was fun. DO NOT download this app. IT IS SO BAD. Sorry but the truth has to be said.

This game is very entertaining! You can play challenging, fun rounds, and listen to trendy music. There isn't a bunch of advertisements, and the game usually runs fast, with minimum lagginess. I recommend!

You can watch an ad to continue the game, but what they don't tell you is if you choose not to you have to watch one anyway. You have to watch ads to access songs. This app is completely a Cash grab in my opinion.

I really really love this. It's too much of adds buy this game is a dope qnd it makes sense. I really wish you will update more songs coz I really fell in love with this game. (I loved how there you included Blackpink and bigbang songs)

title: Solitaire - Classic Card Games Free, Klondike Card
description:
Enjoy the best free and popular Solitaire card games in the world for free at any time and place! It's time to train your brain, challenge yourself and be a Klondike or Patience master, try this classic Klondike & Patience Solitaire card game for free!

Solitaire games, also known as Patience in Europe (such as the United Kingdom, French, etc.), are Solitaire card games, and can be played by a single player. 

To solve this Solitaire Klondike card puzzle, you should move all cards of 4 suits - hearts, diamonds, spades and crosses to the Foundations. There is one deck - 52 cards in the classic Solitaire Klondike game. 

You need to stack cards by suit, from Aces to King (A, 2, 3 and more). You can also move cards between columns, and stack cards in descending order and differentiate between red and black suits. For example, a black 10 could only be followed by a red 9. Only a King could be placed in the Free Column. You can move the stack of cards by dragging the whole stack to another column.

Solitaire Klondike game or Patience game is an addictive card game from the Classic Solitaire collection, which is similar to other Solitaire card/board games, such as Cube, Freecell, Spider, Tri Peaks, Pyramind, Golf, Mahjong and Yukon. Classic never fades. Solitaire Klondike, or Patience is the best way for you to relax and pass the time, play it anytime, anywhere with patience and insistence. You would absolutely love playing this Solitaire Klondike card game. 

Key Features
- Classic solitaire gameplay, super fun and addictive
- Left-hand mode, more convenient for you
- 3 Draw Mode, more challenging to play games
- Statistics section, keep improving and challenging yourself
- Daily Challenge, start every day with fun and relaxing Solitaire games
- Unlimited hints and undo

Privacy Policy: https://solitaire.fungame.studio/policy.html
Terms of Service: https://solitaire.fungame.studio/termsofservice.html

comments: This was very well made game. The reason I gave it only 3 stars is due to the fact that everytime you won a game, you would only level up by 5pts which made it so that it would take you a long time to get to the end to 140pts. But, if you put that aside, it is quite a good and well made game. You are able to customise to a certain degree and it has daily challenges too.

This game is not realistic but it is still enjoyable. By using the joker and undo, it seems every deal has a solution. The challenge is finding the solution. I currently have a 100 game win streak. UPDATE: Downgraded to one star. You have to view an ad to get a joker but THE AD NEVER ENDS! The irony is that it is an ad for another Solitaire game.

The deck is stacked. I just installed this earlier today. I noticed that I was winning most of the games. I asked the vendor about it and was told that the game deliberately gives you winnable deals. It doesn't tell you that, and it doesn't give you an option play random deals. If that's what you want, this might be the app for you, but it's not for me.

Game is only good for about 2 days of playing, because after that, it bugs you with constant ads (scam alert) and advertising false ads that lie about games for you to download and waste your money on, just for you to download more games to continue more advertisements, interruptingore game play, and taking up your time and dollars. Eventually it gets to the point where this game gets rigged to where you can only play by using the joker card, after running out of plays (rigged).

You get a lot of unsolvable decks while doing freeplay. I feel like it's their way of pushing ads. But if you turn off wifi you can skip the ads. However, that's when you notice they give you more than the average rate of unsolvable decks and what would be a whole lot of ads if your wifi was on.üòî

title: Hungry Shark Evolution - Offline survival game
description:
We're the Official game for Shark Week - live every week like it's Shark Week!

Take control of a very Hungry Shark and go on a frantic ocean rampage, surviving as long as possible by eating everything and everyone in your way! Explore a beautiful underwater world and evolve iconic sharks like the Great White and Megalodon!

In this action-packed aquatic adventure you can:
‚Ä¢ Unlock more than a dozen unique sharks and other fintastic creatures
‚Ä¢ Explore an open world both above and below the waves
‚Ä¢ Enjoy jawsome 3D graphics and sound effects
‚Ä¢ Discover and devour mysterious creatures of the deep
‚Ä¢ Recruit Baby Sharks to boost your predatory powers
‚Ä¢ Equip awesome accessories like Lasers, Jetpacks and Top Hats!
‚Ä¢ Find and collect sunken Bonus Objects
‚Ä¢ Sink your teeth into loads of challenging missions
‚Ä¢ Activate Gold Rush to survive longer and score higher
‚Ä¢ Take part in regular in-game events and win limited edition prizes
‚Ä¢ Attack with intuitive touch or tilt controls
‚Ä¢ Play offline wherever you are ‚Äì no Wi-Fi needed!
‚Ä¢ Synchronize your game easily across Android devices

Compatible with Android 4.1 and above.

This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy Gem and Coin currency which can be spent on upgrades and accessories. Gems and Coins can also be collected in game without requiring purchase, or by watching video advertisements from the Treasure screen.
This game contains advertising.

Advertising is disabled if you make any purchase.

Follow on Twitter @Hungry_Shark
Subscribe on YouTube: https://hungryshark.co/HungryYouTube
Join us on Instagram: Instagram @hungryshark

comments: Love this game. Glad I can play it online or offline. Just a note for the people in the advertising department or whatever you may call yourselves... Whenever I am given a chance to watch an ad for monetary value on the game... Almost every time im willing to watch the ad. Also, I feel like the tips go away way too quickly to read. Good job everyone, this game is great. Just wish I could get to the giant creatures faster lol

love this game, it's def one of my faves & the amount of time I spend playing it just speaks for itself. but recently I've been getting really frustrated w/ it. Everytime I spend more than 20 min playing it & if I die of starvation, the game freezes. it doesn't let me apply no action other than exiting. all the gold, gems and points I've made simply go to waste, let alone MY TIME. please, help me fix it. I've already deleted & downloaded again and nothing changes. l'll be waiting for a feedback.

The game is an amazing game that as a kid I used to play so much, it's entertaining and shiny easy to catch a child's eye. Though this game is directed towards a younger audience, I recommend making the map bigger or just making a new map you can access in general. There's minimal adds, and it's not laggy at all. The only reason it's not 5 stars is because the play area is much to tiny for a sandbox survival game.

The game is fun and it's one I used to play a lot as a kid, but recently I redownload it and the game has just gotten way out of hand. The creator of the game could have spent time making the map bigger but instead made sharks that breathe fire and other crazy things like it, and you can't survive them unless you have the same shark or one bigger.

Nice job taking our gems! Helicopters, special sharks/humans, hang gliders and boats dont give gems anymore. The newest shark stalls before every boost making it garbage to use. This game is going downhill fast... edit... they give gems still but at a 85% decreased rate. Before I could get over 20 gems a game. Now im lucky to get 5. Deleted.

title: Flying Stickman Rope Hero: Flying Hero: Crime City
description:
Welcome to the open-world flying stickman rope hero grand city crime game with an astonishing idea of stickman as spider rope hero to fight against all the gangster thug mafia in the crime city. This is a vegas gangstar city where criminal mafia involved in robbing the bank, snatching bags, kidnapping schoolboys, terrorist activities, and killing civilians. Police are not adequate for fighting against this increasing city crime & bad mafia. So in this flying stickman rope  game, you are appointed as a spider stickman rope hero who can use stickman superpowers as rope hero, special stickman moves, stickman gunfighter, and flying stickman hero. This amazing flying stickman rope hero grand city crime game is an action-packed game with thrilling stickman action fighting. Spider rope stickman hero gangster crime city is designed and developed for the open world crime simulator game lovers. So are you ready to enter into the spider rope stickman hero gangster crime game to turn the grand crime city into a crime-free city? Dare yourself to accomplish the challenging & thrilling missions to win the title of stickman hero. 


In flying stickman rope hero game, unlock a variety of stickman superheroes to kill the wanted criminals. Your duty is to chase grand city criminals walking in the streets to vanish their evil plans. Use stickman spider rope skills, find gangster snipers at the building's top and kill them with stickman superhero powers before they shoot their target. City kidnappers kidnapped a schoolboy, they are leaving in a van, so chase the gangsters van to destroy with rope attack. Drug city mafia held a meeting in the town street, your duty is to use your rope hero skills to catch them before they leave. Crime city gangsters are robbing the city bank, go fast and kill them before they robbed the bank and escaped. Become a super stickman spider rope hero in this flying stickman vegas gangster city to vanish all city mafia. 

In this flying stickman rope hero grand city crime game become a stickman survival hero to experience the adventure of the stickman. Destroy evil clones in the dangerous city of the stickman superhero game. Play and enjoy amazing spider stickman games and collect the winning coins by killing all the grand crime city mafia gangsters.

Flying Stickman Rope Hero Grand City Crime Features
- High-Quality Gangster City & Environment
- Variety of Stickman Spider Rope Superheroes
- Amazing Stickman Rope Hero Skills
- Realistic Sounds & Gameplay
- Rope, Punch, Kick, and Fighting

title: Tile Connect - Free Tile Puzzle & Match Brain Game
description:

comments: I used to really love this game and looked forward to the challenge portions of it. Now, the first challenge is okay, but the crazy challenge is impossible. You must have lots of hints and bombs and turn arounds, or you won't have a prayer at beating this challenge. You have no time to even get started before time is up. And they want 900 points to continue the game. LLP 0. It's no fun, just frustrating. Anyone agree?

Hate apps that have an ad after every single round. Even worse when they offer a reward in exchange for watching an ad and you turn it down but they play the ad anyway and give you nothing. Garbage. The game isn't even that cool.

Much better than most. Offers variety with mini-games. Ads (ugh!) don't interrupt game play. Good graphics. Can turn off music. Decent instructions. A carefully designed app. Minus 1 star for content of some ads.

There were so many ads, that (for the first time) I paid for no ads, but there are still ads plus the timer runs out faster so you have to watch even more ads. There are lots of ads and they are very long.

Game ok, tiles hard to distinguish on phone, horrible blinking number on bottom of screen. When i touch it a message pops up saying i am going into an unsafe zone. I think it is an ad but am unsure, dont want my phone hacked so i am deleting now.

title: UNO!‚Ñ¢
description:
UNO!‚Ñ¢ is now on your mobile device with new rules, tournaments, modes of play, and much more. Whether you‚Äôre at home, on the go, an UNO!‚Ñ¢ veteran or completely new, UNO!‚Ñ¢ has something for everyone in the family. UNO!‚Ñ¢ is the mixer for a memorable family-friendly card game wherever and whenever.
¬†
UNO!‚Ñ¢, is celebrating 50 years of fun family and friends memories with this official classic card game. Join us in this epic 50th Anniversary Contest, time-limited event ‚Äì don‚Äôt miss out!

#UNOSongProject - Be a part of the UNO!‚Ñ¢ legacy. Join in the fun by submitting or voting for your UNO!‚Ñ¢ themed song! UNO!‚Ñ¢ Song Project winner stands to win a grand cash prize and participate in our online award ceremony.
¬†
Ready. Set. UNO!‚Ñ¢
- Play classic card game, UNO!‚Ñ¢ or select from a variety of house rules to play in real-time matches
- Compete in tournaments and events to win free rewards and top the leaderboards
- Partner up with friends or family, lay in 2v2 mode and collaborate to win
- Connect anytime, anywhere with family or friends from around the world in UNO!‚Ñ¢ Clubs
- Celebrate with UNO!‚Ñ¢, 2021 is the 50th anniversary of the UNO!‚Ñ¢ classic card game. UNO!‚Ñ¢ team has prepared lots of surprises and events to usher in the 50th anniversary festivities!
- Go big or go home with All-In Mode: UNO!‚Ñ¢ dares you to take on this bet. Win coins or none at all!
¬†
FEATURES
The Classic Game at your Fingertips
New to UNO!‚Ñ¢ or wanting to play your favorite card game? Tap Quick Play and start up a new game with classic UNO!‚Ñ¢ rules.
¬†
Rule Your Room
In Room Mode, invite friends or family and set up your own house rules. Play new cards like ‚ÄúWild Punch‚Äù to send a +4 Wild right back at the person who played it. Or use rules like ‚ÄúStack‚Äù and watch one unlucky player pile cards into their hand. UNO!‚Ñ¢ is a family-friendly party that makes it free and easy for anyone to join!
¬†
Buddy Up
Find a friend or family and partner up to battle in 2v2 mode. Help each other reduce your hand (or your partner‚Äôs) to zero as quickly as possible to beat the other team!
 
Connect, Chat, Yell UNO!‚Ñ¢
Connect with friends in UNO!‚Ñ¢ clubs and send each other gifts. Make a strategy and cheer each other on!
 
Real-Time Matches Galore
Compete in tournaments and special events to win free rewards. Top the leaderboards and show-off to your friends and family!
 
Go Wild ‚Äì No, Really
This no-holds-barred mode is as wacky as UNO!‚Ñ¢ gets. Forget the classic mode - house rules on, two deck play and free winnings up to 200 times what you put in! But beware, in this wild game mode, you win big or go home empty-handed! Are you up for the challenge?
 
Visit our official site at www.letsplayuno.com
Follow us on Facebook for more updates: www.facebook.com/UNOnow

developerAddress: 1/F, Xiu Ping Commercial BuildingÔºå104Jervois StreetÔºåSheung WanÔºåHongKong
recentChanges:
Come and see what's new in the latest update of UNO!
1. UNO Universe's trip to Japan will open the second map‚ÄîOsaka!‚Äîon August 1. New challenges, new rewards, and new accessories are waiting for you!
2. The achievement feature has been revised. Lots of new content waiting for you to explore!
3. Season 9 of Ranked Mode will start on July 24. A Midsummer's Dream theme decorations will be added.
4. There are new contests in the UNO Cup, and the water pipe theme awards have been updated.
comments: This games cheats you when you loose stars. It starts you off at Zero points when you loose a star. Making you purchase star defense if do not want to lose stars. Oh and you need to purchase rank defense too. Statistically it would be impossible to reach levels above platinum without purchasing these two options. Careful not to get caught in this pay to win scheme. And to the devs, stop robbing the points and the stars. Starting us off at Zero points when loosing a star is cheating us!

My opinion kind of reflects that of others in the review. I had initially given it a 5 star. The game interface was really good, still is. But the way they have designed the game deliberately to just force players to pay money is sick. You can't play without coins, and u always end up losing more than you win, especially with VIP and all that. You can't play even 5 games continuously, if you are not ready to pay. Please, I'll rather buy cards from a store and play friends when we get together.

This used to be my go-to relaxation game. Now it's just a joke. I firmly believe that over 85% of the "players" are computers and that winning a game is something one can only wish for. I started off the middle of last month with over 14,000 coins; now I have 0 because no matter how hard I try, there is no possible way to win a game. You have to buy coins and/or diamonds to get ahead. You can't just play & have a nice relaxing time without spending money.

Great game and way to play with friends to pass time. However when it says there is an update I go to the market and there is no update so I'm caught in a vicious loop and can't play. Last time it did this I lost my profile and had to start over and the developer did nothing to help me retrieve my account. I will change this comment once the problem is fixed.

This app is fun when you first start. Once you've had it for longer, it becomes less enjoyable and rigged. Most of the games I lost to is because I'm dealt unfair cards and its every round back to back. It's obvious that this app is meant for people who have money to spend on diamonds and coins. Seeing as other people are having other issues such as the connectivity or having to sit through a TON of ads, I'm about to uninstall. No reason why one of the biggest card companies has an app like this

title: Talking Tom Hero Dash - Run Game
description:
From Outfit7, the creators of My Talking Tom 2, My Talking Angela, Talking Tom Gold Run and My Talking Tom Friends, comes a supercharged running game with Talking Tom!

In Talking Tom Hero Dash, The Rakoonz are back, and this time, they‚Äôre on a mission to destroy the world. Tom‚Äôs ready to step into his hero suit, activate his super powers and start saving the day.

‚òÖ SAVE TOM‚ÄôS FRIENDS üÜò üôÄ üö®
The Rakoonz have captured Talking Angela, Talking Ben, Talking Ginger and Talking Hank so it‚Äôs time for Super Tom to step up and save them! Start running to the rescue and free Moonlight Angela, Hurricane Hank, Mighty Ginger and many more super versions of your favorite friends.

‚òÖ REBUILD THE WORLD üèõÔ∏è üí™ üå≥
The Rakoonz are tearing down cities and turning Tom‚Äôs world into a Rakoon-ridden trash heap! Kick The Rakoonz off the road as you run, and collect coins and gems so you can rebuild the cities. Repair buildings and restore parks and monuments to make the world safe again.

‚òÖ GET AWESOME GADGETS ‚åö ‚ö° üöÄ
Find supersonic powers and gravity defying gadgets fit for true heroes. Jump on a jet bike, hop on a hyperboard or race on a laser ship for fun as you rush through amazing worlds. Collect epic boosts on your run to help you blast through roadblocks and fly faster than ever before.

‚òÖ RACE IN AMAZING PLACES üåé üå¥ ‚õ∞Ô∏è
Explore weird and wonderful worlds like you‚Äôve never seen. Dash over desert dunes, go surfing on tropical beaches, snowboard in icy mountains and scooting through secret temples. Play special missions and events in these running worlds, too.

‚òÖ PLAY SPECIAL EVENTS üéâ üèÅ üèÜ
Play event games in all the extraordinary worlds. Swing on vines to reach great heights in the jungle and jump across giant cranes in the city to complete quests. Missions will challenge you to defeat crazy Rakoonz and collect tokens for rare rewards.

‚òÖ TAKE DOWN THE BOSS üêæ üí• üí£
He‚Äôs big, he‚Äôs bad, he‚Äôs The Boss of The Rakoonz, and he does NOT like superheroes spoiling his plans for destruction. The Boss will try to stop you from racing ahead, so be brave and stay on your game to take down his aircraft in epic boss battles.

‚òÖ UNLOCK NEW HERO OUTFITS üèÖ üëï ‚ú®
Unlock super cool versions of hero Tom and the friends as you race. Find Jet Black Tom, Planet Power Tom, Queen Bee Angela, Gold Flash Tom, Rockstar Ginger and many many more as you play.

Those who enjoy Talking Tom games such as My Talking Tom 2, My Talking Angela, My Talking Tom Friends, and runner games such as Talking Tom Gold Run will love this game, as will players who like to jump obstacles, crash through roadblocks and rush through exciting temple worlds. Download Talking Tom Hero Dash for free!

This app is certified by PRIVO, an FTC Children‚Äôs Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) Safe Harbor.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising;
- Links that direct customers to Outfit7‚Äôs websites and other apps;
- Personalization of content to encourage users to play the app again;
- YouTube integration to allow users to watch videos of Outfit7's animated characters;
- The option to make in-app purchases;
- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player‚Äôs progress; and
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money.

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
EEA privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/eea/
US privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/
Rest of the world privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/
Customer support: support@outfit7.com

comments: Just terrible! The ads don't work because it keeps crashing right after an ad starts. The loading is slow and to top that off sometimes it freezes. üëéüëé That's too bad because it's a fun game if it weren't for these issues! ‚òπÔ∏è

Well that really suks after passing a couple levels you have to purchase to continue. Uninstalling. People I want you to know everytime you download a game you are also down losading hundreds of cartoon pictures that's inside this app. If you connect your phone to the computer to upload pictures you will see them all and request to erase them after upload. Or else your phone gets polluted and slows down. Word from the wise.

I love this game but if you want us to watch ads then why did you made unstoppable ads? Pls I had to reload the game. Edit: It was fine for few hours until it was the same. Pls don't make ads that are not skipable. I beg you.

This is the best game ever, me and my small brother always plays this game and there are less adds in this game and it's the best thing because any game with lots of adds is the irritating thing in that game but this game is very rare so my advice is that"U SHOULD PLAY IT A ONES AND AFTER PLAYING JUST RATE IT ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê 5 STARS" Thanksüåπ

I like the game but when I unlocked all the hero's something went wrong the other day when a on the game it was just loading for a long time and I have been hearing Ben voice when it was still loading so I thought delete an install it again then I thought if I delete it I will have restart over again so please is there any problem

title: Rec Room
description:
Rec Room is the best place to build and play games together. Party up with friends from all around the world to chat, hang out, explore MILLIONS of player-created rooms, or build something new and amazing to share with us all.

Rec Room is free, and cross plays on everything from phones to VR headsets. It‚Äôs the social app you play like a video game!
 - Customize and dress up your cute Rec Room avatar to express your style
 - Discover challenging, fun or straight up weird games made by creators just like you
 - Try your skill with the Maker Pen, the tool used by Rec Room creators to build everything from puppies to helicopters to entire worlds!
 - Join the best community - Rec Room is a fun and welcoming place for people from all walks of life! Let us help you find people you‚Äôll LOVE to hang out with. 

Come and join the club!

recentChanges: We update the game routinely to improve the user experience. This version includes minor improvements and bug fixes.
comments: Have it on VR, console and mobile. It's my favourite game, and is a great way to make friends. There is a lot there for the art community and also people who enjoy the creative aspects such as making games. My only complaint is that the rec room community aren't pushed enough to make a variety of games, and lots of people only make ones they know are popular such as parkour and pvp's. Rec room needs to find a way to encourage more people to create a wider variety of games

This game is amazing! It's almost as good as vrchat! Very good work on this! Although..I do wish they added hair physics or shaders or just something to really improve recroom like maybe give the player's bodies so they can have more experience? But the hard thing is using the full body morphs. They're hard and complicated but still good!

I would give it 5 stars but the only thing I personally don't like is the new home, loading screen colors and background colors for items. I liked the purple color on the loading screen and I think on the background of items too. The new home is way to bright, it needs to be a bit darker. But overall a very good game. And maybe they should allow junior accounts to make worlds but maybe no be able to share or the game restricts the account to certain items that are inappropriate.

At first when the game first released on Android it was pretty buggy. Controls were off and it was just stuttering every minute. But now with some recent updates it's gotten a whole lot better. There are still some stutters but honestly those are also on the PS4 and Xbox versions of the game as well so I don't know if they can fix it. Paintball for example depending on the map used to be unplayable at times. Now it's pretty alright. Definitely playable on all maps now. It's a damn fine port.

The game is good so far. I wanna play it with my friends but it doesnt support their version. I suggest more graphics settings like frame rates and stuff because my fps awlays drops to 40 and Im sure that I can run this game stable 60 fps. Also have some control issues hope you can fix it. overall game is good it brings mobile to another level

title: Hill Climb Racing
description:
Play the original classic Hill Climb Racing! Race your way up hill in this physics based driving game! Play for free and also playable offline!
 
Meet Newton Bill, the young aspiring uphill racer. He is about to embark on a journey that takes him to where no ride has ever been before. From Ragnarok to a Nuclear Plant, all places are a racing track to Bill. With little respect to the laws of physics, Bill will not rest until he has conquered the highest hills up on the moon! 
 
Face the challenges of unique hill climbing environments with many different cars. Gain bonuses from daring tricks and collect coins to upgrade your car and reach even higher distances. description:
The BEST BMX GAME on Mobile!

Choose your bike and get ready for a thrilling ride on the Halfpipe! Slide down the ramps at high speed to reach outrageous heights and become the best BMX Rider on the Planet!

Travel the globe on the most amazing environments and leave your BMX Rider print all over the World! Do amazing tricks - Nose grabs, rocket airs, frontside airs - Beat the highest scores and show your mad skills to the World!

Download Flip Rider - BMX Tricks NOW!

--------------------------------------

TRAVEL THE WORLD!

Travel the World and choose your favourite location to shred! From Miami Beach to Lake Baikal, take on the variety of ramps available for you!

SPECTACULAR BMX Bikes!

Pick your favourite bike from a huge lot of possibilities! Make sure you ride in style! Unlock upgrades for the bikes to make sure you maximise your score!

AMAZING TRICKS!

Unlock and Perform insane trick combinations to keep your streak rolling! Beat the highest scores by executing the most dangerous tricks and reaching mad heights!

COOL CHARACTERS!

Unlock & Upgrade a set of super cool characters! Every character as its own stats, make sure you try them all! They are waiting for you!

--------------------------------------

title: LokiCraft
description:
LokiCraft

Build and Destroy Blocks. Get Resources and Create various Tools, Blocks and Weapons with which you can survive and build unique Buildings.
Choose your path in this world - the Builder (Creative mode) or the Ruthless Hunter who will do everything to survive (Survival mode)!


~ Be on the alert, in this world there are not only many peaceful animals, but also a huge number of MONSTERS! Fight with them, and you will receive valuable resources as a reward!

~ Explore the world, Swim across the seas to discover new lands and get resources - the world is almost limitless.


~ Build various structures - houses, castles, farms, cities ... You can build whatever you want. The game has more than a hundred blocks and various items available.

~ If you decide to survive, you will have to monitor hunger and eat on time. Look for food, grow crops or kill mobs for Meat!

~ Build your House to hide from the Monsters, and then you will definitely survive the Night! After all, they will come for you ... Zombies, Huge Spiders and other hostile mobs.

Actions in this world are limited only by your imagination! The game does not require any skills - you can figure it out in the first minutes of the game. In our game you are always and everywhere, you can have a good time. 

And it is absolutely FREE!

title: Fishdom
description:
Never Fishdomed before? Take a deep breath and dive into an underwater world of match-3 fun with Fishdom, an all-new free game!
 
Try challenging and fun match-3 gameplay with unique puzzles as you decorate aquariums to create cozy homes for lovely talking fish. Feed them, play with them, and watch them interact with each other. Hey, your finned friends are waiting for you, so dive in now and enjoy this amazing underwater adventure!
 
Features:
‚óè Unique gameplay: swap and match pieces, design and decorate aquariums, play with and take care of fish‚Äîall in one puzzle game!
‚óè Play hundreds of challenging and fun match-3 levels
‚óè Compete with other players to develop your aquarium even faster
‚óè Explore an exciting aquatic world with funny talking 3D fish that each have their own personality
‚óè Liven up fish tanks with breathtaking underwater decor
‚óè Grab your scuba mask and enjoy amazing aquarium graphics
‚óè It‚Äôs a blast for everyone: share your Fishdom mania with your Facebook friends!
‚óè No Wi-Fi or internet connection required to play
 
Please note that Fishdom is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.
 
Enjoying Fishdom? Learn more: Facebook: facebook.com/Fishdom Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fishdom_mobile/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/FishdomOfficial
 
Questions? Contact our tech support at fishdom@playrix.com

comments: Fishdom is a good fun game. It does get annoying trying to win the hard, and super hard levels, but you can still win those levels without paying money. Its a game, and games are not supposed to be easy, and fast to complete. The $4.99 for gold pass is not expensive. I never had any problems with bugs, and annoying ads. The developers do deserve to make money from the hard work of development. I'm a developer, so I understand the time consuming, and hard work learning, and writting code.

Be prepared to spend money in order to complete hard levels because the amount of chances you get, without lightning and bombs etc, forces you to purchase these in order to move on to the next level. No choice of levels and once your lives are used up on harder levels, you have to wait, sometimes half an hour, until the lives reload or you can purchase more lives. This game EATS your money!!

Level 114 seems to have no chance at being completed without purchasing items. After viewing several videos on YouTube I observed the only ones that had beaten this level had the unfair advantage of starting off with additional moves. Pay close attention to this detail as it is exactly how you get caught up in buying. Could have been great, but is a ripoff.. Avoid this game.

The mini games are the fun part. The "Bejeweled" aspect of the game is old hat and not particularly fun. In order to complete a difficult level you must leave the game and come back in about 15 minutes - which is so bizarre - or pay real money to buy tools to help you beat the level. Very disappointing. I just want to play the mini games.

this game is fantastic fun. perfect balance of challenge and creative fun with your winnings, best game ever! some super updates released today! the special themed events are a real treat. gorgeous graphic images...what a treat. it's getting more and more challenging which slows down progress through the levels, but I still love it. The game keeps coming up with super cute seasonal themes. Awesome! It's been tough at the higher levels. The team interactions are superb. Loving it for over a year

title: Hide 'N Seek!
description:
The good old classic hide & seek. Play either as a seeker or as a hider and build your shelters from cars or office desks, hide in the water, in the hay pile, in the cornfield, in the boss' office and most importantly, push others in the seeker's vision field. Try to be kind though.

Features:
‚àô Beautiful and unique 3D visuals
‚àô Play either as seeker or hider
‚àô Complete freedom to play however you like
‚àô High performance
‚àô Fun, relaxing and addictive

title: DOP 2: Delete One Part
description:
Think you‚Äôre smart? Then delete one part! ü§Ø

Download this popular brain game and use logic to solve fun and clever puzzles! 

üß† EFFORTLESS GAMEPLAY, CHALLENGING BRAIN TEASERS

Playing is easy! Just touch the screen and drag your finger to erase part of the drawing and see what lies behind it. The game may seem simple, but looks can be deceiving...

Like a detective‚Äôs magnifying glass, your eraser is the key to unraveling the hidden mysteries of this thinking game. You will have to become a shrewd sleuth and investigate the pictures carefully to locate clues. But you can never be sure what kind of surprises you‚Äôre going to find under the surface! üòÆ

CREATIVE PROBLEM-SOLVING 

Let your imagination run wild! Will the criminal succeed in robbing a bank, or will the police catch him first? What is the wife hiding from her husband? üôé‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

And that‚Äôs just the tip of the iceberg! Free a genie from an ancient forgotten lamp, sculpt pottery, and catch a villainous murderer ‚Äî and that‚Äôs all just in the first 30 levels!

Make the most of your free time by playing an engaging brain game that will sharpen your wit. With DOP 2, you can chill out and get smarter at the same time! Level up your brain while you level up in the game!

GAME FEATURES

‚òÖ Jump right into the simple and straightforward gameplay of this thinking game: just swipe your finger across your phone screen to erase parts of the drawing and reveal what‚Äôs underneath. The mechanics may be easy, but the puzzles will keep your brain üß© guessing! 

‚òÖ Investigate hundreds of entertaining levels chock-full of tricky brain teasers. No two puzzles are the same! Each level stimulates your brain to approach a problem in a new way.

‚òÖ Discover the unexpected twists hiding behind every image! Each stroke of your eraser will uncover a new, deeper layer to the story depicted in the drawing. Only you can make the invisible üîç visible! 

‚òÖ Enjoy the delightful graphics with their unique cartoon style and cute animations.

‚òÖ Provides hours of fun for teens, seniors, and anyone in between who wants to keep their brain sharp!

‚òÖ The optional music, sound effects, and vibration settings give you more control over your gameplay experience. 

Strengthen your reasoning skills and put your mind to the test with a relaxing and amusing thinking game. The best part is that there is no way to mess up or fail: if you erase the wrong thing, the picture will just reset! The point is to make you think, not make you cry! üò≠

But you‚Äôll still have to think outside the box to master this brain game! Who knew solving logic puzzles could be so enjoyable and satisfying?!

 Install DOP 2: Delete One Part now!

title: Soccer Super Star
description:
Play the brand new football game Soccer Super Star and enjoy the insanely real, ultra-fast and immersive football experience! 

Love action arcade soccer but lack the time to practice? The new Soccer Super Star‚Äôs very easy to learn game controls allows you to jump-start the fun. Just flick your finger across the screen to kick the ball and score a goal! 

Sounds easy, right? Wrong. As you progress through the game, shots become more challenging and you‚Äôll need a solid strategy to bend shots and split defenses. Soccer Super Star doesn‚Äôt get overly complicated but maintains a steady increase in difficulty while offering the best flick to kick experience! Be the hero in every match. 

Soccer Super Star‚Äôs gameplay concept is expertly done, the high degree of independence allows you to reflect your personal strategy in the game as you level up through your dream Leagues. Dynamic levels in addition to beautifully done artwork that will top-off your truly immersive (soccer) football experience.

Download to play today and score big! Yes, you can even play offline.

GAME FEATURES:

‚Ä¢ PLAY OFFLINE - FREE
It‚Äôs true, you can play and manage your team of eleven without the internet!

‚Ä¢ STAR SOCCER PLAYERS TO UNLOCK
Utilizing the latest 2020 motion capture technology of real star players

‚Ä¢ IMMERSIVE 3D MOBILE ENGINE & ADVANCED GAME A.I.
Intelligent game A.I. allows realistic freedom, powerful simulation with accurate ball physics. Make your way through the Leagues to be a Soccer Superstar!

‚Ä¢ JOIN WEEKLY OFFLINE TOURNAMENTS
Be the hero for your country & Club and head for glory!

‚Ä¢ SUPER SIMPLE GAME CONTROLS
Intuitive flick to pass and kick gameplay, sweep your finger across the ball to drive, curve and power the ball past walls of defenders.

We love to hear from you! Please email us with your thoughts to soccersuperstarteam@gmail.com
