Sounds easy, right? Wrong. As you progress through the game, shots become more challenging and you‚Äôll need a solid strategy to bend shots and split defenses. Soccer Super Star doesn‚Äôt get overly complicated but maintains a steady increase in difficulty while offering the best flick to kick experience! Be the hero in every match.

Soccer Super Star‚Äôs gameplay concept is expertly done, the high degree of independence allows you to reflect your personal strategy in the game as you level up through your dream Leagues. Dynamic levels in addition to beautifully done artwork that will top-off your truly immersive (soccer) football experience.

Download to play today and score big! Yes, you can even play offline.

GAME FEATURES:

‚Ä¢ PLAY OFFLINE - FREE
It‚Äôs true, you can play and manage your team of eleven without the internet!

‚Ä¢ STAR SOCCER PLAYERS TO UNLOCK
Utilizing the latest 2020 motion capture technology of real star players

‚Ä¢ IMMERSIVE 3D MOBILE ENGINE & ADVANCED GAME A.I.
Intelligent game A.I. allows realistic freedom, powerful simulation with accurate ball physics. Make your way through the Leagues to be a Soccer Superstar!

‚Ä¢ JOIN WEEKLY OFFLINE TOURNAMENTS
Be the hero for your country & Club and head for glory!

‚Ä¢ SUPER SIMPLE GAME CONTROLS
Intuitive flick to pass and kick gameplay, sweep your finger across the ball to drive, curve and power the ball past walls of defenders.

We love to hear from you! Please email us with your thoughts to soccersuperstarteam@gmail.com
summary: Become a Soccer Superstar while you score your way to the top!
developerAddress: Block 3, Phase 2, Festival City, Tai WaiÔºåNew Territories
recentChanges:
* Optimize the match.
* Fixed some bugs.
comments: Solid experience, fun gameplay. A bit unrealistic, because you can score from the weirdest angles (physics like "am i a joke to you?"), but still enjoyable. Customization is lacking content, and there aren't any things to do except the playing in the field, but that's ok. Achievements would be great. All in all a great game, try it out! P.S.: I like it more than the rivals, it's less frustrating, you can get back the ball and try again without reloading.

Gameplay 5*. BUT! The static ads at the bottom are not enough, and that you are pushing ads after every goal or failed game is a BIG no for me and this game... I wanted to give it a try, but I watched more ads in this game for past few days then in 50 other games combined where you can watch ads for rewards. And I'm not talking about rewards in this game, but random ads after each try. If you keep ads to just the bottom ad, or one ad after few games played, I will consider raising the rating.

Played game on my son's ipad enjoyed it. Decided to download on my android to play and all that has happened is that I have been bombarded with ads literally after each single play an ad. I played over an hour on the ipad with no ads. Very very disappointing, just uninstalled and moving on.
Far too many ads, even during Gameplay. Also there is no challenge to it. Score an easy goal and then game over, move on. Too repetitive and dull.

This is a very nice game. I have suggestion. Each match ... give us 4 simulation of play. If we make 2 succeed and 2 failed, the final score shoulde be 2-2. If we make 3 failed and 1 succeed, the we lose 1-3. The game will be more exiciting if there is competitive match.

comments: Been playing for about a year now. 1st, if the game doesn't want you to win you won't win. I rarely play Kingdom as it seems very rigged - I rarely get pitched against weaker opponents, particularly on promotion games. Once you get above about Stage 11/12 Arena is almost impossible - I'm guessing there comes a point where it gets easier again but I have L4 Bat and L3 others and can't get close. If, like me, you don't take it seriously and accept the dubious algorithms then this game is okay.

Game was fun to start with but boring now. 90% of gamers end in draw which means in the playoff it just comes to who can hit the ball further, which means whoever has the strongest club. There's no skill in that. Also it's almost impossible to miss a putt so you already know it's going to be a draw if you both get it on the green in same amount of shots.

Hey your Ruins challenge is really stupid. It's extra difficult and doesn't let us get necessary coins. What's the point in giving us a tournament if we can't get a decent score and have to leave it halfway? Now the review: This game is unfair because someone with a lot of money will buy a bat wing level 5 and beat you in 2 shots if you can't afford to pay these gyus. That's just ridiculous. The UI and UX is excellent. I like the stages too. But the challenges are really unfair...

It is and extremely fun game and challenging which makes it even more fun I do love the game play with other opponents. But they need to fix the rules on out of bounds and water hazards. It does not count a stroke for out-of-bounds or two strokes for water hazard which I find very frustrating when your opponent beat you after hitting it in the water

Nice game to pass the time. Only downside is when there is a competition against other players for better prizes, you might get paired up against someone who has 2-4 times the amount of trophies as you and their clubs are by far better because of it. You basically have no chance when that happens. If they fixed that aspect, I would definitely increase my rating.

recentChanges: You‚Äôre 1 click away from smoother playing.
comments: Would be fun if you could you know ACTUALLY PLAY THE GAME! I get you need to make money but seriously? Putting 2 30 sec ads after every single thing you get to that only take 3 seconds to complete is ridiculous. If I wanted to watch ads I'd watch TV. Quit wasting my life of inappropriate ads. ("Pass the weed" is one that really annoys me!) Talk about encouraging kids to do drugs!

I really thought it was a fun game but its too bugy and you don't actually do anything except pick 1 color and stick with it, ads are constant, I got 4 in a row by just pressing no thanks. Honestly it's boring :/

It's awesome I love the game so much hair dying, hair washing and many more interesting stuff but the problem is that the ads are so disccusting because of this reason I've given 4 stars if there the ads where not there I've been giving it 5 stars anyways the game is awesome.

I like it but a little bit horrible. Because of the stupid ads. There are so many ads in this game and there are hair dye colors that you need to watch a video to get them. If they were not too many ads then I would enjoy this game

You get an ad after everything you do. You cut a person's hair? You get an ad. You straighten their hair? You get an ad. You dye their hair? You get an ad and so on. It's just boring with this many ads. Please remove them or include less ads at least and maybe it would be a decent game.

‚òÖ FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ One finger control.

comments: Ads on Ads on Ads. Downloaded after seeing the horrible ad it had. Not only that the ad also tricked me thinking that I need to make a shape without lifting my finger to a Ball Sort Puzzle... like what? And after downloading, got like a trillion number of Ads. Was going to rate 0 stars if the play store actually let me.

The reviews express my same feelings. In the beginner level, I enjoy how my brain is challenged. However, the number and lengths have me going back to many of the Google games and others where there are ways of reducing the length and number of ads. Forcing me to watch ads of no interest to me for more than a quarter of a minute and repetittion makes even more disinterested in what's being sold. At 72 years of age, I know how to look for a product I'm interested. The rest is a waste.

The game is fine, what's not fine is the endless loop of trying to get you to install other games between every game. It displays the game they want you to install and when you use the close (x) at the top it takes you to the app store to download it and you're stuck doing this at least three times no matter how you try to get back to the game. Uninstalled.
I love this game! It's fun, it's simple, and relaxing. After a long bad day I play it and then wind down and relax. I reccomend it to everyone. üòÄ

It did work great. Then last week it started glitching when you hit 1up for an extra vial. It runs a wheel like it's processing, never goes to the ad and returns to the game without giving you an extra vial. So I uninstalled and reinstalled and it's starting me at level 1. Not starting over I was almost to level 500.

comments: Ads stick open. Game was fun until I got ads after every game. Now after every game I have to shut down and open it again. Easier to Uninstall and play another game. I might have paid for no ads, but no option. Thanks anyway. UPDATE... As you can see, they address WHY they have to have ads but not that the ads stick open requiring a restart after each game. Therefore, I will not reinstall until reviews show it's fixed.

This game is very confusing. There is no clear path towards goals, as in you work on several areas without knowing how many levels are in an area to pass. It is confusing and jumps from being easy to overly difficult, where literally 20 attempts must be made to pass a level. I don't recommend this at all.

Really great game. But requires you to make purchases to go to higher levels. And it's not exactly cheap. Another downside to the game are the rewards that basically goes to waste unless you can play 24/7. There should be an option to choose when to use the rewards and not just automatically when recieved. Or at least be in sync with when you are logged in to the game.

Great game. All you bored geniuses should be busy developing that game with no ads, that gives you unlimited lives, and pays people to play. Or...you could just shut the hell up and delete the game if it's annoying you so much. It's a game! Get it? For those that know it's for entertainment, it's got great graphics and the developers have put much effort into it. Download it. You'll enjoy it.

I like others, must complain about your not allowing us to play and finish a game without paying. We get to the last play and we are out of moves. I am going to finish these last games and take the game off my phone. I truly am going to miss the game. As developers you might consider the people that play and enjoy it. But the customer doesn't seem to be as appreciated as in the past...

recentChanges: Bug fixed
comments: The videos take 30 seconds or less every time but it is very distracting and annoying when your playing the game. This game will waste all your data if your not using wifi. Also it will drain your battery fast. Doesn't give any rewards, only the tokens to play bingo. And it will stay at 49.5 points or reset back to 0 before it can reach 50 points on the rewards. Theres also a dating video ad called uDates when click to install it will redirect to a totally different ad.

I had playing for 2.5 seconds until the first add popped up. I literally watched 10 adds in one single game of bingo? And you click on just claim and not the double up option and STILL have to watch an add?! I swear I just played this for 2 hours and I can't take the adds anymore with all those fake ppl promising 3000 dollars in an hour and a half its obviously not true but for YOUR apps sake.... you gotta cut back on the adds. Just play them between games like every other app.

All I have to say is .......... How do they get away with these false advertisements. They are without a doubt false. People file class action suits against companies for unbelievable reasons. There was a guy who filed suit against Subway Sandwich shop because when he went home and measured the sandwich it wasn't a foot like they advertise. Can we not somehow all get together and file suit on these companies. Everyone of them are lies

The only game i have got to finish is the first one. At about the middle of the game or towards the end it throws me out of the game or just shows a black screen, that starts the app over when you tap on the screen. I dont know why i keep falling for these bull$h1t apps. All the fake apps description should read, play our app, you will get real close to cashing out, but the money will be cut down so much you will delete the app before you get there. Sucker, or something like that.

If I could give this game zero stars I would. Don't bother downloading it. Total waste of time. Gets you close to winning cash, or any prize for that matter, then it just completely takes away the cash prizes. All I needed was 62 cents to cash out, but it completely stopped all cash prizes when I got so close. Absolute waste of time in a bad way!

title: Johnny Trigger - Action Shooting Game
description:
Johnny Trigger ‚Äì International Man of Mayhem!

Stylish, deadly and smooth as a billiard ball, Johnny Trigger is a man on a mission in this non-stop platform shooter game where the action never ends. 

Do you have what it takes to bring down the underground world of the mafia? ‚ÄúLess talk, more bullets‚Äù ‚Äì that‚Äôs Johnny‚Äôs motto as he runs, jumps, spins, slides and keeps on shooting till every bad guy‚Äôs bitten the dust.

üî• Trigger warning ‚Äì Johnny‚Äôs on his way! üî•

‚öà Thousands of levels of murderous mayhem to fight through, each demanding a unique tactical solution and speedy trigger fingers! Johnny never stops moving, so when the bad guys line up in your sights, you‚Äôve got just once chance to get shooting. 

‚öà Be careful not to hit hostages, though. After all you‚Äôre the hero of this game, not some crazed killer! Should you accidentally end the life of an innocent civilian, it‚Äôs back to square one.

‚öà Hit those hard-to-reach scumbags with the power of physics! Trick shots, ricochets, explosions and gravity are all part of Johnny‚Äôs crime-fighting arsenal‚Ä¶

‚öà ...along with guns galore! Cause serious havoc with 57 unique weapons to collect ‚Äì 11 pistols, 12 SMGs, 9 automatic rifles, 10 superguns üî´ and 4 Ultimate guns with fearsome capabilities guaranteed to give the bad guys a nasty shock. For the completist, there‚Äôs also 5 base guns, 3 bundle guns and 3 VIP guns. Basically, a shedload of guns to collect, cherish and slaughter gangsters with.

‚öà On the subject of sheds, collect keys to unlock Johnny‚Äôs 10 awesome base rooms and get hammering to turn them into luxurious hideaways. Turns out our action hero‚Äôs quite the handyman in his free time.

‚öà Sweet graphics and a banging soundtrack ‚Äì Johnny‚Äôs world would be a great place to chill if it weren‚Äôt for all those pesky gangsters lurking round every corner. Just think how nice it‚Äôll be once you‚Äôve massacred every last one of them!

‚öà More than 20 different stylish skins to help Johnny go undercover in the murky underworld of organized crime, and then blast the living hell out of it!

‚öà Boss battles demand all of Johnny‚Äôs wits and sharp shooting as you take down the lords of the underworld in a leaping, spinning storm of bullets.

üí£ Looking for action? Here‚Äôs Johnny! üí£

Dive straight in and get shooting! Johnny Trigger‚Äôs short but immensely satisfying levels make it the perfect action game to fill a short break between meetings, lectures or lessons. And if you‚Äôve got a little more time, there‚Äôs so much to collect and a new challenge round every corner.

 So what are you waiting for? Those bad guys aren‚Äôt going to beat themselves, you know.

comments: This is amazing. Plus, the amount of ads actually isn't that much. I'm used to ads being after every level. In this, each ad is every 5 levels. A FREE mobile game is going to have ADS people. Get used to it.
It's a really good game but for offline tho because every level you beat you see a ad or within two rounds you will have a ad so they should really pay attention to all of that

Great but my stuff is gone. At some point the game updated and all my guns, skins, outfits, puzzle peices, and the hideout unlock ables are just gone. My purchase stuff is all gone except the no ads. The game is overall just fun and to a go to game when I'm bored I used to use have it until my old phone broke and then I just forgot about it then I saw the game again it's twice a good.

title: Human Tested
description:
The track is full of unexpected traps and rivals are ready to take your workplace away from you. Mistakes have real consequences. Try to reach the finish line while keeping some parts of your body and you will be given a chance to test a new car. 

‚Ä®‚Ä®The gameplay is intuitive - all you need to do is tap at the phone screen to move your ragdoll. However, can you avoid all the deadly traps people have prepared for you? ‚Ä®‚Ä®

Feeling like car testing is too simple? Would you say the same about a plane, rocket, or boat? Upgrade your armor as you progress, participate in harder challenges and you will be given an opportunity to test those! 

Will you be able to pass the crash test?

comments: This game is great but repetitive, it isn't boring though, it actually had good repay value, the only reason I only gave 4 starts was because I found a few small bugs, the main one makes it impossible to complete (unless we restart) on level 37, where we can get propelled upwards and get stuck on an invisible roof.
